gang la rten mi 'cha'/ /'dod pa med pa'i bde ba dag la mi gnas te/ /ya zung med phyir gang la rten dang rten byed bral/ /gnyis med rnal 'byor rang la 'char ba'i nyams myong bde/ /bdag tu rtog pa'i dngos po gtang na nam mkha'i mtha' ltar yangs/ /

mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer dag tu 'jug 'dod na/ /tshogs drug thug phrad char pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /snang ba stong pa skye med thug phrad rkyen la rag ma lus/ /gnyis med goms pas lam myur zung du 'jug mi ldog /sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin yin

par shes na rtsol ba med/ /gang gi ro snyoms spyod pa dag la brten nas 'bras bu thob/ /spyod pa byas na 'gro ba 'khor ba dag las thar bar the tshom med/ /bdud dang mi mthun phyogs las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur/ /mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor mi bya btang snyoms

rnal 'byor min/ /mkhas pa'i ye shes myur du thob cing sgrib pa zad/ /mtshan ma'i spyod pas drang don mkhas kyang rmongs rnams 'ching / /ro snyoms phyag rgya chen po la brten nam mkhar 'gro/ /gnyis med spyod lam rgyun du bstan na tshe 'dir thob/ /snang ba

sgyu ma'i yul la mi gnas rtog yul med/ /'jig rten chos brgyad 'ching bar mi nus brtul zhugs mchog /snying rje thabs thin spyod ba chags med mkha' ltar yangs/ phyag rgya chen po yan lag bzhi ldan thabs kyi mchog /bzhir ldan

phyag rgya gcig gi cho 'phrul gcig gi ngang / /gnyis med ngang la phyag rgya chen po glod de gzhag /byang chub sems ldan btang gzhag med na glang chen 'dra/ /rtog pa'i ngo bos ba mo rta ltar snang 'dod na/ /rtog med snang med don la 'bad de rnal 'byor bya/ /sku bzhi

mthar phyin 'bras bu bde ba chen po'i ngang / /skye bar snang ba lam gyi lus rnams ni/ /sku gsum mthur ldan rtog pa rnam par bral/ /shes dang shes bya rang rgyud dag pa'i yul/ /dngos po'i rang bzhin skye ba'i rkyen snang yang / /ma skyes pa yi yul las 'das

ma myong / /dngos po dngos med btang snyoms la sogs kun/ /'byed pa med de dran med skye med yul/ /phyag rgya che la rtag tu mtshan nyid bral/ /phung po dag pas gsang ba'i yul las 'das/ /dga' ba bzhi yi mtshan nyid phyag rgya'i yul/ /rang rgyud ma yin shes

rab thabs dang bral/ /sna rtse la sogs de nyid ma zin na/ /de nyid dag la sbyor yang don dam min/ /rang rig rdo rje gnas te sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ngo bo 'di 'drar med/ /rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs brag ca'i ngo bor mtshungs/ /grangs tsam

nyid na gang du'ang sleb pa med/ /dam tshig bsgrub dang 'bras bu rnam sbyar ba/ /mtshon bya mtshon byed tshig gi tha snyad lam/ /dam tshig nyams na thabs sogs nyams gang na/ /blo las 'das pa'i yul du slob pa med/ /brtul zhugs spyod pas phyi dang nang 'gyur ba/ /

kho na nyid dang ldan na khyad par can/ /de nyid mi ldan dud 'gro dag dang mtshungs/ /de nyid sbas pas lhan cig skyes bsgoms pa/ /thabs bral dam tshig 'gal yang nyes pa med/ /'di dang pha rol grangs la mi ltos par/ /da lta nyid du mngon gyur phyag rgya che/ /de nyid spangs

na nam yang phrad mi 'gyur/ /phyag rgya chen po skad cig thos pas kyang / /snod dang ldan mi ldan la mi ltos par/ /bstan pa tsam gyis rtse gcig 'di yis thob/ /gang zhig dran pa dag la ma yengs pa'i/ /lhan cig skyes don bsgom dang ldan pas thob/ /de nyid rang

yin gzhan gyi chos mi tshol/ /dur khrod wa sogs tshol phyir 'brangs te phung / /kye ho bram ze rigs ngan khyim 'dres 'tshol slong bzhin/ /bzang ngan 'dres pa gcig la gcig gnod de/ /mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor mtshan med don mi rig /mtshan ma med la bltas pa nam

yang med/ /mtshan ma dus dang grangs la ltos par 'gyur/ /bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa khyad par bsam mi bya/ /gnyis med 'dus pa rnal 'byor mchog ldan gang / /gang yang ma shes dran med yengs pa'i yul/ /dran pa'i rgyud spangs de la goms par bya/ /

thun mong ma yin gsang sngags khyad par can/ /thog ma nyid nas bden pa'i ngo bor gnas/ /dngos grub bsdus pas lhan cig skyes la thug /de nyid khyad par rang rig yul las 'das/ /de nyid bde ba'i gnas dang dngos po stong / /chos rnams dag pas rang bzhin

bde ba'i don/ /gang la mi gnas blo yi yul las 'das/ /yul med gnas med rten dang bral bas stong / /e waM dngos grub ngo bo nyid kyi rgyu/ /rdo rje 'chang dang rang rig bla ma'i bka'/ /'dus pa'i rgyud du dri med phyag rgya che/ /kun rdzob las kyi phyag rgya la sogs kun/ /

'khor los sgyur rgyal dmangs kyi 'khor dang mtshungs/ /phyi nang zab mo bskyed pa'i rim pa kun/ /rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya nyi zla'i skar phran bzhin/ /dga' bral dga' ba mchog tu dga' la sogs/ /lhan cig skyes dga' 'khor lo'i rtsa ba nyid/ /dri ma med par dag byed

de yi dgongs par gsal/ /de nyid ldan pas rtag tu ye shes myong / /dbyer med thugs kyi stong nyid go 'phang yangs/ /lus ngag thabs ldan thabs la brten bsgom pa/ /dran pa skyed byed rgyu rkyen 'bras bu smin/ /las can drang phyir grol ba'i thabs su sbyor/ /

las kyi phyag rgya nyams myong brod pa skyed/ /de nyid ldan goms nyams myong grol ba'i lam/ /pad+ma rdo rjer sbyor ba mthong 'dod dang / /chags can lam gyis de nyid grol mi 'gyur/ /gzhan yang las kyi phyag rgya nyams myong dag brten la/ /tha

mal rang lus phyag rgya chen po spar/ /phyag rgya chen po kun du khyab pa'i dpe/ /rin po che dang nam mkha' lta bur mtshungs/ /phung po lnga sogs gsang ba mchog tu 'gyur/ /'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa lhan cig gnas/ /kho na nyid ni bla ma'i bka' drin gyis/ /

mtshon cing bsgrub mi dgos par rang la rnyed/ /phyag rgya chen po mchog nyid dri ma bral/ /go 'phang thob par bya phyir spyad par bya/ /rtag chad gnyis med mnyam sbyor gcig nyid gzhag /lung dang man ngag rig pas shes par bya/ /kho na nyid ni bsgrubs na gdon mi

za/ /phyag rgya chen po gsal te shes goms na/ /kho na nyid ni rtogs par the tshom med/ /de nyid shes na goms pa'i stobs kyis spyod/ /de nyid ma shes steng sgo 'og sgo dang / /rig ma la brten gsum po gtsor byed dang / /chu bya la sogs nya dang dud 'gror mtshungs/ /

rang rig rgyud la tha snyad 'jal byed dang / /phyi nang gzhigs nas rang bzhin med 'dod na/ /'jig rten ca co yin mod khyad med mtshungs/ /bden dang rten 'brel sgo nas thar 'dod dang / /dbang po bsdams pas thar lam 'dren 'dod dang / /byis pa chang pa stong

pas 'brid dga' ste/ /des na bya ba byed 'dod thar med brdzun gyis bslus/ /grangs can rigs sogs gcer bu bye brag 'dod/ /byed dang rgyur lta la sogs gyi na 'khyam/ /kye ho de nas 'khor ba ji ltar gtang bar 'gyur/ /rgyu rkyen med pas rtogs yul ma yin

pa'i/ /sems kyi de nyid phyag rgya che la gnas/ /de nyid stobs kyi mtshan ma dang bral zhing / /tshe gcig phyag rgya chen po thob par 'gyur/ /kye ho ngo mtshar gsang ba'i spyod yul 'di/ /sman pa'i rgyal po rtogs las skye med 'char/ /ye shes lnga sogs mtshan nyid rang

la ldan/ /dang po'i las can rigs kyis kho na mthong / /mtshan ma la brten dran pas g.yeng ba'i rgyu/ /kho na nyid la phyi rol ma dmigs na/ /mtshan ma'i spyod yul dran med ngang la thim/ /mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor khams gsum 'khor ba'i lam/ /mtshan

ma'i dngos po bag med sa bon bcas/ /dran med rnal 'byor nam mkha'i dkyil dang mtshungs/ /so sor med na ngo bo ma skyes phyir/ /skye bo gzhan gyi blo yi spyod yul min/ /de nyid lta la mkhas pas spyad byar 'byung / /dran pa rnam rtog gzugs su gnas pa

dang / /dran med khams gsum dag pa'i gnas su spangs/ /de nyid ma skyes dngos grub kun gyi gnas/ /phyi dang nang rol ma dmigs thams cad 'grub/ /kye ho phyag rgya chen po yon tan mchog ldan gang / /bla ma mnyes par bya phyir dngos grub kun gyi gzhi/ /bla ma

dkon mchog mi spong yon tan 'byung / /gang zhig dad pa'i sems ldan brgya lam na/ /rnal 'byor rnams kyis gzhung 'di rtogs par shog /gsung gi mdzod 'jam dbyangs rdo rje'i glu sa ra has gsungs pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsit+ta

ko Sha a badzra gI ti/ bod skad du/ thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye bo lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes ni/ /rang gi nyams su myong ba de kho na/ /rig dang ma rig rang rig gsal ba de kho na/ /mar me mun gsal

rang gi rang gsal rang la sad/ /'dam gyi pad+ma 'dam la ma zhen kha dog legs/ /gzung 'dzin dri ma ma spangs snying po gsal/ /nags khrod gnas pa'i ri dgas gcig pur rgyu/ /rgyu la ma zhen 'bras bu de kho na/ /snang dang mi snang yul med zhen med gsal/ /

dngos stong ma dran dran med brjed pa med/ /lhan cig skyes pa rnam gsum nyams su bde/ /zhen pa med phyir rtog ge'i yul las 'das/ /sna tshogs dran phyir rjes su 'brang ba med/ /gsal dang mi mnyam ye shes snying po nyid/ /mun sel nyi ma sgron me'i kha dog

ltar/ /rang rig rang la 'bar na 'dzin rtog zad/ /sgrib pa zad phyir dran med yengs pa med/ /gnyis dang yod med tha snyad ma skyed cig /phyag rgya chen po bsam med blo las 'das/ /rang rig rdo rje 'dzin pa rnal 'byor pa/ /'da' dka' lhan

cig skyes pa'i mar me ni/ /thabs dang shes rab zung du 'jug pa'i don/ /skye med stong pa 'od gsal ris dang bral/ /khyad par can gyi ye shes kho na nyid/ /gnyis la mi ltos bde ba rgyun mi 'chad/ /rang 'byung rtog med bag chags rtsad nas gcod/ /sems can

sangs rgyas khyad par bsam yas kyang / /spyod lam dag na rgyun gyi rnal 'byor che/ /dran pa'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab kyang / /gdod nas dag pas dran med dbyings la thim/ /rang don skye med gnyis bral rtogs pa'i don/ /'bras bu dag pas blo 'das yul med

bral/ /rtogs pa'i thabs rgyun rang bzhin kun la khyab/ /thabs kyi 'gro don snying rje bsam yas kyang / /ye shes rang bzhin skye 'gag med par rtogs/ /thabs kyi bde ba skyes kyang de med ma zin 'ching / /grol ba'i ye shes rang la lhan cig 'byung / /bsgom bya sgom

byed dmigs pa'i blo las 'das/ /sangs rgyas sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /skye med rtogs pa'i yul na blor mi snang / /de nyid sad pas bde ba stong pas mtshon/ /bsgom bya'i ngo bo snang ba'i rkyen las byung / /mi rtog rtogs pas kun rdzob tha snyad 'grub/ /

gnyis su med pa'i snang ba rkyen med la/ /rang bzhin dag pa skye ba'i rnam 'phrul shar/ /bral dang ma bral mi rtog blo las 'das/ /gnyis med rtogs byar skye med yul du 'gyur/ /stong par smra bas de nyid rtogs mi 'gyur/ /blo las 'das pas mno bsam yul ma yin/ /

mtha' gsum rtag 'dod dag gis rnyed par dga'/ /dga' bzhi dag la dmigs kyang de nyid dka'/ /tshogs drug rang chas ye shes mchog ldan pas/ /gnyis med bcud kyi snang ba rang la 'chad/ /kye ho phyag rgya chen po rtogs bral kun gyi gzhi/ /dngos grub 'byung

bas ngo mtshar rmad du che/ /gnyis med bag chags sad nas rang rig bral/ /gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni/ /mtshan nyid bstan pas nyan thos la sogs skrag /rtse gcig bltas na yon tan mthar thug ldan/ /rtse gcig byas kyang cung zad bsgom du med/ /

rnam rtog rang 'bar dran med gsos su zhi/ /dran med snang med me long gzugs brnyan 'dra/ /tha snyad bral bas skye med blo 'das lam/ /mtshan ma'i dran pa dri med bag chags bstan/ /thog mtha' bral zhing snga phyi'i dus mi dmigs/ /kye ho de phyir dngos med ye

shes rtogs pa'i lam/ /ji ltar bag chags bral ba'i tshul zhe na/ /gnyis su ma gzung gdod mtha' bral bas zhi/ /bag chags bral bas phyogs med rgyu ba stong / /zung du 'jug pa sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid/ /shes rab rnam gsum yul dang thabs su gsungs/ /dpe

dang bral bas mtshon pa'i yul las 'das/ /skye ba 'di la dam pa'i snying po min/ /thabs kyi sbyor bas tshogs drug rang sar zhi/ /phung po lnga sogs yon tan dag pa'i zhing / /kun mkhyen gnyis med snang yul zhen dang bral/ /don dam smra med kun rdzob rtog ge tsam/ /

mya ngan 'das lam 'khor ba'i snang ba nyid/ /bla ma dam pa'i dgongs pa thug phrad du/ /rnyed nas 'khor ba'i lam las grol bar 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor dgongs pa'i nyams rnyed rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /ma nor lam du lhan cig kho na yin/ /kye ho gnyis med don du

gsang sngags brda yis bkrol/ /yon tan mi zad rgya mtsho nor bu mtshungs/ /thabs mchog zin na bcu bzhi'i sa la gnas/ /gang du gnas kyang ye shes rang las rnyed/ /gter rnyed bdag gzhan gnyis ka'i don la rmongs/ /snying gi ga'u pad+ma'i me tog dkyil/ /

thabs dang ldan pa sbyor ba de nas 'gyed/ /'khor lo'i phyogs kyi rtsa gnas gang du yang / /'dod dang bral bas chags med nam mkha' la/ /gyen thur 'dren dang 'khor lo bskor ba yang / /thabs kyi 'dren tshul don gyi gting mi rnyed/ /gzung dang 'phang dang sbyar

dang spar ba yang / /blun po dbugs mi bde dang khyad med mtshungs/ /rtogs par 'dod pas de nyid rtag tu blta/ /gus dang dang bas bla ma dkon mchog brten/ /gsang ba'i yon tan bla ma mchog las 'byung / /don ldan mtshan nyid nyon mongs

g.yul las rgyal/ /gsang ba'i don nyid don dang rab ldan pa'i/ /bla ma slob dpon lung dang rab ldan nas/ /mi gnyis sgo nas 'gro ba grol 'gyur shog /thugs kyi mdzod skye med rdo rje'i glu snying po gsang ba'i don/ dpal sa ra ha pa'i zhal nas gsungs pa rdzogs so//

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ kA ya bAka tsit+ta a ma na si ka ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sku gsung thugs yid la mi byed pa zhes bya ba/ mtshan ma rab tu mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig sku yi khyad par bdud bzhi rab tu 'joms

mdzad cing / /rnal 'byor rnam par grol bas mdzad pa gang gis ni/ /'dod pa'i don ni yang dag sbyin par gang 'gyur ba/ /'gro la byams pa'i cha lugs mchog gi don ston pa/ /don dam rab tu mi gnas dgongs pa rgyal ba'i thugs/ /gang gi sems la 'di kun

bsam du med do kye/ /khyod ni phrin las yan lag mang po ston mdzad cing / /dgyes shing nam mkha'i khams kun thams cad 'gengs par byed/ /gsung mchog yan lag drug cus sgra skad sna tshogs sgrogs/ /thugs kyi khyad par dgongs pa dbyings las mi bskyod kyang / /

thams cad tshim zhing mgu nas rab tu bstod par byed/ /byams dang snying rje'i gdugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar ston/ /ma hA de ba u ma de ba rab tu 'joms par byed/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid de/ /thar pa'i sgo ni rnal 'byor rnams kyi

lam 'di nyid/ /gang yang gtso mchog ldan pa'i sbyor ba dag gis rab tu mi dbye bar/ /rnal 'byor chen po tha mi dad pa yin/ /gang gis de ni mi shes pa'i/ /dri ma'i tshul gyis gang yang mthong ba med/ /gang gis de kun 'chang bar byed pa de yis ni/ /gzi mdangs

gnyis las brten te las kun ston par byed/ /bdag med ro gcig khyab par byed pa'i gzugs ldan ni/ /'di na mi gnas kun kyang 'gro bar byed/ /sngags dang mdo sde kun gyi rgyal por dbang bskur bas/ /'di dag kun gyi rtsa ba yid la mi byed par/ /khyed kyis

gcig dang gnyis la ma sems kye/ /kun rdzob dran pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs par ston pa/ /don dam mi dmigs pa yi dbyings su ro gcig nyid/ /dug lnga la sogs nad kyis nyen pa'i mun pa sel/ /thog ma'i mtha' dang tha ma'i dngos gzhi ma mthong bar/ /'dus

ma byas la yid kyi dmigs su med do kye/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi bar na ming dang bral 'dug pa/ /yan lag log na gcig gi ngo bo nyid/ /shes par bya dang bya'o cog gi tha snyad kun/ /'di las gzhan du lta ba mtshan mas myong bar 'gyur/ /sgra gcan zin gyis zla

ba zos pa ji bzhin te/ /ma mthong ba nyid byis dang bar nas shor bar 'gyur/ /yengs dang gnas pa'i bar na ngo bo 'di zhes med/ /rgyu med rkyen bral skye ba med pa gnyis bar na/ /log par lta ba'i tshogs kyis 'di la gzhol du med/ /gi wang gur gum tsan+dan thig le

bris pa bzhin/ /zla ba bzang po rgyu skar 'od kyis 'gebs pa nyid/ /snying po'i 'od kyis yan lag zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/ /'di nas 'di ru zad ces 'di byung brtag dka' nyid/ /gang gis nam mkha' dag la longs spyod pa'i/ /'dod pa'i yon tan 'di la

'phel 'grib med par 'byung / /gang zhig nor bu dri ma med pa 'chang ba yi/ /sems kyi yon tan gter chen 'di las 'byung 'gyur te/ /mthong ba med pa'i tshul gyis rtag tu blta ba nyid/ /chos nyid mtshon pa'i ngo bo 'di zhes 'das 'gyur ba/ /blo mchog rnams kyis

kyang ni phigs par nus ma yin/ /gnyis med tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs gang nyid/ /'di nas song ba gang yang med par shes pa de/ /'di ni mi gnas gang na'ang gnas pa med/ /yul med 'di la rtag tu lta ba dang bral nyid/ /'di nas gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs mtshams

de kun na/ /'jigs par byed pa'i sgra yis ma khyer bar/ /ci bde ba dang lhan cig dag tu byos/ /kye ho grogs dag 'di la sems gnyis yod de med kyi brtag pa kun/ /rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod de smyon pa'i tshig tu 'gyur/ /smyo bar gyur nas rgya mtshor

lhung ba nyid/ /tshangs pa rdul dang mtshan ma'i mun pa dag dang ma bral ba/ /de nyid gnyis bral rtogs par 'dod pa dang / /rgya mtsho sa dang gshag mar nor bu 'gyur mthong nyid/ /brtul zhugs mya ngan 'da' ba'i spyod pa gang byed pa/ /'di ni mi shes de 'drar ston par

byed/ /bden pa gnyis bral sgro skur med pa'i gnyug ma gang / /gang du mthong ba med pa de yin te/ /nges par grub cing 'di la rang bzhin med par 'gyur/ /gang gis ma mthong ba las de ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ /theg pa gsum gyis mya ngan 'das ston pa/ /'di ru ma shes

de nyid mthong ba med/ /rnam grol lam ston bye brag gang du'ang phye ba med pa de/ /byis pa rnams kyis shes par 'gyur ma yin/ /gang zhig 'dod chags bral ba rtogs par 'dod pa de/ /sdug bsngal gsum mam brgyad la sogs pa kun spangs nyid/ /bden pa gnyis

las mi 'da' thabs tshul sna tshogs kyis/ /'gro ba'i don mdzad 'od zer g.yas g.yon rab tu 'gyed/ /bum ril kha sbub ma dag pa nyid dag ston pa/ /tshang tshing 'brel ba'i yul drug la sogs rab tu 'joms/ /thams cad mkhyen ldan sus kyang mthong ba med pa

de/ /grags pa la sogs kun gyis bstod dang bskyod pa med/ /kye ho 'di ltar gnas na kun gyis shes 'gyur te/ /thog mtha' med nas srid pa'i rgya mtsho g.yengs 'gyur ba/ /sdug bsngal nyid kyi rtsa ba 'di ru byas/ /'di la shes dang nyon mongs la sogs pa'i/ /dri

mas ma gos 'dam gyi pad+ma bzhin/ /kha dog ma 'dres yul la so sor snang / /sgyu mar rtogs tsam gar mkhan mig 'phrul bzhin/ /'du byed sna tshogs gang la bsags pa de/ /glo bur rten 'brel dag las goms pa'i stobs/ /'di goms gang yang shes par mi

'gyur te/ /ma goms pas na thams cad shes par 'gyur/ /'dres pa'i chos ni gang yang gnas par mi byed do/ /sku gsung thugs dang phyag rgya la sogs rim pa kun/ /'di la skad cig tsam du rtogs par ma byed cig /'jig rten bstan bcos dag dang glegs bam

gyis/ /gsung gi bdag nyid brjod par bya ba min/ /nyi ma zla ba gnyis su gnas 'gyur ba/ /de dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas ni/ /gang gis gang spyod de yis rab tu brgyan/ /skye ba med pa'i rnam par nges brjod pa'i/ /dbus su brjod pas mtha' rnams rab tu

spangs/ /ji ltar bstan pas go bar mi 'gyur ba'i/ /'jig rten khams su gtan 'khyams rigs chad de/ /bag chags las kyis mnar ba ma tshor bas/ /chos nyid dri ma med pa'i don mi mthong / /gang yang 'di dang bral ba med pa de/ /dran 'dzin lus las myur

du skad cig grol/ /rdo rje'i sems ni yongs su brtag dka' ba/ /sems la sems su ma mthong ro snyoms nas/ /phyi nang bsam gtan rtse mos brtags pas stong / /rnal ma'i don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ni/ /ye shes shes rab gsang ba'i dbyings la rdzogs/ /rang

gis ma mthong mtshan nyid kun ldan pa/ /zhes ni bsngags pa brjod 'gyur ba'i/ /dran med mnyam pa'i dbyings la skur gsal mos pa med par spyod/ /thugs rjes mi gzigs sku gsung thugs kyis ma gos pa/ /gnyis su ma mthong gsum gyi dri ma bral/ /sna tshogs par snang

gang la ngos gzung med pa ste/ /lus ngag yid gsum 'bad pa'i rtsol bas gdung bar ma byed cig /ngas ni rdo rje'i glu dang long gtam rgyob sod dang / /'gro ba kun gyis shes pa dag dang gar bder spyod/ /mi sgrim mi lta mi spyod 'di dang 'bral ma myong / /ye nas ma bcos

thams cad 'byung 'jug go 'phang yang / /kye ho sna tshogs gang yang rung ba 'di la bsam pa'i sems bral bas/ /yid kyi rtog pa sna tshogs 'di ni dran pa'i sems yin te/ /gang yang gzugs dang rtsa ba med pa dag las skyes pa yin/ /tha mal shes pa ma bzung bde chen rgyal po

nyid/ /mtshan nyid cir yang ma mthong phyogs cha kun dang bral/ /'khrul pas brtags pa'i bsam brjod 'di ni glo bur te/ /blo las byung phyir blo yis bsgom du ga la yod/ /gang la yan lag med pa de nyid kun gyi khyim du ltung bar 'gyur/ /go ba'i tshe na

ci yang med pa ste/ /dngos kun ci yang gsal ba mthong ba med/ /gang la mya ngan 'das dang srid pa kha sbyor ba/ /gnyis su snang ba khyod la rten dang 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/ /rgyal ba la sogs kun du sprul pa sna tshogs ston mdzad pa/ /dag pa'i rigs rnams kun la khyod kyis spyod/ /mi bsam thugs rje rang 'byung

sprul pa ni/ /nor bu rin chen lta bur 'phel 'grib med par 'byung / /dngos po med pas nams kyang rtogs min pas/ /btang gzhag med cing rang bzhin rnam par grol/ /'dzin med yid la bya med rnal 'byor bsam gtan nyid/ /gang la mi bsgom gang du'ang btsal ba med pa de/ /bsam du med pas yid la mi

byed ro snyoms kye/ /ye shes mkha' 'dra bsam bral ma bcos snying po'i don/ /'di la blo yis bsam zhing brjod du med do kye/ /ye btang rang yan tshogs drug lhug pa'i spyod pa 'di/ /tshogs drug rjes su sbyor ba'i mkhas pas btang gzhag med/ /kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor lhag pa'i bsam bral

bas/ /de bzhin nyid la mi gnas gang la rang bzhin med par grol/ /'od gsal rdzogs dang thim dang 'gags par 'gyur ba gang / /ji ltar bsgoms dang chags par 'gyur pa mtshan ma ste/ /phung po khams dang skye mched yan lag thams cad kun/ /gcig gi dbyings na mi mngon phra ba'i tshul du gnas/ /

rgya mtsho'i dbyings nas nor bu rin chen rnyed 'gyur ba/ /chu srin dung dang gdug pa can gyis mthong mi 'gyur/ /phrag dog srid pa'i nyon mongs la sogs pa'i/ /mtshan ma'i dbyings nas ngos bzung med par mthong / /gsum la sogs pa'i sgo nas 'jug par byed pa ni/ /rnam rig bden pa gnyis

kyi sgo nas rtsol bar byed/ /ji ltar snang bzhin 'jig rten tha snyad lam/ /rnam thar sgo gsum bslab pa rnam pa gsum/ /mtshan ma'i yid la byed pa'i rnal 'byor te/ /rnal 'byor chen po 'di la gnas mi byed/ /gang zhig shel sgong dag pa lta bur ni/ /dri ma gnyis bral srid dang 'das grol te/ /rin

po che ltar dgos 'dod thams cad 'byung / /yongs su zad pa zad phyir mtshan nyid med/ /dngos med bden pa gnyis bral gcig gi dngos po stong / /mtshan ma thams cad ye nas med pa'i phyir/ /mthong thos la sogs mtha' yi rtog pa med/ /med la med par 'dzin pa tha snyad de/ /'di

ni tshor bar nus pa ma yin no/ /'di ni rtsa ba kun gyi rjes su rtog par ma byed cig /'di la gang tshe rtog par byed pa dang / /bskal par bgrangs kyang de nyid rnyed pa min/ /mgal me gtsub shing lta bur me mched 'bar ba bzhin/ /'di kun mched nas thams cad sreg par byed/ /kye ho grogs dag rgya

mtsho nor bu lta bu'i sems ni 'di nyid yin te kye/ /ma he rwa rur seng ge'i 'o ma gang blugs pa/ /nor bu rin chen 'bar ba de yis thob par 'gyur/ /nyon mongs pa rnams nyi mas rab tu skams pa'i 'od zer 'di/ /ngan 'gro la sogs log par lta bas 'jigs pa med pa de/ /gang dag rnyed

pa de dag gzhal gyis mi lang ngo / /ji ltar chos kyi dbyings su snang ba de srid du/ /zag pa med gang thams cad de yis spyad pa yin/ /dug sbrul phag rgod glang chen seng ges zos pa bzhin/ /de bzhin srid dang mya ngan 'das pa khyur mi 'das/ /bskal pa brjod du med pa brgya stong du ma ru/ /nyon mongs

la sogs bsags pa'i sa bon ni/ /sems gcig snang bar 'gyur bas 'bras bu gcig tu log par 'gyur/ /sgron me khang bur nor bu gnas gyur pa'i/ /'od kyis thams cad zil gyis mnan par 'gyur/ /dman pa'i lta spyod nyan thos la sogs pa'i/ /sems de yang dag blangs nas 'jug

par 'gyur/ /'di la gang na byang chub sems dpar gyur pa de/ /rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dka' bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /sems kyi skad cig 'di la mtha' yas mu med de/ /yan lag thams cad skad cig 'di la log par 'gyur/ /chos rnams thams cad kho na nyid la rdzogs par 'gyur

ba yi/ /gzhan med gang zhig gang nas 'ongs par 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /zla ba'i snying po mun pa'i g.yul las rgyal bar 'gyur ba gang / /'jig rten rmi lam lta bu 'di la yang dag rnyed par 'gyur/ /brdzun pa gang yin 'di la yang dag sus mthong ba/ /bltar med de la gzugs su mthong bar

ga la 'gyur/ /don dam par ni gang yang yod par 'gyur ba ma yin na/ /pha rol gzhan du mthong nas 'gro bar 'dod pa'i gang zag de/ /'di las gzhan du 'gro ba'i khyad par bse dri can bzhin no/ /'di ni pha rol brtol bas gang du ma bor bar/ /gcig kyang phyin pa med par

'dis brtol lo/ /kye ho gang 'di tha snyad lam 'dis btsal ma yin/ /thar pa rtag tu byi la lta bu'i mchongs pas nags su lhung bar 'gyur/ /gal te stag dang wa mo lta bu'i stobs ni go bzlog na/ /de nyid yod pas de la ci zhig phan par mi 'gyur ro/ /de nyid shes na mi bsam mi rtog par/ /

gzugs mthong cir yang snang ba'i yul ni de ru stong par 'gyur/ /'di la yengs nas de la gnas par 'gyur ba ma tshor ro/ /dran dang shes bzhin gnyis ni bar gyi de la gang yang ma mthong ste/ /chos kun stor na 'di yi khong nas gnas par 'gyur ba yin/ /'di la dngos po med cing bsam

du med pa de/ /khyod kyis rtswa mchog tsam du gnyis ka med par byos/ /kye ho sangs rgyas kun gyi yan lag bzhi pa 'di kun gsum du ston par ni/ /khyod kyis yang nas yang du bsams pas mthong ba gang yang med mod kye/ /'khor ba'i dran pas rten 'brel dag las 'byung ba ni/ /sna tshogs

bar snang rang gi ngo bo ma skyes phyir/ /mi 'gyur bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin dag dang lhan cig skyes/ /sems kyi don dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ /rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i yon tan nyid/ /chos rnams thams cad gnyis su gdod nas ma byung ste/ /gnyis dang gcig gi

dran pas du ma dag dang 'bral bar 'gyur/ /gang yang brjod par bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig rang gis stong pa ste/ /blo las 'das phyir mtshan ma rab tu 'joms/ /de med pa de gang yin gang na gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bsam gtan gang tshe thob par 'gyur ba la/ /bral

bas 'di las gzhan du song bas ma mthong ngo / /gsang sngags 'di kun rtsa ba de las bskyed par ni/ /de med pa las 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang yang yod pa ma yin kye/ /su zhig 'di la rtog par byed pa'i blun po de/ /bskal pa brgyar yang mchog gi don mi mthong / /gang zhig yid la

byed pa'i mtshan mas brgyal ba kun/ /btang gzhag bral dang thob par mi 'gyur rgyal srid bzhin/ /cung zad drod thob byang chub sems dpa' dag /gang du g.yos pa med pa ma tshor ro/ /rnam par rtog can lam du zhugs pa'i phyir/ /byang chub sems kyi thig le rlung la gang bskyon pa/ /

sa bon des ni 'khor ba 'di ru zags par 'gyur/ /yang dag pa yi de nyid thob par mi 'gyur zhing / /tshang tshing dra ba'i gseb tu 'brel bar 'gyur/ /shes rab mig gis log par tshar bcad na/ /gzhan gyi log par lta ba rang gi de ru grol/ /dka' thub la sogs gzhan du

'bad pa med/ /bdag med par ni rang byung gang yang rnam pa sna tshogs nyid/ /rgyu rkyen la sogs 'brel pa 'di ru stong par byos/ /rnal 'byor 'di la bdag gi gnas su 'dug pa ma mthong ngo / /sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i long ba gang 'chal 'dis/ /srid pa'i dra ba khur nas rgya mtshor

mchong bar byed/ /de la gru med rgya mtsho'i zabs su zag par 'gyur/ /thog mtha' med pa'i phyag rgya chen po 'di/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das grol nyon mongs rgya mtsho skems par 'gyur/ /de la sems rgyun 'chad do snyam du sems shing stong par yid la ma byed cig /gang la don

gyi brtul zhugs chen po 'di nyid ma thob par/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa'i dbang gis de la ma reg kye/ /byin gyis brlabs dang brlab bya med pas ngo mtshar che ba nyid/ /gnyis med sgro skur bral ba 'di la gnas pa gang / /rten dang bral ba'i tshul gyis gnas par 'gyur/ /'gro ba kun gyis

de ltar shes par 'gyur gang ni/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa kun gyi don shes 'gyur/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams rang gi sems yin par/ /gzhan du blta ba med par thag chod bsam med blo 'das nyid/ /de la bsgoms dang ma bsgoms rnam par rtog pa dang / /mtshan ma

dgag dang spang bar bya ba mi dgos te/ /de la ci bya gang yang ma byas de nyid gsal bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar rnam rtog ma bkag ma spangs par/ /gzhan du ma mthong de nyid gsal 'gyur na/ /de ni gang la gnas kyang gzhan du mthong bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/ /ma bsgoms ched du ma byas 'bral ba

med pa'i rang bzhin te/ /dus rnams kun du 'di don shes pa'i mtshan ma 'di la rtog par ma byed cig /rang la lhan cig gsal ba'i snang srid 'di la rtog med cing / /de las gzhan du rtogs pa'i blo can 'dis ni rgya mtsho nang gi nor bu rnyed mi 'gyur/ /gang nas

byung zhing gang du gnas pa'i 'dzin pa 'di ni skye ba med 'gyur na/ /rgyun du 'gag pa med pas gzung 'dzin de ma skyes pas ye shes nyid/ /ngo bo de la dri ma ma spangs de nyid ma bsgoms par/ /nags khrod dag na gnas pa'i glang po yan par khye/ /mtshan ma'i yul gyi rnam g.yeng

rtog pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ /gnod cing de la g.yeng bar mi 'gyur te/ /mtshon cha bral ba'i chom rkun dag gis gsad bcad ma yin no/ /mtshan ma de nyid snying po med 'gyur ba/ /sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad lta bur rang bzhin med par byos/ /gang mthong sems yin de la dngos po med

'gyur bas/ /dran med blo la mi gnas chos rnams thams cad ni/ /de las byung zhing de ru snang nas de nyid 'das 'gyur bas/ /'di la gzhan du g.yo ba gang yang med pa nyid/ /de la de nyid tsam du mkhyen gyis yid la ma byed kye/ /kye ho grogs dag blo la ci skyes sems de ni/ /

dus rnams kun du gsal ba ma yin no/ /de la gsal rgyu ci yang med pa ste/ /brtsad pa kun dang bral bar ni/ /rang gnas pas ni grol bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar tshul 'chos byas pa'i sangs rgyas 'di kun ni/ /dge slong ma yin rgya mtsho'i nang du ltung / /'di nyid las ni gzhan dag

tu/ /gcig kyang lta bar mi byed pa/ /des ni thams cad mthong ba'i dge slong yin/ /gang zhig brdzun la goms pa'i gnas brtan des/ /srid pa nyam thag 'di las 'byung bar nus ma yin/ /gang gis srid pa'i chu bo 'di brdzun par/ /shes pa de ni gnas brtan mchog thob 'gyur/ /

rnal 'byor de yi spyod yul ni/ /lha dang sngags dang phyag rgya'i yan lag kun/ /'di kun shes na dbab tu yod pa ma yin no/ /de nyid shes pa de la de kun mthong ba med/ /de ltar 'di las ma gtogs pa'i/ /'du shes yul gzhan dag las ni/ /skye bar 'gyur ba yod ma yin/ /

yul can gang gi phyogs dag tu/ /gnyis su mthong ba med par 'gyur ba de/ /rnam pa sna tshogs de nyid grol ba yin/ /gang zhig phyogs su lta bar gyur pa de/ /mtshan ma'i dran rig phra rags goms pa yin/ /gang zhig 'di las goms 'gyur bas/ /spyod pa ji ltar byas pa

kun/ /don dang ldan par 'gyur ba ma yin te/ /nyam thag mtshan mas myur du 'ching bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig 'di dang phyogs su ni/ /gtad la goms su yod ma yin/ /bsam med yid la goms su med/ /kye ho grogs dag rig pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa ni/ /ye shes

bla na med pa'i dbang bskur chen po ste/ /rdzogs ldan dpal ldan bla ma dag gis ni/ /bskur du med pa'i tshul gyis thob par byed pa ni/ /mchog gi rnal 'byor rnams kyis dbang bskur te/ /thob bya med pa'i tshul gyis thams cad rdzogs/ /de nyid ma shes log sred can gyi dbang

rnams ni/ /mtshan ma'i rtog pa dag gis gsum du zag par 'gyur/ /'di la nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib pa las bsags kun/ /shes rab ting 'dzin mi dgos rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ /khro gnyer med pas zug rngu thams cad 'joms par ni/ /ma skyes pa yi tshul gyis 'dzin

par mi byed do/ /snang ba 'gag pa 'di la gsal ba'i rtog pas yid la ma byed cig /phyin ci log dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad ni/ /nyon mongs lnga yi gnas su thams cad zags par 'gyur ba yin/ /gzhan dag 'di nyid shes bas 'khor ba'i dra ba dag gis stong pa nyid/ /

u dum wA ra lta bur dkon 'gyur ba'i/ /rmongs pa'i mun sel snying po gsang ba'i don/ /sus kyang shes pa med par kun la gsal 'gyur ba/ /snying gar gnas pa'i don la dri ma med 'gyur te/ /brtul zhugs spyod pas gang de mthong ba ma yin no/ /'di rnams rdzogs la sbyor

bar nus pa de/ /yan lag thim nas stong pa nyid du gnas/ /kye ho grogs dag gyad dang rje rigs ji bzhin du/ /gang gis khengs par myur du thob par 'gyur/ /rim par sbyang ba gang yang yod pa ma yin no/ /chos rnams thams cad stong pa nyid du ro gcig dang / /khyod kyis rdzogs par

'gyur bas thob pa ma yin no/ /gang tshe 'di la rtsa ba med par rtogs pa ni/ /da lta nyid du gnyis med nges par 'gyur ba yin/ /ji ltar srin bu spyod pas bcings par gang 'gyur ba/ /'di rnams ro la chags pas 'ching bar 'gyur ba ste/ /tshang tshing 'di la za bar

nus pa gang gis ni/ /'khor lo thams cad rgyun du bskor bar 'gyur ba yin/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs gsal ba/ /'di kun gang gis yid la ma byas par/ /ston pa'i bla ma rdo rje 'dzin la 'dud/ /sku gsung thugs yid la mi byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba

sangs rgyas gnyis pa ltar grags pa/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha pa'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa rdzogs so// //bla ma nag pos rang 'gyur du gnang ba'o/ /gu ya sa ma pa ta mi thi//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /do ha ko Sha nA ma ma hA mu

dra u ba de sha/ bod skad du/ do ha mdzod ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag /dpal rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes chos kyi sku bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar dngos dang dngos med snang stong dang / /rgyu dang mi rgyu g.yo dang mi

g.yo ba/ /thams cad ma lus nam mkha'i rang bzhin las/ /dus rnams kun du nam yang g.yo ba med/ /nam mkha' nam mkha' zhes ni rab brjod kyang / /nam mkha'i ngo bo cir yang grub pa med/ /yod dang med dang yod min med min dang / /de las gzhan du'ang mtshan pa'i

yul las 'das/ /de ltar nam mkha' sems dang chos nyid la/ /tha dad cung zad yod pa ma yin te/ /tha dad ming ni glo bur btags pa tsam/ /de la don med brdzun gyi tshig tu zad/ /chos rnams thams cad rang gi sems yin te/ /sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan rdul

tsam med/ /gang gis gdod nas sems med rtogs pa yis/ /dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa dam pa rnyed/ /chos kyi za ma tog ces yongs su gdags/ /de yang log pa'i chos gzhan ma yin te/ /gzod nas lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de yi de nyid bstan du

yod min te/ /brjod du med pas sus kyang go ba med/ /gal te bdag po yod na nor yod de/ /ye nas bdag med de la ci zhig yod/ /sems yod gyur na chos kun yod rigs te/ /sems med pa la chos zhig su yis rtogs/ /sems dang chas su snang ba thams cad

ni/ /btsal na mi rnyed tshol mkhan gong nas med/ /med pa dus gsum ma skyes mi 'gag pas/ /de nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ni/ /rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i gnas lugs yin/ /de phyir snang ba thams cad chos kyi sku/ /'gro ba sems can rnams ni sangs

rgyas nyid/ /'du byed las kun ye nas chos kyi dbyings/ /btags pa'i chos rnams ri bong rwa dang 'dra/ /kye ma nyi ma sprin bral 'od zer kun khyab kyang / /mig med rnams la mun pa rnams su snang / /lhan cig skyes pas kun la khyab gyur kyang / /rmongs pa dag la de nyid shin tu

ring / /'gro ba rnams kyis sems med ma rtogs pas/ /btags pa'i sems kyis sems nyid rab tu bcings/ /ji ltar gdon gyis brlabs pa'i smyon pa dag /dbang med don med sdug bsngal byed pa ltar/ /dngos 'dzin rnam rtog gdon chen zin pa yi/ /skye bo don med sdug

bsngal 'ba' zhig byed/ /kha cig blo yi dbye bas rmongs rnams bcings/ /bdag po khyim du bzhag nas gzhan du tshol/ /kha cig gzugs brnyan dag la gdon du 'dzin/ /kha cig rtsa ba bor nas lo 'dab 'breg /ji ltar byas kyang bslus ba ma tshor ro/ /kye ho bus pa rnams kyis

de nyid ma rig kyang / /de nyid ngang las g.yos med nga yis rtogs/ /nga yis nga yir thog mtha' shes gyur pas/ /nga yis nga mthong rang nyid gcig pur lus/ /gcig po nyid la bltas pas gcig ma mthong / /mthong bya mthong byed bral bas brjod du med/ /brjod du med pa

su yis go bar 'gyur/ /gnyug ma'i yid la gang tshe sbyangs gyur pa/ /de tshe ri khrod nga yi rtogs par 'jug /seng ge'i 'o ma snod ngan phal par min/ /ji ltar nags na seng ge'i nga ro yis/ /ri dgas phra mo thams cad skrag gyur kyang / /seng phrug rnams ni dga' bas brgyug pa

ltar/ /gdod nas ma skyes bde chen 'di bstan pas/ /rmongs pa log rtog can rnams skrag gyur kyang / /skal ldan rab tu dga' bas spu zing byed/ /kye ho ma yengs sems kyi rang gis rang la ltos/ /rang gi de nyid rang gis rtogs gyur na/ /yengs

pa'i sems kyang phyag rgya chen por 'char/ /mtshan ma rang grol bde ba chen po'i ngang / /rmi lam dag gi bde dang sdug bsngal kun/ /sad pa'i dus na rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ /re dang dogs pa'i bsam pas kun bslang nas/ /dgag dang sgrub pa'i bsam pa su zhig

byed/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos rnams kun/ /de nyid mthong bas rang bzhin med pa'i phyir/ /re dang dogs pa'i blo ni zad gyur pas/ /spang dang blang ba'i 'bad rtsol ci byar yod/ /snang grags thams cad sgyu ma smig rgyu dang / /gzugs brnyan dang mtshungs

dngos po mtshan ma med/ /sgyu mar snang mkhan sems nyid nam mkha'i ste/ /mtha' bral dbus mar sus kyang shes mi 'gyur/ /gang gA la sogs chu klung sna tshogs pa/ /ba tsha can gyi rgya mtshor ro gcig ltar/ /btags pa'i sems dang sems byung sna tshogs kun/ /

chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig shes par byos/ /gang zhig nam mkha'i khams ni yongs btsal kyang / /mtha' dang dbus med mthong ba yongs su 'gag /de bzhin sems dang chos ni yongs btsal bas/ /snying po rdul tsam rnyed par ma gyur te/ /yongs su tshol ba'i

sems kyang mi dmigs pas/ /ci yang ma mthong ba nyid de mthong yin/ /ji ltar gzings la 'phur ba'i bya rog ni/ /phyogs rnams bskor zhing slar yang de ru 'bab/ /'dod pa'i sems kyis bstan pa'i rjes bcad kyang / /dang po'i sems nyid gnyug ma nyid du

'bab/ /rkyen gyis mi 'gul re ba'i yi chad pa/ /dogs pa'i skugs sa zhigs pas rdo rje sems/ /rtsa ba chod pa'i sems nyid nam mkha' 'dra/ /sgom du med pas yid la mi bya ste/ /tha mal shes pa rang lugs gnyug ma la/ /bcos ma'i dmigs

pa dag gis mi bslad de/ /rang bzhin dag pa'i sems la bcos mi dgos/ /ma bzung ma btang rang dga' nyid du zhog /gal te ma rtogs blo la sgom rgyu med/ /rtogs pa can la bsgom bya sgom byed med/ /ji ltar nam mkhas nam mkha' dmigs su med/ /

de ltar stong pas stong pa sgom du med/ /gnyis med shes pas chu dang 'o ma ltar/ /sna tshogs ro gcig bde chen rgyun chad med/ /'di ltar dus gsum rnam pa thams cad du/ /yid la bya ba med cing ma bral gnyug ma'i ngang / /de nyid skyong la sgom zhes tha snyad gdags/ /

rlung ni mi bzung yid ni mi bcing bar/ /ma bcos shes pa bu chung lta bur zhog /dran rtog byung na de nyid rang la ltos/ /chu dang rlabs gnyis tha dad ma rtogs shig /yid la mi byed phyag rgya chen po la/ /sgom rgyu rdul tsam med pas mi bsgom ste/ /sgom med don dang

'bral med sgom pa'i mchog /gnyis med lhan cig bde ba chen po'i ro/ /ji ltar chu la chu gzhag ro gcig ltar/ /ji bzhin ngang du de bzhin gnas pa'i tshe/ /dmigs 'dzin zhen pa'i yid ni rab tu zhi/ /kye ho/ /gnyis med gnyug ma'i rnal 'byor gang de la/ /

spang dang blang ba'i dngos po ci zhig yod/ /ngas ni chos kun ma btang bas/ /bu khyod 'di gyis bya ba mi smra'o/ /ji ltar nor bu de dngos med pa ltar/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa de dngos med pa ste/ /'du byed sna tshogs cal col gang smras kyang / /rnal 'byor blo ni gcig

las mi 'da'o/ /gcig nyid na ni gcig kyang yod min pas/ /rnam pa sna tshogs rtsa ba bral gyur te/ /smyon pa bzhin du rtsis med yan pa la/ /byar med spyod pa bu chung bzhin du gnas/ /e ma/ srid pa'i 'dam skyes pad+ma lta bu'i sems/ /nyes pa gang gi

gang la gos pa med/ /za zhing 'thung la gnyis sprod bde ba dang / /gal te lus sems rab tu gdungs gyur dang / /rnam pa sna tshogs gang la spyod gyur pa/ /gang gis ma bcings ma grol gos ba med/ /rtogs pa'i rang spyod rtsis med dang de nas/ /rmongs

pa'i 'gro ba nyam thag mngon gyur tshe/ /mi bzod snying rje'i shugs kyis mchi ma 'byung / /bdag gzhan bzlog nas phan pa nyid la 'jug /don la brtags na dmigs pa gsum bral bas/ /yang dag ma yin rmi lam sgyu 'dra ste/ /chags thogs

bral bas dka' zhing skye med pa/ /sgyu ma mkhas pa sgyu ma'i don byed mtshungs/ /gdod nas dag pa nam mkha'i rang bzhin la/ /spangs dang thob pa'i dngos po 'ga' yang med/ /yid la byar med phyag rgya chen po ni/ /'bras bu gang du'ang re ba ma byed cig /re ba'i sems

ni gdod nas ma skyes pas/ /spangs dang thob pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod/ /gal te gang gis thob pa'i dngos po ci zhig yod/ /gal te gang gis thob pa'i dngos yod na/ /bstan pa'i phyag rgya rnam bzhis ci zhig byed/ /ji ltar ri dgas 'khrul pas gdungs pa yis/ /

smig rgyu'i chu la rab tu brgyug pa ltar/ /rmongs pa gang zhig 'dod pas rab gdungs pas/ /ji ltar 'bad kyang slar ni ring bar 'gyur/ /ye nas ma skyes rang bzhin rnam dag pas/ /de las khyad par cung zad yod min te/ /btags pa'i yid ni dbyings su

dag gyur pa/ /de la rdo rje 'chang zhes btags pa tsam/ /ji ltar e thang skam po'i smig rgyu dag /chur snang chu ni gnyis su med pa ltar/ /bzod nas dag pa btags pa'i yid sangs pa/ /de la rtag chad gnyis su brjod du med/ /yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam

shing bzhin du/ /smon lam dbang gis re ba yongs skong ba/ /de yang 'jig rten tha snyad kun rdzob ste/ /dam pa'i don du 'ga' yang don ma yin/ /do ha mdzod ces bya ba phyag rgya chen po'i man ngag dpal ri khrod pa chen po sa ra ha'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //

rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI bai ro tsa na rak+Shi tas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /dwa da sha u pa de sha gA thA/ bod skad du/ man ngag gi tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /byang chub sems ni

zhi ba ste/ /de la gnas pa gang yin pa/ /nam mkha' bzhin du zhi bar 'gyur/ /lus ngag yid las byung ba yi/ /de la cung zad 'gyur ba med/ /yang dag ye shes las 'das pa/ /rnam par mi rtog zhi bar 'gyur/ /rtog pa zhi ba sangs rgyas nyid/ /de nyid

rnam pa mkhyen nyid do/ /dngos po dngos po mthong nas ni/ /de ltar rnam rtog gang byung ba/ /de ni rtog med ye shes yin/ /'gro ba tha dad 'dzin phyir ro/ /dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin no/ /thams cad du ni so sor gnas/ /de dag la ni khyad par du/ /nga rgyal med

cing rmongs pa med/ /de phyogs phyogs gcig dngos po la/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa ji ltar yin/ /dud 'gro la sogs rang bzhin no/ /phyogs gcig tsam las gang byung ba/ /de yi ngo bor bshad par bya/ /yang dag sems kyis gzung bar byos/ /stag ni phug na

gnas pa dang / /sbal pa stong pa chen po dang / /byi la ba spu ldang ba dang / /ba lang la sogs lus po sprug /sbrul la bza' ba med pa dang / /bya rnams mkha' la 'gro ba dang / /srin bu me khyer 'od 'phro dang / /rnga mos sbrul rnams 'gugs pa dang / /rma bya skom

las rgyal ba dang / /bung bas dug rnams zos pa dang / /chu byas dbang po bsdams pa dang / /seng ge 'jigs pa med pa dang / /'ug pas mtshan mo mthong ba dang / /bya rgod rin chen rtogs pa dang / /sbrul gyi dug ni byed pa dang / /rma byas dug rnams za ba

dang / /ngur pas ma 'ongs shes pa dang / /ni tsho tshig la mkhas pa dang / /sbrang bus rjes rnams sdud pa dang / /dud 'gro la sogs rang rig 'gro/ /ngang pas chu dang 'o ma 'byed/ /bung ba'i skad ni shin du snyan/ /chu skyar mchil mas sems can 'dzin/ /sbrul gyi

mig gis thos pa dang / /ri dgas las ni gla rtsi 'byung / /gu na sa ni mig gis snom/ /chu yi nang na gnas pa'i nya/ /srog dang rtsol bas 'gog par byed/ /tshul ngan bzlas pa bram ze yis/ /ye shes mchog tu thal bar 'gyur/ /stag la sogs pa'i

srog chags kun/ /snga ma'i bag chags las byung ba'i/ /rang bzhin yon tan 'byung bar 'gyur/ /de dag 'jig rten ye shes can/ /dka' thub ma yin grol ba min/ /snga ma'i bag chags las byung ba'i/ /de dag so sor gnas pa yin/ /de tsam

ye shes yin na ni/ /dud 'gro rnams kyang grol bar 'gyur/ /de ltar shes te zhen spangs nas/ /yang dag ye shes spyad par bya/ /gang gis byang chub dam pa dag /dngos grub dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ /man ngag gi tshigs su bcad pa bcu gnyis pa bram ze chen pos

ra ha'i zhal nas gsungs pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /swa a d+hiSh+ThA na kra ma/ bod skad du/ rang byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i cha'i khyad par bstan pas sprul

pa sgyu ma'i bdag /dpal ldan rdo rje sgeg mo nyid la lhag par rol pa'i ro gang ci yang rung / /rdo rje bdud rtsi dpal ldan gang la gang gis bstod pa de lta'ang 'khrul pa'i rang bzhin na/ /ji ltar brjod pa 'di las gzhan su bcom ldan de la kun nas phyag 'tshal

lo/ /gang yang mngon dga'i rgyal ba'i sku mdzes gcig pu nyid/ /su yang mkhas rnams snying gar gnyid sad mi 'gyur ba/ /gang zhig shar bas mnyam pa'i dus na dbang po dang / /yul rnams bcas pa nub pa de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang la spros pa dpal ldan

bde ba'i rang bzhin rdo rje'i mtshon 'dzin cing / /gang zhig cha byad spros bral dri med shes rab rang bzhin kun du 'gro/ /dpag bsam lcug mas mngon mtshungs gnas gsum nyon mongs dra ba gcod pa gang / /dpal ldan rdo rje tshig mtshan btsun mo de la kun nas phyag 'tshal

lo/ /gang zhig rdo rje yan lag ma zhes kun nas dran pas kyang / /nyon mongs bral ba'i bde ba 'ba' zhig sar ni bde 'gro ba/ /de la mi phyed gus pa'i khur gyi lcid kyis mgrin smad nas/ /de yi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i rdul la spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gis bka'

drin zer gyis spros pa bdag gis de nyid ni/ /rin chen 'od kyis bskor bas mun pa'i tshogs ni rab bcom zhing / /rnyog med mig gis rang gi rnam par rol pa ring mthong ba'i/ /bla ma rnam par snang byed de la yang dag 'dud/ /gang zhig srid pa dang ni zhi gnas

'gram du dga' ba rgyu mthun 'bab/ /ye shes nam mkha'i chu bos yid rgyas dpal ldan bla ma gsum pa nyid/ /dpal ldan rdo rje sgeg mo btsun mo'i tshogs rnams shes rab pha rol phyin rang bzhin/ /gang zhig gnas gsum ston pa gcig pu dam pa'i dbang phyug

dam pa'i sems la bdag skyabs mchi/ /gang gi sems ni mnyam pa nyid kyi yul du 'jog cing dug 'dra ba'i/ /'khor ba bcud kyis len gyi rnam par mdzad pa rang dbang sngags 'dra ba/ /gang gi sa ste dbang po'i blo yis min 'gro gsum khang chung gi/ /dri ma

'khrud nas gcig pu bla ma dam pa'i ngag la phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang gang dran par yang dag gnas pas snying ga pad+ma'i mdud pa ni/ /dbugs 'byin grol bar sbyor ba'i bla ma'i bka' lung de nges ni/ /nyi phyed 'od 'dra'i tshogs kyis gnas gsum khang bu'i

mun 'joms shing / /rmongs dang 'gal la bdag ni dul bar bcas pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul 'di cung zad dran pa yi/ /yon tan spros pa yongs su gyur pas dpal ldan pa/ /mi bde ba yi bdag nyid kyang ni mchog bde bar/ /gal te

grub na 'di las bsgrub bya gzhan med do/ /bdag ni bla ma'i zhabs kyi rdul la gus dang ldan pas rga shi dang / /nad dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs mda' 'dra'i zug rngu'i tshogs 'dis ngal ba med/ /lus can rnams la ye shes bdud rtsi skal ba ma bgos mi nus pas/ /

gang zhig bdag gis spyad pa de ni yongs su gdung ba che/ /blo yi yul min des na gang gi spyod yul min/ /gzhi yi gtam gyi rim pa bla mas gsungs pa ring / /de yi rim pas snying rje la sogs yon tan dag /dad ldan rnams la snying gi gnas su rang nyid skye/ /

dngos po 'di kun gcig pa dang / /du ma'i rang bzhin cha bral te/ /'di ni zhen pa'i sbyor bral bas/ /rtsol ba'i rnal 'byor rnam par 'gyur/ /spu langs myu gu'i tshogs kyis rab dga' yi/ /mchi mas mig gang rdzi ma bkrus nas su/ /

ches bstan gus pa'i khur gyis mgo 'dzin ni/ /dpag bsam bla ma dam pa la 'dud do/ /gsal bar spyi bor lag sngar cung zad byed/ /rab dga' bcas pas nor 'dzin yan lag 'khyud/ /yang dag gus pa'i skud pas yid kyi me tog ni/ /mdud par

brgyus pa'i bdag gi phreng ba 'di bzhes shig /mgon po khyod kyi bka' gnad nyung 'dus shes rab ni/ /rgyal po'i bu mo cha las mkhas 'dra dbang du byed/ /'gro ba rnams kyi rang bzhin rol pa'i ro yi bde ba ni/ /'ba' zhig rjes su myong ba de ni yid gcig

bsod nams can/ /lang tsho'i snying rjes brlan pas khyod kyis sngon med lam gsungs pa/ /'gro ba bgrod bya med dang 'gro med ces bya ngo mtshar che/ /gang du gom pa bor ba tsam gyis mnyam med bde ba'i rgyun bcas pa/ /gang tshe srid dang zhi ba cung zad tha

dad ma mthong ngo / /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug dpal sa ra ha chen pos mdzad pa bdag byin gyis brlab pa grub pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po pa shAn+ta b+ha dra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos 'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan

la phab pa'o//[ ]###/ /rgya gar skad du/ /tata twa u pa de sha shi kha ra do ha gI ha nA ma/ bod skad du/ de kho na nyid kyi man ngag rtse mo do ha'i glu zhes bya ba/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma g.yos sku gsung thugs kyi rang

bzhin la/ /rdo rje rtse mo cig car glu blangs don/ /gang tshe lhan cig skyes pa dag /go ba dgu yis rtogs par bya/ /rgyu mtshan gzhal bya la sogs med/ /dngos po rnams kyi kho na nyid/ /dgag dang sgrub pa med pa ste/ /dbye ba la sogs med par

bshad/ /mi mthun phyogs rnams gnyen po med/ /'chal pa'i tshul khrims ser sna dang / /le lo khong khro rnam par g.yeng / /ma rig spang bya la sogs dang / /spong byed pha rol phyin pa med/ /dngos kun med par bshad pa ste/ /rtog med snyam sems kun

dang bral/ /'khor ba las gzhan phyag rgya che/ /gcig kyang phog par ma bshad gang / /de nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lam/ /'dod yon la sogs ma smad pas/ /'bras bu re ba med pa ste/ /sku gsum lam gyi ngo bo gang / /ci phyir zhe na mi rtog ste/ /

kho na nyid ni ji ltar rtogs/ /gzhan la mi re gang gis phar/ /rin chen gter dang rgyal po'i dkor/ /phal pa yi ni bang mdzod bzhin/ /mchog tu gces pa rang la gnas/ /sems las ma gtogs phyi rol don/ /gcig kyang yod par ma bshad de/ /

sems nyid kun du 'od gsal ba'o/ /de bas sems las gzhan pa'i chos/ /yang dag par ni brtags na med/ /dngos kun zung 'jug rang bzhin la/ /skye ba'i rang bzhin yod ma yin/ /ngo bo ma skyes stong pa gang / /gzhan na yod pa ma yin te/ /

gnyis dang yod med tha snyad bral/ /gcig dang du ma la sogs kyis/ /brtags na med pa ma yin te/ /yod pa ma yin med ma yin/ /rigs pas 'grub pa ma yin no/ /dngos por snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /ngo bo nyid las ma 'das te/ /rgya mtsho

gzugs brnyan me long bzhin/ /dran med dbyings nas kun 'byung bas/ /rang bzhin nyid du dus der rig /gnyis med gnyis su med min pas/ /ma 'das dbyer med ro gcig la/ /gcig tu gzhag par bya ba'ang med/ /dngas ma de nyid ma bslad pa'i/ /

kho na nyid kyis gar ma g.yos/ /kho na nyid kyi shes pa la/ /'dzin pa med de ngo bo bral/ /cir yang mi 'dzin chos kyi sku/ /ngo bo nyid la dbye ba med/ /'dzin pa'i cha nas brtags pa gang / /skye med dbyings kyi rang bzhin la/ /zung du 'jug pas tha mi dad/ /

sgro skur bral bas gnyug mar bshad/ /gzhal yas khang dang mtshan dpe dang / /sna tshogs sprul sku gang ston pa/ /gdul bya lam la zhugs pa'i stobs/ /mda' bsnun dag gis gang smras pa/ /'di la dmigs su rdul tsam med/ /

phyin ci log gi skye bo la/ /nyon mongs yul gyi dug 'gyur te/ /ji ltar snang ba'i rim pa yis/ /dbyer med tshul du gnas pa ste/ /'od gsal ba nyid rnam par bshad/ /rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo bral/ /tha dad ma yin gnyis su med/ /khams

gsum blo 'das ye shes la/ /'di zhes bya ba'i ming ngam brda/ /mda' bsnun dag gis gzung du med/ /dbyer med ro gcig ma rtogs na/ /gnyis su snang ba'i chos rnams kyis/ /gal te bskal par rnyed mi 'gyur/ /mchog gi go 'phang mi

'thob ste/ /kho na nyid kyi rang bzhin la/ /dgag dang sgrub pa ngang gis bral/ /gnyis med dang las ma g.yos pas/ /gang 'dir yid kyi ye shes ni/ /gcig kyang bral ba ma yin no/ /lhan cig skyes gang bde ba'i ro/ /rgyun mi 'chad pa'i bdag nyid de/ /

chu bo'i rgyun dang nam mkha' bzhin/ /mi 'gyur dus rnams kun du gnas/ /rtog pa'i rjes 'brangs mtshan ma'i blos/ /nam yang shes pa ma yin no/ /bsam med yul la brtag tu med/ /yul med bsgom par ga las 'gyur/ /bsgom med

nyid kyang yod ma yin/ /dpe yi don la gang dris pa/ /sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs la'ang mnyam/ /bro gar glu dang rol mo yis/ /phyogs rnams kun du sgra sgrogs shing / /rnal 'byor mas ni g.yon nas bskor/ /dmigs gtad bral ba'i rang bzhin

gyis/ /'bad pa med par kun du spyad/ /gnyis su snang ba'i rtog pa thams cad bcom gyur nas/ /brjod med rnam med 'bras bu thob 'gyur shog/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal sa ra ha'i zhal nas gsungs pa/ phyag rgya chen po de kho na nyid

rtse mo do ha'i glu zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //kr-iSh+Na paN+Di tas rang 'gyur du mdzad pa'o// @#/ /dngos po sbyong ba zhes bya ba/[# #]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ba sany+tsar nA ma/ bod skad du/ dngos po sbyong ba zhes bya ba/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dngos po med la dngos

por shes/ /dngos med skye ba yod ma yin/ /rtag tu skye ba dngos po nyid/ /dngos 'khrul nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/ /mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams ni/ /skye ba mkha' dang mnyam nyid mchog /thams cad rang bzhin gyis mkha' mnyam/ /des na srid

pa dam pa'i dngos/ /rgyu med 'bras bu med pa ste/ /las kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin/ /'jig rten pa med 'jig rten med/ /'di dag thams cad bden ma yin/ /ma skyes pas ni dngos po gang / /ji ltar gzhan las shes par 'gyur/ /mo gsham gyi ni

bu nyid kyang / /de tshe skye bar 'gyur ma yin/ /'jig rten gzod nas ma skyes te/ /gang gis kyang ni sprul ma yin/ /don med 'khrul pa'i 'jig rten 'di/ /zla ba bzang po'i grong khyer bzhin/ /'jig rten rnam par rtog las 'byung / /rnam rtog sems

las byung ba ste/ /gang phyir lus las sems byung bas/ /de phyir lus la rnam par brtag /gzugs stong tshor ba rang bzhin med/ /'du shes med cing 'du byed med/ /sems byung med cing dngos po med/ /de phyir mi rtog rang bzhin no/ /des na sems

min chos kyang min/ /lus min khams la sogs pa min/ /gnyis su med pa'i lam 'di ni/ /de nyid rig pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /dmigs pa med pa'i chos 'di kun/ /dmigs pa med par rab tu bstan/ /dmigs pa med pa'i blo byas na/ /dmigs

pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus/ /bsam gtan las byung bsten par bya/ /dus mi ring ba nyid na ni/ /bla med byang chub thob par 'gyur/ /shes rab thabs la gnas gyur pas/ /sems can kun la brtse bar bya/ /

thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang mchog /lha nyid dus mi ring bar 'thob/ /'di dag thams cad ming tsam ste/ /tha snyad tsam du rab tu 'jug /dngos po med la tha dad pa'i/ /brjod bya yod pa ma yin te/ /bdag nyid gang dang gang

gis ni/ /chos rnams gang dang gang brtags pa/ /de ni de la yod min te/ /chos rnams kyi ni chos nyid de/ /ming gis ming nyid stong pas na/ /ming la ming ni yod ma yin/ /chos rnams thams cad ming med pas/ /ming ni btags pa tsam nyid do/ /

mi bden par gyur chos 'di dag /brtags pa nyid du rab tu 'jug /gang la brtags pa de med na/ /stong pa nyid du brtags pa gang / /mig gis mthong ba'i gzugs rnams ni/ /de nyid rig pa zhes de bshad/ /'jig rten log pa'i nga rgyal can/ /kun rdzob

bden pa zhes 'dir 'jog /gang du tshogs pa'i rkyen mthong ba/ /'dren pa gsal bar gyur pa yin/ /blo dang ldan pas don dam la/ /brtags te grags pa nges par mthong / /gzugs ni mig gis mi mthong zhing / /yid kyis chos rnams mi rig

pa/ /'di ni mchog tu bden pa ste/ /'jig rten gang gis kyang mi shes/ /dngos po sbyong ba zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra pA Ni dang / /bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ban chos

'bar gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//[# #]@##/ /slob dpon klu sgrub snying po'i zhal snga nas/ /re ba'i dpe ni ser skya 'dra/ /dog pa rgyal bu gzhon nu ste/ /gzhan du 'dzin pa smig rgyu chu/ /bdag 'dzin phung byed nyi zer gzugs/ /

snang ba gnyis ldan ne tso'i bya/ /dor ba thur ma 'khrul pa'i gzugs/ /lta bas nga rgyal chos kyi wa/ /sgom la der 'dzin a nu lta/ /spyod pas nga rgyal 'dzin na pa/ /dka' bas rlom sems bzang skyong bu/ /dbang gi bu grol 'dod kos la/ /

rtogs pas chog zer dpal gyi bu/ /bla ma bla bral bla med gang+gA mo/ /bka' la skur 'debs kr-iSh+Na pa/ /bde bas grub 'dod thangs bzangs glu / /stong pas de bzhin gdol pa dza / /de rnams bral ba'i shes pa ni/ /nor bu rin chen thob pa 'dra/ /sngon

yul wA rA Na sIr khyim bdag pra mo ha dang / /ser skya mo gru spyan mo gnyis/ /chu bo nai rany+dza na'i 'gram ne'u sing pos ngad can du dus byas pa las/ mos nyin mtshan lnga zhig tu bsdad kyang 'ongs par ma gyur to/ /de nas yi mug ste ma'i drung du phyin pa dang /

mas smras pa/ kye bu mo mdangs rab tu zhum par gyur pa ci'i phyir zhes pa dang / bu mos smras pa/ kye mtshan mo gnyis dang gnyis gsum bar/ /khyim bdag gzhon nu la bsdad pas/ /yid gdungs pas ni yi chad gyur/ /zas dang bral ba lto ba

ltogs/ /zhes zer ba la/ mas 'bras chan pa na li gang byin pas/ /myur du zos pas glo ba'i sul du song nas mgo 'khrugs so/ /de nas sman pa bshes gnyen chen po la bltas pa dang / /'di dag ni tshul ji lta bu yin zhes pa dang / gong gi tshul bshad

do/ /sman pas smras pa/ gang gis gang la re ba ni/ /zhi bar mi 'gyur bder mi 'gyur/ /sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'phel ba ste/ /re ba med pas bde ba'i mchog /'di dag ni re bas phung bar 'gyur ba bstan pa ste/ re ba med par bya ba'i man ngag

ste dang po'o// //sngon gyi dus na rgyal bu mgron bzangs zhes bya ba zhig la/ yab thu bo'i stobs kyi rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur te/ kye rgyal bu sgo srung la nan tan gyis shig khri gzhan la ma shor bar bya ba la brtson par gyis shig ces

smras nas tshe'i dus byas par gyur to/ /de nas chos sbyin byed pa'i dus su bram ze mdun na 'gro rgyal po'i pho brang du byung ba la khri phrogs kyis dogs te langs nas sgor bya ba la phyin pa dang / nu bo 'gro bas rten pas khri phrogs so/ /de nas ser skya mas/

khyod 'o na 'bad par 'gyur ba ci'i phyir zhes pa dang / rgyal po nas babs kyis smras pa/ bdag la yab kyis gdams pa bzhin/ /khri stan shor gyis dogs pa na/ /sgo yi bya ba la phyin pas/ /nu bos bdag gis bde ba

phrogs/ /zhes pa dang bram zes smras pa/ dogs pa dang bcas sems kyis bde mi rnyed/ /nyam nga dang bcas rtag tu bde mi 'gyur/ /gang la dogs yod de 'jig yod pa'i phyir/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis dogs pa spang bar bya/ /dog pa dang

bral bar bya ba'i man ngag ste gnyis pa'o// //sngon ri bya rkang la/ dge slong sog ma med kyis phyin pa dang / rab tu skom gyis gdungs par gyur pa la/ smig rgyu zhig chu ru 'khrul te/ 'thung du phyin pa dang / rab tu ngal bar gyur nas sngo'i

ldum bu za zhing 'dug pa la/ drang srong rkang mig gis smras pa/ bgrod dka' 'khor ba'i thang chen la/ /gzhan du btsal 'dod mi dag ni/ /nyon mongs tho bas gdungs 'gyur te/ /skom pa smig rgyu'i chu 'tshol 'dra/ /zhes so/ /de dag ni bsgom bya

spang par bya ba'i man ngag ste gsum pa'o// //sngon rgyal po brla skyes la/ btsun mo lnga brgya la bu stong yod de/ sras nam ga ru drang srong dpal dga' mo bslangs te/ /de gcig bu med pas rab tu gces par byas/ rgyal bu yang bdag la ni gces pa

med de/ bdag la ni sdug bsngal zug rngu cung zad tsam yang byung bar phangs pas/ bdag tshe'i dus byas na 'khor thams cad phung bar 'gyur ro snyam sems so/ /de nas nang par zhig khrus byas te/ khang bzangs kyi rtse mor kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ nyi zer

la mig cung zad btsums nas bsdad pa dang / nyi zer gyi gya gyu la dur khrod byung bar mthong nas/ bdag la dri mas gos par 'gyur snyam nas bros pa dang / khang bzangs kyi rtse mo nas ltung ste/ tshe'i dus byas so/ /de nas dge bsnyen blo gros bzang pos smras

pa/ bdag tu 'dzin pa ches pas sdug bsngal 'byung ba ste/ /bdag bde 'dod pas gzhan gyis gnod pa byung / /bdag tu 'dzin pa yongs su dor byas nas/ /sems can kun kyang sman pa bzhin du bya/ /bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bral bar bya ba'i man ngag

ste bzhi ba'o// //sngon dze ta'i tshal du rgyal bu don thams cad grub pa dang / bdud nag po lha sbyin gnyis bya ne tso'i lus gcig las/ mgo bo gnyis su gyes pa cig tu skyes par gyur to/ /de nas lha sbyin mgo bo gnyid log pa'i dus su/ don

grub kyis shing gi rtsa ba srog pa dang / sman yang smra dang / dug ha la gnyis rnyed pa la/ bcud ni mnyam por phan ro ni bdag rang myang ngo / /zhes nas sman zos pa dang / bdud lha sbyin sman gyi sgregs pa byung ngo / /de nas rab tu khros pas lha sbyin gyis dug

zos pas gnyis ka phung bar gyur to/ /de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de nyid mthong ba'i mkhas pa yis/ /sman lha'i bsod nams mi bslang zhing / /dug lta mi mthun dor mi bya/ /blang dang dor bas phung bar 'gyur/ /blang dor dang bral

bar bya ba'i man ngag ste lnga pa'o// //sngon grong khyer ser skyar bram ze nyi ma sbyin zhes bya ba la/ rims nad sel bar nus pa'i/ nor bu chen po mu sa ra ga la ba zhes bya ba yod de/ khyim bdag de la khyim thab gnyis yod pa las/ gnyis ka la bu

med par gyur nas/ grong khyer bde ba can du khyim bdag mo sa man+ta zhes bya ba dang / 'dod pa'i dus btab nas phyin pa dang / sngar gyi khyim bdag mo gnyis phyi bzhin du byung bar gyur to/ /de nas shing sdong po rul pa cig gi khong du gab bo/ /de nas khyim thab

gnyis phyir log pa dang / khyim thab mos man+ta dang sprad nas nyal po byas pa dang / khyim bdag gi mgo'i cod pan la gser gyi thur ma gnyis gyen du 'greng ba la/ mig yor gyi mi gnyis su 'khrul te bram ze la smras pa/ kye bzhin bzangs 'o skol ni mi gnyis

kyis nye ba nyid du non nas gda'o zhes pa dang / bram ze la smras pa/ de ni nga'i khyim bdag mo gnyis lags te/ 'o skol gyi spyod lam rgyal po la smras na/ nges par chad pa gcod par gyur pas sa phyogs gzhan zhig tu bros la gshegs

so zhes na/ /na dpe'i tshal du phyin pa dang / /thur ma yin par ngo shes te sa man+ta rab tu 'khrul pa la 'gyod pas smras pa dang / /khyim bdag mo sa man+tas glu blangs pa/ 'o skol mi yis skrag nas bros pa dang / /'khor ba dor bar 'dod na sgrub pa 'dis/ /dang

po gzhi stong pa nyid nas sdug bsngal byung ste/ gnyis med la gnyis su brtags pas gdungs par 'gyur/ /blang dor dang bral bar bya ba'i man ngag ste drug pa'o// //sngon mi yul ma ga d+ha na tshos ma ko'u ri ma zhes bya ba grong khyer gyi mtha'i spyil po

cig na/ ngur smrig gi tshos blugs pa'i bur snod cig gi nang du kha shing los bcad de/ mo rang gi me tog thur phyin pa dang / dur khrod kyi wa cig gis tshos kyi steng du phyin pas sdib ste/ lus tshos kyi mdog gis sbangs so/ /dur khrod du phyin pa dang / spyang ki

dang phrad nas/ kye che zhe mchog tu gyur pa khyed su yin zhes pa la/ mo na re bdag ni lha'i ri dgas sha ra na zhes bya ba yin te/ lus dri dang mdog tu ldan pa'o/ /de nas dom dang stag dang spre'u dang / seng ge rnams la spyang kis ched du brjod pas kun kyang

'khor gyur to/ /de nas zla ba rgyas pa nya'i dus su ma'i drung du phyin te/ nga ni mchog go/ /bla na med pa'o/ /phul lo/ /ri dgas kyi rje mor gyur pa'o/ /zhes pa las/ mas smras pa/ kye bu mo/ /tshad ma'i chu las khrus byas nas/ /dman pa'i sa la gnas na

bde/ /rgyud ngan lpags pas nga rgyal ba/ /yun du 'grogs na phung bar nges/ /zhes brjod pa la/ pags pa'i nga rgyal gtong du ma btub pa'o / /de nas log ste gcan gzan gyi tshogs su phyin pa dang / rang gis skad btang bas war gyur cing / seng ge'i skad

btang bas brgyal lo/ /de nas ri dgas gcan gzan thams cad kyi spu tshom pa re btogs te rtug pa dang bsres so/ /de nas lha'i bu rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ sems kyis stobs kyis mi 'gro zhing / /pags pas nga rgyal 'gro byed

pa/ /rgyun du bde bar ma gyur te/ /spu dang bral bas wa nyid phung / /bde bas 'bras bu bsgrubs pa la/ /zhe 'dod med pas mi 'gro zhing / /grub mtha' nga rgyal 'gro byed pa/ /lnga bzhin thal bar brlag par 'gyur/ /rang gi lta ba nga rgyal ba dang bral bar bya ba ste

bdun pa'o// //sngon ko sa la'i yul du/ dge slong ya shu ha zhes bya ba cig gis/ tshogs drug 'gegs pa'i bsam gtan byas pa las rlung 'byung 'jug 'pho ba dang bral bas lo lnga brgya rnyed thub po/ /de nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po

dga' sbyangs mdangs kyis smras pa/ dge slong khyod kyis sems la ltos/ /shes rab pha rol phyin drug ma/ /tsam du mi gnas 'di sgoms la/ /'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thong / /zhes pa la don la slar skur ba btab nas sngar gyi 'du shes

med pa la zhen pas/ lha tshe ring por skyes so/ /de nas mtha' 'khob rgyal por skyes so/ /de nas yang skye ba dran pas bstan pa la skur pa btab nas/ sngar gyi 'du shes med pa la zhen pas/ lha tshe ring por skyes so/ /de nas yang skye ba dran pas bstan pa la

skur pa btab pa dang / dngos su sas thongs phye nas/ mnar med pa'i dmyal bar song / de dag ni sgom pa dmigs pa dang bral bar bya ba ste brgyad pa'o// //sngon bram ze 'dzin na pa zhes bya ba bsil khang na nyal ba'i rmi lam na/ rigs kyi bu

gtsang ma'i spyod pa long cig las byang chub mchog tu bskyed nas/ shes rab dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni mchog ma yin no/ /pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming tsam yang mi thob po/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'i phyir ro/

zhes brjod kyang mngon pa'i zhen pa dang ma bral lo/ /de bdud dga' rab dbang phyug gis byin gyis brlabs nas/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bde ba thob ste/ slar ngan song du lhung ngo / /spyod pa'i zhen pa dang bral bar bya ba ste dgu pa'o/ /

sngon rgyal po bzang skyong bya ba'i bu mos/ dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo zhes bya ba la/ lus ngag yid gsum longs spyod kyi sgo nas/ lo drug tu bsnyen bkur byas so/ /tshogs kyi lam rtags bcu gsum dang ldan pa'i spyod pa bcu phrag gnyis su

byas so/ /dus ji snyed du thos pa yang de snyed du sbyangs pa las/ dge slong ma dpal mo zhes bya bas smras pa/ kye bdag gis 'khor ba thams cad kyi snying po/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i de kho na nyid khyod la sbyin gyi/ khyod 'khor ba'i dogs pa las yongs

su grol bar 'gyur ro zhes pa dang / bu mos smras pa/ kye dge slong ma snga ma'i dga' ba de rnams kyi 'bras bu mchog go/ /de las mchog tu gyur pa'i 'bras bu ni mi 'byung ba'i phyir/ kho mo mi 'dod do zhes pa dang / dpal mos smras pa/ chos kyi gsung

nyid mi shes par/ /'bras bu 'dod pa'i dka' thub dag /rgyal po dag gi pho nya bzhin/ /dka' bas mang yang don chung 'gyur/ /dka' bas mang po byas pas chog par 'dzin par bya ba ste bcu pa'o// //dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud las/ dpal

mchog dang po dbang las 'byung / /lus ngag yid kyi tha ba dag /dbang gis rab tu smin byas na/ /dpal mchog dang po thob par 'gyur/ /zhes bya ba la rgyal po ko sa las mthong nas/ rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti la/ dbang lan bcu bdun du byas so/ /de

nas rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti / kye rgyal po dam pa ni sa bon lta bu'o/ /rgyun du goms pa ni chu lud kyis myu gu skyed pa lta bu'o/ /spyod pa ni lo tog 'os su rung bar byed pa lta bu'o/ /des na rgyal po chen po sgom pa goms par bya bar rigs so zhes brjod kyang /

sngar gyi lung gis nges par kha lo sgyur du ma btub po/ /der mkha' 'gro mas tshigs su bcad pa smras pa/ dbang gis ye shes mtshon byas shing / /'os su rung bar byar 'dod kyang / /goms bral chu shing 'bras bu ltar/ /lan cig skyed na zad 'gyur

nyid/ /zhes pa'i phyir na goms par bya'o/ /dbang kho nas chog par 'dzin pa dang bral bar bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// //dpal DoM bi he ru ka'i slob ma shrI sing nga zhes bya ba zhig gis/ mkha' 'gro ma dang / rnal 'byor pa pho mo tshogs kyi 'khor lo

tshogs pa'i dus su smras pa/ chos rnams stong par rtogs pa yis/ /de yi mtha' la sgom du med/ /gal te sgom na dman 'gyur te/ /dper na rgyal po rgyal por ni/ /slar yang 'dod pa med pa bzhin/ /bud+d+ha thams cad stong pa nyid du gcig par

rtogs nas sgom mi dgos/ sgom sogs sbyin sreg thal ba 'dra/ /zhes pa/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyis/ kye bud+d+ha'i gsang ba yongs su 'phrogs par byed pa'i log sred can khyod nyon cig /tshes gcig gi zla ba mthong bas/ nya gang ba yin

nam byis pa btsas thog nas stobs rdzogs pa nyid dam/ sa bon btab pa nyid nas 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa nyid dam/ rgya mtsho nang gi nor bu mthong bas lag tu yod pa nyid dam/ sems bskyed pa tsam gyis sems can gyi don nus pa nyid dam/ zas

mthong ba tsam gyis bkres pa sos pa nyid dam/ ma rig pa'i phyir/ rtogs pa'i gtso bo la gags goms pa'i 'khor gyis mnyes par bya na/ zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'o/ /rtogs pas chog par 'dzin pa ni srun pa'o/ /phyi rol pa'o/ /

bdud kyis mngon sum du byin gyis brlabs pa'o/ /rang nyid phung bar byas pa'o/ /zhes nas bsad de mkha' 'gro ma'i longs spyod du byas so/ /rtogs pas chog par 'dzin pa dang bral bar bya ba ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //rgyal po d+harma pA la'i

bu mo gang+gA mo zhes bya ba zhig gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo rgyud thams cad bltas pa las/ rtogs pa ji lta ba skyes te bsgoms so/ /de nas byang chub chen po la srin pos mchod pa'i nub mo/rnal 'byor pa thams cad

tshogs kyi 'khor lo byed pa'i sar gang+gAs phyin pa dang / rnal 'byor pa thams cad mkha' 'gro mas byin gyis brlabs nas/ lus 'degs so/ /ngag gis spro ba byas so/ /yid kyis kun du zhe sdang bar byas so/ /de nas gang+gA mo'i sngar gyi rtogs pa

med par gyur nas/ rnal 'byor pa rnams la smras pa/ kye bdag gis 'os su ma rung ba ci byas pa/ khyed kyis bshad du gsol zhes pa dang / rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gsung mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ bla ma las ni dngos grub rnyed/ /rig ma las

ni bde ba 'byung / /bla ma bral ba'i dngos grub ni/ /khri phrag 'bad kyang thob mi 'gyur/ /gzhan gyis dngos grub 'byung byed pa/ /dug dang bcas pa'i zas bzhin no/ /mkha' 'gro kun gyis 'tshe ba dang / /bar chad sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/ /

zhes bya bas dad par byas so/ /bla ma la ma ltos pa spang bar bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o// //karna'i rgyal po'i bu kr-iSh+Na zhes bya bas/ dbu ma mchog tu byas te/ bka' dang bstan bcos thams cad la skur pa btab pa dang / byang phyogs kyi

gnod byin gyis bzung nas/ smyo bar gyur te/ de nas yab rgyal pos sngags mkhan rnams la zhu ba byas te/ bgegs bskrad pa'i sbyor ba byas pa dang / dpal na ro pa'i zhal nas/ sangs rgyas dgongs pa dpag bsam shing lta bu'i gsung dag

la/ /sems can blo'i theg pa sna tshogs byas/ /phyogs med phyogs su 'dzin pa'i bdud chen gyis/ /'di dang ma 'ongs gnyis kar slu bar 'gyur/ /'gro ba'i blo la thams cad bden pa nyid/ /don dam yul du gang yang yod ma yin/ /de nyid

rnal 'byor sems su dbyer mi phyed/ /bka' la skur pa 'debs pa dmyal ba'i gnas su 'gro/ /de'i phyir bka' mtha' dag la skur pa mi bya ba ste bcu bzhi pa'o// //rgyal po thang bzangs glu zhes bya ba zhig /dpal kam+ba la la dbang blang ste/

An+yan gyi dur khrod na/ bde ba bsgom zhing 'dug pa las/ dur khrod kyi yi dgas thams cad kyis/ bar du gcod cing sems rab tu g.yengs so/ /de rnal 'byor ma legs smin ka ra la zhus pa dang / des smras pa/ las kyi phyag rgya bde ba'i gru/ /stong

pa'i skam sa rnyed nas ci byar yod/ /bcos ma'i bde la bcos ma'i yid zhen na/ /'khor ba'i mtsho chen rgal bar nus ma yin/ /zhes pa/ lha lcam la rnal 'byor pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa byas so/ /bde ba la zhen pa spang bar bya ba

ste bco lnga ba'o// //gdol pa dza zhes bya ba zhig gis/ slob dpon chen po ku ku ri pa la brten te/ don dam sems la dmigs pa'o/ /rdzogs pa'i rim pa phyogs gcig pa bsgoms pa las/ chos thams cad brten med du zhen

par 'gyur ro/ /de nas yul dzA lan d+ha rar/ rims nad kyis mi phal cher tshe'i dus byas so/ /lo tog thams cad ser bas bcom mo / /lo lngar char ma bab nas/ bram ze gsang tshig mkhan la dris pa dang / sa phyogs 'di ni mi nang pa

sangs rgyas pa gnas nas/ phyi rol gyi grub mtha' gsang par smra ba la phyogs te gnas pas/ bkra mi shis pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'jig rten 'di la gzhan phung zhing / /ma 'ongs pa la rang phung bar byed do zhes pa dang / dpal ku ku ri pas thos

te/ gdol ba dza'i drung du byon nas smras pa/ dang po dngos po'i chos rnams ni/ /stong pa nyid kyis bzlog par bya/ /stong pa nyid la zhen ches nas/ /dngos 'dzin pas kyang phung bar gyur/ /dug sbrul shi na dar ya kan/ /dug la sngags btab sman

gyi mchog /gang la rgyas btab bde 'gyur phyir/ /zhen pa thong la gnyis med sgoms / /zhes nas dbang gsum pa mdzad do/ /de ltar slob dpon klu sgrub kyis 'das pa'i dpe bcu brjod pas/ mdo rgyud dang mthun pa'i

phyir/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas su rig par bya'o/ /ma 'ongs pa'i dpe drug brjod pas grub pa thob pa dang mthun pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen par rig par bya'o/ /rkyen bcu drug dang bral ba'i shes pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa yin pa'i phyir

nor bu rin po che dang 'dra'o/ /slob dpon klu sgrub snying po'i zhal snga nas gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang lnga zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //dpal gyi ri la mnga' bdag chen pos/ rje btsun ri khrod kyis gnang ba'o/ /des rje btsun

ka ro pa la brgyud do/ /des rje btsun na ro pa la brgyud do/ /[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ nir bi kalpa pra ka ra Na/ bod skad du/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa/ bla ma dang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par rtog pa gang gang

gis/ /dngos po gang dang gang brtags pa/ /yongs su brtags pa 'di nyid dang / /rang bzhin yod min pa kho na/ /slob dpon klu sgrub zhal snga yi/ /lam las phyi rol song gyur cing / /legs par mngon pa'i thabs med pa'i/ /kun rdzob de

nyid bden pa las/ /nyams pas thar pa'i dngos grub ni/ /yod pa ma yin de dag nyams/ /gang zhig las las byung ba yi/ /rnam par rtog pa gang ci'ang rung / /de dag spangs pa'i rang bzhin las/ /mya ngan 'das pa gzhan na ni/ /yod

min yul ni gang du yang / /rnam par mi sems bdag nyid do/ /gang yang dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis/ /sems la bde ba 'byung gyur cing / /nyams su myong ba'i sar phyin pa/ /de yang kun du rtog pa tsam/ /gang de 'dod chags bral ba yi/ /

rang gi ngo bo de dag dang / /gnyis po gang yin pa de ni/ /srid pa'i rgyu yi mchog yin no/ /dngos po dngos po las mi skye/ /dngos po dngos med las kyang min/ /dngos po skye ba rtag tu spangs/ /dngos 'khrul nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/ /

mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams kun/ /skye ba mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid/ /rkyen ni mkha' dang mnyam kun nges/ /srid par gyur pa bden pa yin/ /rgyu med 'bras bu med gyur cing / /las kyi rang bzhin yod ma yin/ /'jig rten pa med

'jig rten med/ /mi brtan par gyur chos 'di kun/ /ma skyes pas ni dngos po gang / /ji ltar gzhan las shes par gyur/ /mo gsham bu yi bzhin yang ni/ /de ltar shes par mi nus so/ /'jig rten gzod nas ma skyes te/ /gang gis

kyang ni sprul pa med/ /don med 'khrul pa'i 'jig rten 'di/ /dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin no/ /rnam rtog las gang 'jig rten 'byung / /rnam rtog sems las byung ba ste/ /gang phyir lus las sems byung bas/ /de phyir lus la rnam par

brtag /gzugs stong tshor ba rang bzhin med/ /'du shes med cing 'du byed kyis/ /dngos po yod pa ma yin te/ /rang rig gsal ba'i bdag nyid do/ /de la shes dang shes bya med/ /sems dang sems las byung ba med/ /'byung ba med

de de yi phyir/ /rnam par mi rtog rang bzhin no/ /de ni sems min lus kyang min/ /khams rnams ma yin chos kyang min/ /gnyis su med pa'i lam mchog 'di/ /de nyid rig pa rnams kyis gsungs/ /dmigs pa med pa'i chos 'di kun/ /

dmigs pa med las rab tu grol/ /dmigs med blo yi dang byas na/ /dmigs pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ /rnam par mi rtog pa'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon chen po AR+Ya de wa'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta chen po ma hA

kA ru Na dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba rma ba na chos 'bar gyis bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ do ha ko Sha nA ma/ bod skad du/ do ha mdzod ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bcom ldan

'das bdag med ma la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma ho/ /srid dang zhi ba phyag rgya chen po ni/ /ngo bo nyid kyis mkha' ltar rnam par dag /mtshon bya'i gnas lugs med pas tha snyad tshig lam chad/ /rang bzhin spros med ngo bo ltos chos kun dang

bral/ /brtag dang dpyad du med cing mtshon pa'i dpe dang bral/ /dpe bral nyid la'ang mi gnas blo yi yul las 'das/ /rtag min chad min 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa min/ /snang min stong min dngos dang dngos med skye med min/ /chos nyid gnyug

ma ma yin blo las 'das pa'ang min/ /min pa'ang min zhing yin min blo yis brjod med phyir/ /gnyis chos gang dang 'brel med gzod nas mnyam pa nyid/ /ngo bo des tshig byed pa'i las rnams bshad pa yang / /ri bong rwa brdzun de yi rno rtul

brdzun dang mtshungs/ /chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid de dang khyad par med/ /ji ltar snang zhing srid pa'i kun rdzob chos can rnams/ /ngo bo nyid med ming tsam sgra tsam btags pa tsam/ /ming dang don la khyad par bye brag cung zad med/ /gdod

nas lhan cig skyes pas gzhan nas btsal du med/ /sems nyid ming stong spros bral phyag rgya chen po ste/ /nam mkha' rang bzhin gdod nas ming stong yin dang mtshungs/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes mtshan ma'i spros dang bral/ /mkha' ltar kun la

khyab cing 'pho dang 'gyur ba med/ /dus rnams kun du stong zhing ye nas bdag med de/ /dran rtog mtshan ma med de smig rgyu'i chu bo ltar/ /ma bcing ma grol gnyug ma'i ngang las ma g.yos so/ /sems can thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i sprul pa

la/ /sprul pa'i ngo bo ye shes nas skye med chos kyi dbyings/ /bde sdug la sogs gnyis snang mtshan ma thams cad kyang / /chos nyid gnyug ma phyag rgya chen po'i rol pa'o/ /rol pa nyid la bden med mi brtan 'gyur ba'i phyir/ /gnas lugs

stong pa'i rgya las nam yang ma 'das so/ /kha cig dbang bskur ba yis yongs su gdung bar byed/ /kha cig hUM phaT zer zhing phreng ba yongs su bgrang / /kha cig bshang gci khrag dang khu ba sha rnams za/ /kha cig rtsa dang rlung gi rnal 'byor bsgom

ste yongs su 'khrul/ /e ma ho/ /bla ma dam pas zin pas cig shos 'di ltar rtogs/ /gang yang 'khrul pa yin phyir yang dag rtogs pa med/ /rtogs bya rtogs byed med pas phyogs ris mtha' dang bral/ /bral dang ma bral med pas mnyam

nyid gnyug ma'i ngang / /'di ltar rtogs na nges par gzhan du dri sa med/ /sna tshogs chos skur gsal bas spong len sems mi 'byung / /bsgom dang mi bsgom med cing mtshan mas gos pa med/ /snang dang mi snang yul la nam yang brten mi byed/ /

bya dang byed pa'i sems med dmigs pa kun dang bral/ /re dang dog pa'i sems med kun la zhen pa log /bla mas bstan pas gnyug ma'i gnas lugs rtogs gyur na/ /dran rig sna tshogs chos kyi dbyings su rang rlag ste/ /rnam shes

yul la mi gnas chags zhen kun bral bas/ /ma bcos gnyug ma'i ngang du chos kun grol bar 'gyur/ /kun la ma chags nga rgyal la sogs dri ma bral/ /gus par ldan zhing dam pas yongs su zin pa dang / /gang yang yid byed bral na dri med

the tshom med/ /shes dang shes bya dag pas chos nyid mngon sum 'char/ /gnyug ma phyag rgya chen po rtogs par ma gyur na/ /rtag tu gnyis 'dzin dbang gis kun la zhen gyur pas/ /bsam rig rab rib sna tshogs rgyun du skye 'gyur zhing / /ma nor

don la mi gnas srid par 'khor zhing 'khyam/ /snyan grags bsnyen bkur kun la chags zhing zhen pa dang / /thos bsam go rtogs che dang nyams myong bzang po dang / /dngos grub byin rlabs nus pa'i rtags byung bcos ma'i

lam/ /don gyis dri ma yin phyir mkhas pas yid mi gtad/ /de nyid yid la byed cing gnyis mtha'i phyogs lhung na/ /'khor bar 'khor zhing srid pa'i rtsa ba yin pa'i phyir/ /kun gyi gzhi rtsa yid kyi ri bo gang yin ltos/ /bltas pas ma mthong yid dang bral

na nges par grol/ /sems kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'di zhes med pas na/ /de la sgom dang bsgom par bya ba gnyis su med/ /yod med cir yang mi rtog ma yengs ngang la zhog /stong pa nyid dang skye med blo las 'das pa dang / /mtha' bral la sogs

gang yang yid la byed pa na/ /gnas lugs don la mi gnas shin tu yengs pa'o/ /stong dang mi stong rtsis med lhug pa'i ngang la zhog /gzhag dang mi gzhag med par rang dga' yan par thong / /btang dang bzung ba'i sems med ro langs ji bzhin gyis/ /

de nyid gnas lugs rig nas de yi ngang gnas na/ /gnyis snang mtshan ma'i bag chags myur du 'jig par 'gyur/ /rtogs pa'i ngang la mi gnas mtshan mas g.yengs gyur na/ /gnyis snang mtshan ma'i bag chags ldog par mi 'gyur te/ /rab

rib can gyi mig gi nang du shes gyur kyang / /mig gi nad ma byang bar rab rib snang mi ldog /gnas lugs yid la byed cing nyams la zhen pa dang / /de nyid don la goms shing bsgoms na gol ba'i rgyu/ /mthun 'jug rnams la chags sdang skye

phyir 'ching ba'o/ /mi mthun rkyen ngan thams cad dngos grub dam pa ste/ /mi mthun rkyen gyis rnal 'byor nyams kyi gsal 'debs phyir/ /rkyen ngan mi spang de nyid shes pas de la sbyang / /de ltar skyong zhing nyams rtogs mthar 'byin spyod pa ste/ /

gyi ling dag la lcag gis bskul ba ji bzhin no/ /gal te rtogs ldan nyams bzang spyod pa'i grogs med na/ /ji ltar mi ldan skyes bu dag ni rkang pa med dang mtshungs/ /don dam rnal ma chags med don la sbyang bya ste/ /mi spang mi sgrub mi zhen mi

spyod mi 'gog par/ /rang lus ci bder spyod pa rab mchog dam pa'o/ /kun rdzob sangs rgyas mi ro'i gdeng chen ldan gyur kyang / /sems can tshogs chen mi spang ci nus 'bad par bya/ /'khor ba dag la dog pa'i sems med 'jigs bral yang / /

sdig pa'i las rnams phra mo dag nas 'dzem par bya/ /chos rnams stong pa mkha' ltar rtsa bral rtogs gyur kyang / /chags sdang 'dzin chags mtha' dag rtsad nas spang bar bya/ /chos nyid mtha' bral zang thal chen po'i don rtogs kyang / /brtan pa ma

thob bar du nyams rtogs gzhan la gsang / /don dam bdag gzhan gnyis su med pa rtogs gyur kyang / /kun rdzob 'gro la phan pa'i don chen dag la bsam/ /'dren pa gzhan la mi ltos gdeng dang ldan gyur kyang / /bka' drin can gyi bla ma spyi

bo'i gtsug tu bkur/ /chags shing zhen par bcas pas kun la dgag sgrub byed/ /rgyud dang mi 'tsham 'gal ba'i spyod pa gol ba'o/ /mthong bya mthong byed med pas tha dad rang sar grol/ /nyams su myong mkhan stor bas rtsol sgrub kun dang

bral/ /thob bya'i 'bras bu stor bas re dog kun las grol/ /nga bdag rtsad nas thon pas bdud kyi g.yul las rgyal/ /dngos 'dzin rang sar zhig pas 'khor 'das kun la grol/ /rig pa gzhi la dag pas rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes brjod/ /

chos blo zad sar zad pas mya ngan 'das zhes bshad pa'i phyir/ /ma bcos ma bsgyur spangs thob kun las yongs su grol/ /e ma ho/ /phyag rgya chen po zhes bya zab mo'i sgra chen de/ /gdags gzhi gang yin stong pa zhes bya'ang btags pa tsam/ /

skad cig ngo bos stong par bdag med su yis rtogs/ /rtog mkhan nyid med ming tsam sgra tsam btags pa tsam/ /de nyid yang dag ma yin gdul bya'i snang ba'o/ /gdul bya nyid la'ang bdag med sgyu ma sprul pa 'dra/ /phyag rgya chen

po zhes bya byis pa'i blos brtags so/ /'khrul dang ma 'khrul zhes bya ming tsam btags pa tsam/ /'khrul par tshor zhing rig pa'i skyes bu su zhig yin/ /'bras bu myang 'das rdul tsam med cing mi dmigs na/ /grol dang ma grol zhes bya glo bur

sgro btags te/ /nam mkha' zhi zhing dag la med pa grol lam ci/ /kun rdzob don dam zhes bya'ang nan gyis btags pa ste/ /chos kyi dbyings la bden pa gnyis med chos dbyings med/ /do ha mdzod ces bya ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug biR+Wa pas mdzad

pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po shrI bai ro tsa nas rang 'gyur du bsgyur ba'o// //brgyud pa ni biR+Wa pa/ nag po pa/ slob dpon sgra mkhan zhabs/ slob dpon pu ra pa/ shrI bai ro tsa na'o//[ ]@##/rgya gar skad du/

do ha ko Sha/ bod skad du/ do ha mdzod/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dbang po rnams/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin las/ /ma lus de las byung zhing de ru thim/ /lhan skyes dngos dang dngos med

gtam mi 'dri/ /stong pa snying rje de ru ro mnyam 'dod/ /yid la ma byed gnyug ma'i rang bzhin la/ /brdzun pa rnams kyis skur ba ma 'debs shig /rang dbang yod pas rang nyid 'ching ma byed/ /sems la mya ngan 'das pa rgyob la sod/ /khams

gsum stong pa gos pa med la 'jug /sems ni mkha' 'dra mnyam pa'i bde bar zhugs/ /dbang po yul dmas skad cig tsam ni der mi mthong / /thog ma spangs shing 'di ru tha ma spangs/ /bla ma mchog gi zhabs kyis gnyis med bstan/ /sems
