ni gang du zhi gyur pa/ /der ni rlung yang thim par 'gyur/ /rang rig pa yi de nyid 'bras bu ni/ /su zhig la ni gang gis ji ltar bstan/ /rmongs pa'i 'jig rten 'gro ba rnams kyis spyod yul min/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis de nyid bgrod bya min/ /

gang la bla ma'i zhabs kyi mnyes pa yi/ /kye ho gang zag de yi spyod yul yin/ /rang rig de nyid 'bras bur ni/ /te lo pa yis de skad bstan pa yin /yid kyi spyod yul du ni gang gyur pa/ /de ni don dam nyid ni ma yin no/ /de nyid bla ma'i gsung

gis bstan par bya ba min/ /des na slob mas go ba ma yin no/ /lhan skyes 'bras bu bdud rtsi'i ro/ /de nyid su zhig la ni ci zhig bstan/ /gang du yid ni zhi ba dang / /yid dang rlung gnyis mnyam par zhu/ /der ni rnam kun spangs pa la/ /

khams gsum de ru gnas pa yin/ /rmongs pa gnyug ma'i rang bzhin shes par gyis/ /de tshe gti mug dra ba ma lus chad par 'gyur/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i sems ni legs par sbyongs/ /tshe 'dir dngos grub thar pa lus 'dis rnyed/ /

gang du sems ni 'gro ba der/ /der ni sems med par ni ltos/ /dbye ba med par ro mnyam gnas par gyis/ /sems dang sems med de ni legs par tshol/ /tshe 'di nyid la dngos grub legs par gsal por rnyed/ /sems ni gang du zhi

gyur pa/ /khams gsum po ni de ru thim/ /rang gzhan mnyam pas sangs rgyas rje btsun 'gyur/ /sems ni nam mkha'i ngang du zhugs nas thim/ /de yi tshe na dbang po lnga dang yul rnams dang / /phung po khams rnams nang du zhugs nas song / /

gang zhig brtan dang g.yo ba'i rnam pa kun/ /stong pa gos pa med pa ste/ /'di la dpyad par mi bya'o/ /'di ni bdag go 'di ni 'gro ba'o/ /gang zhig dbye ba yongs shes pa/ /dri med sems kyi rang bzhin la/ /gang zhig rang rig shes par bya/ /

bdag nyid 'gro ba bdag nyid sangs rgyas te/ /bdag nyid dri ma med cing bdag nyid yid la mi byed pa/ /de la 'gro ba med cing gos pa med/ /yid ni rje btsun nam mkha' rje btsun ma/ /nyin mtshan du ni gar byed lhan cig

skyes la rol/ /skye dang 'chi ba dag las grol bar 'gyur/ /gnyug ma'i yid la rgyun du gnas par gyis/ /'bab stegs dka' thub nags la ma brten cig /khrus dang gtsang sbras bde ba mi rnyed do/ /tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug lha/ /

byang chub rang la yod bzhin gsum la bkur mi bya/ /lha rnams ma mchod 'bab stegs ma 'gro zhig /lha rnams mchod kyang thar pa thob mi 'gyur/ /rnam par mi rtog sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod par gyis/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das la

gnas par ma byed cig /shes rab thabs kyi ting 'dzin zhugs/ /gang tshe g.yo bar brtan par byed nus na/ /de yi tshe na nyams myong 'grub par 'gyur/ /ji ltar dug ni zos par gyur pa las/ /dug gis kyang ni 'chi bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de ltar

srid pa zos kyang rnal 'byor pa/ /'dod yon gyis ni 'ching bar mi 'gyur ro/ /kye ho rnal 'byor pas ni las la skur ma 'debs/ /skad cig bzhi dang dga' ba bzhi ru de ru song / /skad cig dga' ba de yi bye brag shes par gyis/ /mtshan gzhi

mtshan nyid spangs pa shes par gyis/ /kye ho mchog dang dga' bral 'di ni dpyad par bya/ /bla ma mchog gi zhabs la gus par gyis la legs par long / /gang zhig dga' ba mchog dang dga' bral gyi/ /kye ho skad cig der ni lhan skyes rtogs par

bya/ /yon tan rin chen dpral ba'i klad rgyas gzhag bya ste/ /'dod pa mo'i ze'u 'bru las ni 'di nyid shes par bya/ /skad cig bye brag de ru lhan skyes gang shes pa/ /de ni tshe 'di nyid la rnal 'byor par brjod do/ /thog ma tha ma gzung ba 'dzin pa spangs/ /

bla ma mchog gi zhabs kyis gnyis med bstan/ /mi g.yo dri med rnam par rtog pa med/ /shar ba nub pa spangs pa 'di ni snying po yin/ /'di ni mya ngan 'das par rab tu brngod/ /yid kyi nga rgyal gang du chad gyur pa/ /skyon dang yon tan spangs

pa 'di ni don dam mo/ /rang rig la ni gang yang med/ /sems dang sems med rtag tu sgongs/ /kye ho lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du ni gnas par bya/ /skye ba med cing 'chi ba med/ /rtsa ba med cing rtse mo med/ /'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med/ /

gang du yang ni mi gnas so/ /bla ma'i man ngag gis ni snying la chud/ /kha dog spangs shing rig med pa/ /snang ba thams cad de la rdzogs/ /yid ni sod la sems ni rtsa ba med par gyis/ /sems kyi lhag ma zug rngu thong / /'di ru sku

bzhi phyag rgya bzhi/ /khams gsum ma lus de tshe dag /bdag dang 'gro ba khams gsum stong / /dri ma med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa la/ /dge dang mi dge gang yang med/ /yid ni gang du 'gro 'dod pa/ /de la 'khrul par mi bya'o/ /mig ni mi 'dzum

pa dag gi/ /bsam gtan gyis ni gnas par bya/ /slob dpon chen po te lo pas mdzad pa do ha mdzod ces bya ba rdzogs so// //rgya gar lho phyogs ko sa lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor pa chen po mkhas pa dpal rnam par snang mdzad

rdo rje'i zhal snga nas rang 'gyur du gsungs pa'o// //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pany+tsagA thA nA ma/ bod skad du/ tshigs spu bcad pa lnga pa zhes bya ba/ dpal te ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /chu zad pas ni 'dam gyi pad+ma skams/ /sprang

rtsi bros pas gar song cha yang med/ /rtsa ba lo ma sdong po me yi sbyor bas zad/ /nag po na re dbang po'i bzhad gad la ni ltos/ /za zhing 'thung dang gnas nas yal ga bcag nas song / /kye ho 'di ni bdag gi las ni gtum mo lta bu yin/ /rgyun gyi ba mo

lta bus pad+ma bsregs/ /yon tan brgya ni skyon gcig gis ni zad par byas/ /rgya mtsho zad pas pad+ma rnams kyang skams/ /de tshe sgo bcu las ni du ba byung / /'jig rten pa ni nag po med ces zer/ /nag po theg chen zab mo'i nags na

gnas/ /sems ni stong zhing gnyug ma'i ngang du rdzogs/ /phung po bzhad gad gyur kyang 'gyod pa med/ /'o ma'i nang na mar yod pa ni mi mthong bzhin/ /'dod pa yod de 'jig rten pas ni ma mthong ngo / /'jig rten 'tsho ba 'am ni 'chi ba gang yang med/ /

'di lta'i longs spyod nag po rnal 'byor pa/ /pad+ma bzhin du lus cha skams gyur kyang / /nag po ci yi phyir na shi zhes bya/ /brtul zhugs spyod pa'i slob dpon chen po nag pos mdzad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa lnga pa rdzogs so// //rnal 'byor gyi

dbang phyug shrI bai ro tsa na badzras bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ shrI bi rU pa ba dA tsa tur shI ti/ bod skad du/ dpal biR+Wa pa'i tshig rkang brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa/ bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyin mtshan rtag tu bla ma mchog gi

zhabs la 'dud/ /gzhung 'di lhan cig skyes pas 'phros nas byung / /des ni rga shi rnams la bzhad gad byas/ /sems ni mi g.yo brtan par rtse gcig bya/ /des na bsam bya bsam gtan dkyil 'khor phyag rgya med/ /de rnams bsgoms pas

rnam par dag mi 'gyur/ /lta stangs 'ching dang las rnams byed pa dang / /sgo rnams dgag par bya ba ma yin no/ /des ni lhan cig skyes pa'i lam mi shes/ /gang zhig srog dang rtsol ba gang ba can dang ni/ /bum pa can gyi rlung la bstod byed pa/ /

gang gis lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du ni/ /gtum mo sbar bar byed cing nan tan gyis/ /sgo bcu la ni sgo lcags 'jug par byed/ /gang zhig spyi bor pad+ma dkar po bsgom/ /rmongs pa des ni dang po'i thar pa mi rnyed do/ /dril can rkan dang sna rtser

bsam byed dang / /steng dang 'og dang bsdoms nas shing btsugs dang / /mgrin pa'i phugs su 'od zer 'bar byed dang / /dpral bar zla ba rtag tu sgom byed dang / /nam mkha'i rtse mor mi g.yo'i sna rtser bsgom/ /la la 'og tu pad+ma rdo rje lta/ /la la u rgyan

'ching zhing 'degs par byed/ /la la tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi sgom par byed/ /la la rang grib stong par byas nas chas la lta/ /la la dkyil 'khor til gyi 'bru tsam bsgom/ /la la bar snang sku gzugs sgom byed pa'i/ /byol song rnams ni rang nyid chos rnams

shes par smra/ /de rnams kyis ni skye ba 'bras bu med/ /blo rnams zad cing sdig pa rnams la spyod/ /des ni lhan cig skyes pa'i cha yang ma mthong ngo / /de ni nam mkha' dang ni sa 'og dang / /sa steng dang ni tshangs pa'i gnas su'ang med/ /dman pa'i slob dpon

bsten par ma byed cig /des ni sdig pa'i las rnams ma spangs par/ /kha ni 'gul zhing 'gul zhing re la gnas/ /rang gis stong pa snying rje byed par rtsom/ /des ni srid pa spong thabs mi shes so/ /stong pa snying rje rtogs zhes zer zhing gnas/ /dpal

ldan bde chen gtam yang mi 'dri'o/ /la la dbang phyug u ma re la gnas/ /bdag nyid srid pa'i 'ching ba'i zhags pas bcings/ /la la khu ba khrag dang rnam snang za/ /bya rog bya rgod bzhin du bdag nyid 'khol/ /la la gnas gsum skad cig gsum du

bsgom/ /la la snying ga'i pad+ma 'khor lo 'chang / /la la hUM phaT zer zhing phreng ba bgrang / /byol song rnams ni 'khrul pa rgyun mi 'chad/ /dbang dang dbang bskur mang po gsungs pa rnams/ /bla ma rnams la slob mas len par byed/ /de nas brtsams shing

slob ma rnams la 'chad/ /dbang bskur gyi ni phyogs kyang ma mthong ngo / /la las gser 'gyur rtsi ni lta byed pas/ /des ni khyim pa rnams ni dbul por byas/ /lha rnams kyis kyang mi bde ba la sbyar/ /nags la skyes pa'i rtswa dang shing rnams dang / /shing

lo me tog rnams kyis skyid ma bstan/ /dus su bsam gtan 'jig rten pa rnams byed/ /des ni mchog gi thar pa mi shes so/ /cal col mang po smras pas ci zhig bya/ /ji ltar smras pa de dag thams cad brdzun/ /gdams ngag

pa rnams gsal po'i gnas lugs nyon/ /gang gis gsal por thar pa grol ba rnyed/ /sems ni g.yo zhing smyon pa lta bur thong / /skye dang gnas dang 'jig pa gsum po rtogs par gyis/ /mgul rgyan dang ni phyag rgya ma lus thong / /des ni mgon po ji

ltar mthong bar 'gyur/ /'jig rten pa ni yi ge rnams la gtod/ /yi ge med pa de ni snying la ma chud do/ /gdams ngag pa rnams nyon cig ngas ni bshad par bya/ /khams gsum bor nas dpal ldan theg pa che/ /dang po'i mgon po la ni dge dang mi dge

med/ /ma lus khyab cing bde chen stong pa nyid/ /byed pa 'phrog pa rang nyid spyan ras gzigs/ /zad pa med cing gzhan du song ba med/ /de ni mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'o/ /bsam gtan gyis ni ting 'dzin skyes byas kyang / /dang po'i mgon po de ni ma mthong

ngo / /de lta'i sems ni snying la ma chud do/ /de la lus dang ngag dang yid med de/ /dpa' bo dri med de ni nam mkhar thim/ /biR+Wa pa yis sems can don du byas/ /don dam 'di ni gdams ngag pa rnams nyon/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal bi rU pas mdzad

pa'i tshig rkang brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa rdzogs so// //yul lho phyogs ko sa lar sku 'khrungs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po shrI bai ro tsa na badzra'i zhal snga nas rang 'gyur du mdzad nas gsungs pa'o//[ ]@##/ /bla ma dam pa'i zhabs pad

la btud de/ /lam 'bras gsung mdo bri bar bya/ /sems can la nyon mongs pa'i snang ba la ma dag pa'i snang ba/ rnal 'byor pa ting nge 'dzin la nyams kyi snang ba/ bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs mi zad pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo la dag pa'i snang ba'o/ /

kun gzhi rgyu rgyud la 'khor 'das chang bas rtsa rgyud/ lus thabs rgyud sogs la gdan sogs gsum pa bzhi yis rgyu'i dbang / lam du bskyed rim la sogs lnga pa bzhis bstan/ mnyam gzhag gi dam tshig sogs bsrung / rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs kyi

nyams chags bskang / 'dod yon sogs lnga yis mnyes pa sogs bya/ lam gyi thun bzhi la dbang bzhi bsgoms pas lus la brten nas bde chen gyi sgrib pa 'dag cing 'tshang rgya bar gsal bas bshad rgyud/ phyag rgya chen po 'bras bu'i rgyud ni/

'bras bu'i dbang bzhis thams cad mkhyen to/ /tshad ma bzhis 'bras bu gtan la phab nas/ 'gal 'dus skyon med sogs gsum gyis bsam gtan gyi dug dbyung / zas spyod lam/ rlung thig le/ phyag rgya ma bsten/ dngas ma lnga'i bde ba dang /

dbang po lnga nyams dang ma bral bas bdud rtsi bsten/ 'khor ba'i rtsa bzhi dang / 'khor lo rnams dang / gzhan rnams dang / sa thog mtha' la re re/ gsum pa bcus bar gyi rtsa mdud dral bas la dor/ 'jug pa sel ba'i lam yid 'dag pa'i rnam

rtog bsgoms pas lta ba'i dug dbyung / rnam shes lngas yul lnga ma spangs pas/ bdud rtsi bstan/ dag pa'i chos rnams gdod nas stong par shar bas la dor/ gsang sngags snyan brgyud la sogs bzhi ma chad pas/ lus khyad par can la brten nas

dngos po'i mtha' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba/ gzhan dbang rten 'brel byang chub chen po'i lam/ chos thams cad rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lo rgyus kyis tshad ma'o/ /kun gzhi rnam shes dag pa'i byang chub chen po/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba

lnga yis lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /thabs kyi phyogs su lhung ba'i rnal 'byor pa'i lam gyi bar chad ni/ dad pa brtan pos srung ba'i 'khor lo/ sngags zlos/ sngags mdud/ chos rnams sems nyid snang ba/ gzhan dbang rten 'brel/

gzugs brnyan yin phyir/ de kho na nyid rgya mtsho'i don dang ma bral bas bsrung / shes rab la phyi'i bdud lam gnyis/ lta grub brgyad rgyur ba'o/ /nang gi bdud lam la sogs bcu dang brda ma shes na 'od brda shes pas bsrung / grib dang sgrib

pa thig le 'dzag pa bsrung / /tshogs lam nas tha mal pa'i lus ngag yid dang bral bas bral ba'i 'bras bu bzhi thabs nas/ khams 'du lugs gsum gyis phyogs med rnams dang / rlung sems bdag byin gyis brlabs nas/ byang chub kyi phyogs dang

mthun pa'i chos sum cu rtsa bdun ltar lam bgrod na/ sgom pa mi 'chor ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni/ las kyi rlung pho mo/ ma ning gi rlung / thod rgal gyi ye shes kyi me 'bar bas/ khams 'dus pa dang po/ rgyun gyi rlung po lag ca can gyis rtsa

dral/ sems gnas/ rta rmi/ rtsa rlung gi zug 'byung / sna tshogs 'dud la sogs bzhi rtsa ba'i rlung la sogs zin pa'i bye brag bdun gyis yan lag gi rlung rim gyis nang du 'gag/ de tsa na thig le mang du kha 'bu/ rten mnyam du 'dre de la brten nas sems

nang du gnas/ rnam shes lnga nang du 'dus/ phung po lnga dul/ ye shes kyi 'gro ldog byed/ bsgom pa mi 'chor ba'i mthong snang rmi lam nyams gsum gsum ni rnam rtog sngon du song ba ltar khams gsum kun du snang ngo / /sa chu la thim na smig rgyu/ chu me

la thim na du ba/ me rlung la thim na srin bu me khyer/ rlung rnam par shes pa la thim na mar me 'bar ba/ rnam par shes pa 'od gsal la thim na nam mkha' sprin med lta bu/ sa chu me rlung dang rlung sems mnyam par 'dus na khams gsum kun du me 'bar

ba lta bur snang / chu rlung dang spu lus grang / rlung gi rlung 'du 'phro dang rang 'phur bya 'byung / 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung mnyam rgyu dang lha mo sna tshogs kyis gar mchod dang dri ro/ 'byung ba bzhi'i rlung mnyam rgyu dang lha mo sna tshogs nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dang

spu lus bde/ bdud rtsi lnga dang bzhin gshegs sku sogs/ sih+la dang nyi ma/ ga pur dang zla ba/ rtsa bran rnams su thig phran dang skar ma/ rtsa 'dzin la sogs su shing sdong la sogs/ chags sdang rnam pa lnga dang / nyam nga mya ngan 'dre'i rtsa/ mchi ma'i

rtsar g.yal dang mchi ma/ lte bar dang po chags pa'i rigs drug gi yi ger rlung sems mnyam par 'dus na/ rigs drug gi gar sngags der khrid pa/ rmi lam nyams lta bu khams gsum kun du snang ngo / /oM las bsam gtan sogs kyi ting nge 'dzin

yum gyi mkha'/ a las yang dag par thim na khams gsum nam mkha' yum chen mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la sogs kyi pho brang du thim na chos sku nyams su myong zhing gzung 'dzin grol/ hUM las gsal zhing yang la rang 'byung gi ye shes nam

mkha' shin du dri ma med/ khams 'dus pa bar pa rlung po lag ca bri bas rtsa dral/ thig le'i gzugs dang mthong snang brten no/ /mdor na rak+Sha la sogs su srin po sogs dri can gyi sgra lha'i mig rnam par dag pa bzhin/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad ting

nge 'dzin gyi nyams su 'byung ba snyam byed pa/ bshad kyis mi lang ba mtshon cing lnga bcu la gsang / sgom pa mi 'chor ba'i phyi'i rten 'brel rlung log sogs gsum gsum ni/ nang gi mkha' 'gro ma lnga de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lnga/ byang chub

chen po'i rten 'brel mdzad pas/ dngos grub rnams rang la 'byung bar shes shing re zhing stsol ba'i blo sel to/ /bdud dang gol sa rnams rang gi lam dang rten 'brel du shes pas skyon yon tan du bslang zhing rim pa yin min du skye ba'i dod byung rgyal

du gtang / shes rab kyi phyogs su lhung ba'i lam la/ lha'i bu'i bdud 'ong bas sad pa bzhis bsrung / sgom pa mi 'tsher ba'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni/ yul 'gags pas rang yi dam gyi lha dang / gug skyes kyi dgos pa bsam zhing ting

nge 'dzin cha bsnyams pas/ khams 'dus pa tha ma rlung po lag ca dral bas rtsa bral/ skye mched drug gi nang du thig le 'dus pas rjes su dran pa drug yang dag par shes/ sprul sku 'ga' mthong / sgom pa mi 'chor ba'i yang

dag par spong ba bzhi ni/ sprul sku las dbang gsum gyi rjes las byung ba'i shes pa bsam zhing / dgyes sogs pang can bcu gnyis ma'i rtsa btsal zhing / snying po'i a kun 'dar gyi sna rtser dal rgyu la sogs rig pa yid 'jug pas/ lus ngag

yid gsum rdo rje skyil krung bcas/ thig le rlung non pas rnga sgra la sogs mi thos pas/ chog shes pa sogs kyi bdud choms pa'o/ /nang gi sangs rgyas rnams kyi lam srid pa'i rtse mor phyin cing ma skyes pa'i chos la bzod dka' bstod pa nyid

kyi bzod pa'o/ /dbu mar sems rtog med log sems 'phos na bzod pa/ 'khor ba'i chos las 'das shing / mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam chos rnams rdzogs pas chos rnams kyi nang na mchog go/ /de ltar nyams skyon can skyon med dang /

phyi dbyibs kyi a nas yar rlung sems mnyam par 'dus nas lam du 'byung ba rnams ngo bo rang mtshan nyid do/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la/ phyi nang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i lam gyis sprul sku rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob par

byed pa/ spyod pa'i rim pa'i lam nas lus dag par byed pa bum pa'i dbang mthar phyin/ de kho na nyid kyi rtags/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun ni/ rtsa rin po che'i pho brang bzhi/ gtso bo gsum ste lus kyi dkyil 'khor mthong bas rtog pa'i 'gro ldog byed/

sprul sku'i zhing khams brgya bsgul zhing nyan/ sbyin brgya/ 'od brgya 'gyed/ mar brgya 'chad/ ting nge 'dzin mi 'dra ba brgya la snyoms par 'jug nus/ rigs drug gi rtsar khyad par du mi'i rten mthong nas dga' la g.yang za/ ngo tsha la skyug bro/ /sngon

bla mas rgyu dus na bstan pa'i 'khor 'das dbyer med de tsa na rtog /snying rje skye/ mchi ma ltung / gzhan gyi sems sna tshogs shes/ 'dod yon sna tshogs mthong bas dgod bro/ /rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs skad cig mas 'byung ba rnams nang gi zhing khams mthong bas

so/ /nang ma mthong par phyi mi mthong / de tsa na ling ga brtan/ rdo rje rtser lhan cig skyes pa'i sar thig le gnas pa ltar/ lus bde bas myos shing brgyal/ rang gzhan ngo mi shes/ nang rtags rlung sor gcig 'gags/ phyi rtags gsang gnas phyed

thig les brtan sa dang po'o/ /yang sprul sku las dbang bzhi sgom lam sa gnyis pa nas sprul pa'i sku'i zhing khams stong la sogs pa bsgul ba la sogs pa nus/ yon tan la sogs 'phel/ 'gro ldog la sogs 'gags/ nang rtags rlung sor

drug 'gags/ phyi rtags gsang gnas te/ snying thig les brtan/ longs sku 'ga' mthong / sgom lam sa drug go/ yang longs sku las dbang bzhi bzhi bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i lam nas/ longs sku rang bzhin gyis lhun grub thob

par byed pa/ ngag dag pa gsang ba'i dbang mthar phyin/ de kho na nyid kyi rtags dbang po lnga dang dngas ma'i rlung lnga la mnga' brnyes/ nus pa lnga dang lta stangs rnams la thogs pa med/ b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor du rigs drug gi sa bon mthong / sa bon drug

la mnga' brnyes/ sems can rnams kyi skad du chos ston cing chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid la thogs pa med/ lte bar yi ge'i phyi mo brgyad/ A li kA li mthong nas/ mdo sde'i chos gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis la thogs pa med/ bdud rtsi lnga dang

ro drug la longs spyod nus/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su gyur pa rnams a ni yig 'bru ces pa drug gis gsal lo/ /sa bdun yan chad longs sku'i zhing khams 'khor bzhi'i brgya dung phyur la sogs bsgul ba la sogs pa nus/ nang rtags rlung sor bcu

'gags/ phyi rtags mgrin smin thig les brtan/ sgom lam sa bcu'o/ /yang dbang bzhi bzhi/ sems dag la dkyil 'khor 'khor lo thabs kyi lam nas chos sku rang bzhin gyi lhun grub thob par byed pa/ shes rab dang ye shes

kyi dbang mthar phyin/ de kho na nyid kyi rtags/ stobs lnga ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rlung lnga bskyod pa'i dngas ma'i dngas ma/ rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor mthong nas rtags bstan pa/ sku gsum ye shes lnga la sogs dbang thob nas/ bdud rtsi

lnga gar 'du mthong nas sangs rgyas rnams gzhan don mdzad pa mthong / sprul pa bde chen thig le 'du ba mthong na/ sangs rgyas rnams 'og min gyi gnas na zab mo la bzhugs pa mthong / lte ba sprul par bdud rtsi lnga dang rlung lnga 'dus pa mthong na/ longs

sku'i rigs lnga yum gyi b+ha ga na bzhugs nas skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' la gsang ba sgrogs pa mthong / phyag rgya ma'i dngas ma'i dngas ma mthong na mngon shes la thogs pa med/ rtsa yig rnams su dngas ma 'drongs na rdzu 'phrul la thogs pa

med/ de nyid slar spos na sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran/ nang rtags rlung sor bcu gnyis 'gags/ phyi rtags spyi gtsug hri la thig les brtan/ sa bcu gnyis so/ /yang dbang bzhi bzhi mthar phyin gyi lam nas mthar thug rten 'brel mthar thug 'da' ba/

rdo rje'i dba' rlabs kyi lam gyis phyag rgya chen po mchog gi dngos grub rig ma'i skyes bu/ srid pa rnam par dag pa'i lam/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku rang bzhin gyi lhun grub thob par byed pa/ bzhi pa lus ngag yid kyi dbang mthar phyin/ de kho na nyid kyi rtags

'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ni/ rnam shes brgyad 'dag kar 'bras bu gnyis thob ste/ sa chen dga' zhing rangs la mgu/ /de rnam pa drug tu g.yo/ /bdud gnas su sgra grag /phyag rgya ma'i gnas su khams gsum mthong / mkha' 'gro ma

rnams ring nas 'du/ /ha ri ma la sogs pa dbang phyug gi don brgyad 'char/ nang rtags srog rtsol a wa d+hU tIr 'jug /phyi rtags gtsug tor phyed thig les brtan/ sa phyed dang bcu gsum mo/ /bzhi pa yid kyi dbang mthar phyin/ de kho na nyid kyi rtags

'bras bu'i phyogs gcig 'thob ste/ 'bigs byed gzhon nu'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings/ /byang chub sems kyis ni 'bigs/ 'bras bu longs sku'i zhing khams rab bkram la sogs pa bsgul ba la sogs pa nus/ sa bcu gsum thob kar sa bcu ma

la sogs pa yid kyis bkug ste/ slob dpon dus gsum bde gshegs bcud 'dus yin/ yi dam lha dang bla ma dbyer med la/ /b+ha gar dngos grub len pa'i rten 'brel gyis/ /srid pa rnam par dag pa'i lam/ /ngo bo nyid kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag

pa rang bzhin gyi lhun grub thob par byed pa/ 'bras bu mthar phyin de kho na nyid kyi rtags longs sku'i zhing khams ma lus pa la sogs pa bsgul ba la sogs pa nus/ nang rtags srog rtsol a wa d+hUd+ma tI'i 'gags/ phyi rtags gtsug gtor hri la thig les brtan/

phyi nang gi rten 'brel 'gros bzhi thim pa rnams kyis sgom nyams kyis skyon yod med phyed pas bcu gsum pa'o/ /thams cad mkhyen te/ bcu gsum rdo rje 'dzin sar rten 'brel 'grig pa ltar snang / 'tshang rgya kar 'khor tshom bu cig dang bcas te 'tshang

rgya'o/ /gsang sngags rdo rje'i theg pa ni/ /rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu'i dbang / /rtogs pas brtags pas rtog med rtogs/ /ye shes snang ba de bzhin no/ /lam zab bla ma dam tshig lus so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i gdams

ngag dang man ngag du bcas pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta sid+d+hi mU la nA ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi grub pa'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ /spyan gsum rab ldan dbu bcad sku mdog dmar/ /

'chi ba'i 'jigs sel rnal 'byor pho mo yi/ /phyag rgya 'dzin cing biR+Wa ting 'dzin gyis/ /skyob mdzad phyag rgya'i zhabs la bdag 'dud do/ /phyag rgya chen po rnams bshad bya/ /mi ni gang gis thos pa la/ /lha rnams kun

gyis bkur sti mdzad/ /skye ba bye ba stong dag tu/ /legs las rgya chen rnams byas pas/ /de thob 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho la/ /pha rol tu ni rnal 'byor 'gro/ /g.yon pa'i rting pas bshang lam dgag /g.yas pa cung zad brkyang byas la/ /mtheb chen bol gong

lag pas gzung / /snying ga lkog mas mnan pa ni/ /sgo dgu dgag pa'i sbyor ba'o/ /de yi rtsa gsum dag la ni/ /rim pa bzhin du bsnun par bya/ /'di ni las kyi phyag rgya'o/ /rkang pa gcig pa sems bsdu zhing / /rlung rnams gcig tu bsdus bya ste/ /

rlung gis bsdam pa brtsam par bya/ /nyi zla gnyis ni gcig par bya/ /de ltar byas na rlung ni 'gag /'di ni dam tshig phyag rgya'o/ /bshang lam 'khor lo gyen du bzlog /thig le sgra bcas gyen du bslang / /rtsa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yo/ /mchog gi

rtsa ni gyen du 'ong / /lus ngag yid gsum sbyor ba yis/ /sku gsung thugs ni bsgrub par bya/ /goms pa brtan par gyur pa yis/ /rang gi me ni gsal ba'o/ /phyag rgya 'di yis thams cad du/ /rnal 'byor pa ni nges par 'gro/ /'di ni kha sbyor sbyor

ba ste/ /rtsa ba'i gdams par 'dod pa'o/ /'di ni rlung gi sbyor ba yin/ /mkhas pa rnams kyis 'di bsgrub po/ /phyag rgya gnyis su shes par bya/ /ji bzhin bsdam pa'i cho ga shes/ /dzo ni lha mo'i phyag rgya yin/ /ling+ga'i phyag rgya lha yin no/ /pho dang mo

yi sbyor ba las/ /phyi rol du ni skyes pa 'byung / /ji bzhin sbyor ba 'di gnyis kyis/ /skye ba nang du gsang bar bya/ /rtsa ni bud med gzugs can te/ /skyes pa med na 'bras bu med/ /phyag rgya che dang bsdams pa che/ /dbye ba med na 'bras bu med/ /rlung ni

'khor lo gcig tu bsdu/ /ji srid bsdams pa bzhin du bya/ /rnal 'byor ba yis bshig par bya/ /rang gi rlung sems bshig par bya/ /sbyor ba'i rim pas bshig par bya/ /rlung ni stobs dang ldan byas la/ /dbu ma'i sgo ru gzhug bya ste/ /'khor lo bzhi po

rlung gis dbug /lag gnyis ling+ga'i phyag rgya bca'/ /de ni sa la gzhag nas su/ /rkang pa'i rtse mo sa la gzugs/ /brla ni brdab par bya ba yis/ /rlung gis rlung ni bshig par bya/ /rlung gis rlung la bteg par bya/ /rlung gis rlung ni gsad par bya/ /rlung gis

yongs la khyab pa yis/ /rlung gis dngos grub thams cad sbyin/ /rlung gis 'chi ba med par 'gyur/ /des ni bdud rtsi grub par ni/ /bi R+Wa nga yis yang dag bshad/ /legs par bsdams pa lus kyi las/ /rdo rje rlung rtse bye ba yis/ /lhun po yi ni bar dag tu/ /

dgug pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /tshangs sogs mdud pa bshig par bya/ /lhun po'i steng du lha rnams 'gro/ /lhun po dag ni g.yo 'gyur te/ /des ni thams cad brgyal bar 'gyur/ /tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams bsad/ /dang po yi ni sbyor ba yis/ /tshangs

pa'i mdud pa bshig par bya/ /de nas dbang phyug mdud pa bshig /de bshig nas ni biSh+Nu bshig /de nas gti mug la sogs spangs/ /gtsug tor sgo ni sbas pa la/ /rlung gis sgo ni rnam par dbye/ /de ni 'bigs pa chen po'o/ /bsdam pa che dang 'bigs pa

che/ /phyag rgya che ni gsum pa yin/ /'di ni gsang dbang gsum yin no/ /'di dag gis na sbyor grub grags/ /de nyid gsum ni gang rig pas/ /de ni 'jig rten gsum rig go/ /gang gis 'di la goms byas na/ /thams cad kyi ni mnga' bdag 'gyur/ /

gsang ba lha yi lha rnams dang / /mi yi bdag po'i bdag por 'gyur/ /dbang bskur kun la dbang ba yin/ /thams cad ma lus lhag par 'gyur/ /des na lha rnams kun gyi dbang / /chos kyi phyag rgyar 'dod pa'o/ /phyag rgya che la goms par bya/ /phyag rgya

'di las thams cad 'byung / /grub pa chen po 'byung ba yin/ /phyag rgya chen po gang yin pa/ /rnam gnyis de ni dam pa dang / /'chi ba las ni grol ba dang / /lus sems dag la bde ba 'byung / /sems la gnas pa tsam gyis kyang / /mngal

du skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /dang po'i ming ni yi ge yin/ /sbyor ba ldan pa bshad par bya/ /dad dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba yin/ /rnal 'byor pa ni nges par ni/ /phyag rgya chen po 'grub pa yin/ /phyag rgya chen po bshad par bya/ /rkang pa lag pa bsdam bya ste/ /rlung ni

lan gsum 'thungs byas la/ /rtsa rnams thams cad 'then par bya/ /langs pas rtsa rnams gyen du phyogs/ /nad rnams thams cad bcom nas ni/ /phyag rgya chen po'i don yang rdzogs/ /ji ltar nam mkha' bar snang la/ /sprin tshogs 'bar ba 'khrigs pa

de/ /rlung gi shugs kyis gtor ba ltar/ /de ltar lus 'di dag la ni/ /nad kyis yongs su bsgos gyur kyang / /thabs kyi rlung gis gzhom par bya/ /'di ni phyag rgya chen po'o/ /dz+ha ye d+ha yi karma yi/ /lag pas 'byung ba lnga dag kyang / /las kyi bya bas mnye bya

zhing / /bsdams pa chen pos gnas pa yi/ /stobs kyi 'khor lo 'di yis ni/ /steng du lha yi 'jig rten skrag /lag pa brkyang bskum 'di yis ni/ /phyogs bzhi dag kyang g.yo bar byed/ /rkang pa 'og tu brkyang pa yis/ /klu rnams thams cad skrag par byed/ /

dbang po ngal zhing dub ba'i tshe/ /rtse gcig sems kyi ngang la gzhag /bsdam pa'i sbyor ba bshad par bya/ /rlung gis lus ni 'dzin par 'gyur/ /bsdam pa gnyis ni shes bya ste/ /ji ltar thig le gnas pa dang / /dzo ni b+ha d+ha'i lha mo yin/ /mgrin pa bsdams pa

lha yin no/ /dgang ba can dang bum pa can/ /phyag rgya gzung ba rnam par bya/ /lha dang lha min kun la gsang / /rnal 'byor bsdam par bya ba yis/ /dbu ma'i sgo ru gtad par bya/ /lam gsum rnam par bkag byas la/ /rlung ni nang du gzung bar bya/ /srog ni

rlung yang rlan par bya/ /de ltar byas pas 'og tu 'bab/ /skad cig nyid la bsdam par bya/ /steng 'og rlung gi sbyor ba yis/ /mnyam pa'i rlung dang bsreg par bya/ /des ni gyen du bskyod par bya/ /bshang lam bsdams pa dang ldan pas/ /rlung ni rnam

par bskum pa dang / /gyen du blang ba byas pa yin/ /'khrul 'khor dang ni rlung sbyor gyis/ /dgram dang rab tu bsdam par bya/ /zung 'jug lam gsum bsgom par bya/ /'di ltar mi yi lus la ni/ /grub pa'i lam ni rab gsal ba/ /nyams myong skye zhing

lus rgyas 'gyur/ /rgas par yang ni mi 'gyur ro/ /rtsa rnams rgyun gyis 'bab pa dang / /rtag par 'og tu 'gro ba de/ /bsdams pa chen po 'di yis ni/ /rnam par ldog par 'gyur ba yin/ /gshis ni thur du 'gro ba yin/ /yur ba'i nang du chu 'bab

pa/ /de ni bsdams pas ldog par 'gyur/ /de bzhin nang gi lus la yang / /lus kyi phyi rol 'gro ba de/ /rnal 'byor rtag tu shes par bya/ /lus kyi rtsa ni ma lus pa/ /'dis ni bsdams par rab tu grags/ /bsdams pa 'di yi mthu yis ni/ /

lha rnams kun kyang gsal bar 'gyur/ /de ltar phyag rgya bzhi yis ni/ /lam gsum rnam par bkag pa'o/ /lam gcig pa ni gsal ba'o/ /grub pa lha yi lam du 'gro/ /skye dang 'chi ba'i lam gnyis po/ /'og ni lam du bshad pa yin/ /

bsod nams dang ni sdig rgyu yi/ /de phyir skyon gnyis rnam par spangs/ /rlung gi de nyid bum pa can/ /de ni rab tu mnyam par bya/ /steng gi lam du rnam byas la/ /rlung dang lhan cig sbyor ba yis/ /bsdams pas chu rgyun 'gag pa ltar/ /'gro ba thams

cad rnam par 'gog /des na de yi bka' drin gyis/ /dzo ni gdams pa zhes grags so/ /grub pa'i lam dang yang dag ldan/ /mi ni 'gyur te gzhan du min/ /phyag rgya 'di ni shes pa yis/ /dregs pa yod kyang don dang ldan/ /des na thams cad shes pa yin/ /

bdud rtsi grub pa zhes bya ba slob dpon chen po bi rU pas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po rnal 'byor pa las grub pa thob pa'i rgya gar e de bas bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ DA ki ni u pa ya shrI

d+ha ra mi sa ra b+hi ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro ma'i man ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa gdung ba bcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ba/ bla ma rje btsun rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma rje btsun mchog dang byin

rlabs 'byung ba'i gnas/ /rnal 'byor ma dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams la/ /gus pa mchog gis rab tu rtse gcig 'dud par byas nas kyang / /skal ldan gdung ba gang zag gdung ba gcad pa'i phyir/ /bla ma rnams kyi brgyud pa'i man ngag bri/ /de la

rten gyi gang zag skal ba dang ldan zhing tshogs chen po bsags pa des/ bla ma dam pa rnams yun ring bar bsten cing gdams pas rgyud yongs su bsgos par gyur kyang / gdams ngag gis goms par ma gyur cing / yid gdung ba ma chad pa dag la rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma

rnams kyis/ slob dpon chen po Dom+bi he ru ka la sogs pa rnams la brdar gsungs pa de dag bdag gis bstan par bya'o/ /de'ang mkha' 'gro ma ro mas/ slob dpon Dom+bi he ru ka la lta ba'i gnas lugs brdar gsungs pa/ /til 'bru dang ni sgron mas phyogs kun

gsal bar byed/ /sngags kyis btab pa'i dug ni sman gyi mchog tu gyur pa ste/ /rma bya'i zas ni gzhan du gyur pa yod ma yin/ /tsan+dan dri dang ri dgas gla rtsi'i dri bzhin no/ /chu zla dang ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni tha dad cung zad med/ /sol ba'i rang bzhin gang gi kha dog

nag po dag dang mtshungs/ /ri bo chen po gang gis bskyod par mi nus pas/ /gangs ri'i chu ni gzhan du gyur pa yod min no/ /dper na dri dang sgog skya tha dad gyur pa med/ /nyi ma zla ba'i yon tan gsal ba yin/ /mkha' la bya 'phur rjes ni tshol bas rnyed mi 'gyur/ /

nam mkha'i khams ni rtog ge'i spyod yul ma yin no/ /maN+Dal dag ni phyogs las thams cad rab tu snyoms/ /dper na ro langs dang ni sa pra ko ne bzhin/ /dpa' bo ngo mtshar nor bu shel bzhin no/ /zhes gsungs te/ de dag ni gnas lugs kyi gdung

ba bcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ste dang bo'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma sid+ha d+ha ras/ slob dpon Dom+bi he ru ka la bsgom pa'i don brdar gsungs pa ni/ gnas ni tshang tshing dag gam dur khrod du/ /bdag med pa yi mdza' mo dag dang phrad byas la/ /yid

ni rab dga'i bsam pa yis/ /dper na las zin pa yi skyes bu bzhin/ /dman pa'i don stor nam mkhar khyer bar bya/ /chu bo chen po rgyun du bab pa bzhin/ /drang srong ku shu gtsang ma'i steng du gzhag /mar me'i rtse mo rlung gis mi bskyod dang / /me long

g.ya' med bzhin du gsal bar phyi/ /bu ni yid 'ong bral ba'i ma bzhin du/ /rus sbal dang ni mkhar gzhong nyi ma la/ /rtsal dang ldan pa'i 'phong slob brtson pa ste/ /bsdams pa'i brtson ni nges par grol bar 'gyur/ /sa le sbram las byas pa'i

rgyan bzhin du/ /bu ram dag gi ro la myang bar bya/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni bsgom pa'i gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma lA mas slob dpon he ru ka la spyod pa'i don brdar

gsungs pa ni/ bag ma dang ni smyon ma'i tshul bzhin te/ /glang po btsongs la phag rgod gsad par bya/ /nya ni rgya mtsho chen por yangs pa che/ /nags rnams me yi phung por rab tu bsreg /spyan gzigs zas la rtag tu longs spyod bya/ /res 'ga' mgyogs

pa'i rta la bzhon pa bya/ /gri gug rnon po'i mtshon cha dag gis ni/ /ce spyang dur khrod dag tu rnam par rol/ /'dab chags khra yi rtsal ni shin du drag /wa ni dur khrod nyid du shin du gzhol/ /chang 'thungs pa dang yul rnams gzhol ba 'dra/ /me tog dag la bung ba

rgyu ba bzhin/ /bu chung dang ni seng ge me long mtshungs/ /stag ni 'jigs pa med par kun du rgyu/ /lkugs pa dag ni kha las khyod ma 'da'/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni spyod pa'i gnas lugs gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste gsum

pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma kaM ka ro ma has/ slob dpon Dom+bi he ru ka la nyams su myong ba'i don brdar gsungs pa ni/ dkar po chos ni zla ba'i rim pa ste/ /gzha' tshon dag ni nam mkha' dag la mdzes/ /gzhon nu ma yis ma smras ci ste go/ /'khur ba

chus bkang pa ni smra mi byed/ /khug rna lta bu sni ba'i rnam pa yin/ /dbul po'i rang bzhin gter ldan shin tu ngo mtshar che/ /lan tshwa chu nyid la ni rab tu thim/ /nam mkha'i nyams las 'da' bar mi byed do/ /bslus pa'i chos rnams la ni re bar mi byed cing / /ral

gri'i ngar ni snum gyis nyams par 'gyur/ /rgyal po dag ni rkun pos 'jigs mi byed/ /wa yis seng ge skrag par 'gyur ma yin/ /mkha' lding rnams ni mkha' las dpangs mi dma'/ /'di nyid yin dang ma yin gang yang min/ /sus byas gang yin go ba su

zhig yin/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni nyams su myong ba'i gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste bzhi pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma ma tre yis slob dpon Dom+bi he ru ka la 'bras bu'i gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i brdar gsungs

pa ni/ yi ge bzhi pa dag gis zla ba rgyas/ /he ru ka yi nam mkha'i ngang nyid de/ /rdo rje dang ni pad+ma yi ge bral/ /kha T+wAM ga ni nyi ma'i 'od zer bzhin/ /rdo rje dang ni ljon shing 'bras bu ste/ /bya ni ngang pa chu na rtag tu gnas/ /pad+ma'i sdong bu 'dab ma rab tu rgyas/ /Da ma ru ni bung

ba'i rtsi dang mtshungs/ /bdud rtsi skal ldan rnams la chu shel te/ /rin chen bdun la rgyal pos mnga' yang mdzad/ /rnam grangs rnams ni ras kyis shes la bkab/ /kun 'dar ma la bye brag gang yang med/ /rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i seng ge gangs la gnas/ /shel ni phyi

nang med par shin du dag /btso ma'i gser ni dri ma'i g.ya' dang bral/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag 'bras bu'i gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste lnga pa'o// //mkha' 'gro ma ma ha las/ slob dpon Dom+bi he ru ka la/ gang du

gsungs pa de dag kyang / gnyis med kyi rnal 'byor du bya ba'i brdar gsungs pa ni/ rgyal po rnams ni rin chen skal bar ldan/ /sman pa bzang dang phrad par gyur pa las/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mun pa sel ba ltar/ /rus sbal rgya mtsho dag tu 'gro mi 'gyur/ /

stobs ldan gyad kyis pha rol 'joms par byed/ /ri bo 'gyel na chu rnams 'brub par byed/ /nags khrod dag na rngon pa glu rnams len/ /me shel ras bal 'dus pas me 'byung 'gyur/ /gser 'gyur rtsi ni shin tu ngo mtshar che/ /chu dang bcas pa'i skye shing

lo 'dab rgyas/ /sbur len nor bu dag ni sbur rnams sdud/ /shes pa rnams ni gzhan gyi lus la 'jug /spre'u rnams ni dran par ldan pa ste/ /mnyam pas 'gro ba dag ni sgrol bar byed/ /ga bur sbyor bas tshad pa'i nad rnams sel/ /dge slong bag dang ldan pa

gso sbyong byed/ /rigs ngan rgyal po'i khab tu mi gnas te/ /bcad par gyur na tA la'i lo 'dab med/ /sgyu ma mkhan po sgyu ma'i longs spyod mkhas/ /rgyal po'i bu mo rgyan dang rab tu ldan/ /gar mkhan rnams ni gar gyi rnam pa byed/ /sbrang ma rnams ni ngan skyugs nang

du rgyug /ces gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste drug pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma be tos/ /bla ma zangs gling pa la kap+pu ra la zung 'jug gi rnal 'byor gyi brda gsungs pa

ni/ khri snyan sa le snying rje ldan pa ste/ /ma ni bu la rab tu chags pa'o/ /bu ram shing las bu ram 'byung ba ltar/ /rgya mtshor phyin pas nor bu rnyed par 'gyur/ /chu yi nang gi zla ba sel mi byed/ /nor bu me shel rtsol sgrub dag dang bral/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo rgyal

po nyid kyang yin/ /tshong pa tshong 'dus dag tu gnas par byed/ /rdza mkhan dag ni so btang rdza la spyod/ /sprin dang bral ba'i nam mkha' rab tu dngas/ /dmu rgod mi srun brtul bas zhon par byed/ /mdza' bo dag gis gsungs pas re ba med/ /rmi

lam sad pas dgra dang yongs su bral/ /khyim bdag mtshon cha'i 'khor lo rab tu rno/ /chom rkun rab tu mang bas mel tshe mkhas/ /chu rnams ma lus rgya mtsho ro gcig 'gyur/ /pha lam rdo rjes dngos po thams cad 'bigs/ /smig rgyu'i chu yis gdung bar mi byed

do/ /gzha' chon yal ba dag la sdug bsngal med/ /rmi lam rmis pa'i nor la ster mi byed/ /brag ca'i sgra la rang nyid dga' ba ste/ /bram ze chang 'thung ba ni shin tu gsang / /rnal 'byor rnal 'byor rnal 'byor shin tu che/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni zung 'jug

gi rnal 'byor gyi gnas lugs kyi gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste bdun pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma khaN+Da ro has/ slob dpon Dom+bi he ru ka la/ pad+mo kha 'byed pa'i gdams pa brdar gsungs pa ni/ dbul po rnams ni nor med sdug bsngal de/ /

nang byed mtshan mo dag gi dus su ni/ /rgyal po'i bang mdzod bdag nyid brku bar bya/ /ma skyes dpe med mdzes pa'i grogs brkus la/ /shin tu mgar ba mkhas pa'i lde mig gis/ /gze ma bzhi bsten sgo lcags dbye bar bya/ /slar yang sgo de dam du gcad par

bya/ /rkong gtan gzhug cing rked gzer bsdam par bya/ /sgo ba po de yongs su gsad bya zhing / /'bru mar 'bab pa stegs byas la/ /btsa' med lcags las byas pa dag gi gris/ /rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa mgo bcad de/ /dmag dpon chen po dug gis

gsad par bya/ /mel tse ba dang blon po rnams kyang bsad/ /de nas rgyal po'i bang mdzod kha phye la/ /gos bzang dag gis yongs su dril ba yi/ /gser dang dngul gyi ga'u kha phye la/ /phyogs med pa yi nor bu rin chen blta/ /mar me dang ni nam mkha'i bu mo'i

tshul/ /nyi ma dang ni zla bas bdud rtsi 'thigs/ /che bas che ba'i rab tu che ba nyid/ /rma bya khyi dang phag dang smyon pa nying / /sha za bung ba shin du rol bar byed/ /ces gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni pad+mo kha dbye ba'i man ngag gi gnas lugs brdar gsungs pa'i gdams pa

ste brgyad pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor pa te lo pas dpal nA ro pa la/ bla ma'i chos bcu drug pa zhes bya ba'i gdams pa brdar gsungs pa ni/ sa gzhi bzang po dag gi thun mong la/ /blo dman rnams kyis las la ma zhugs shing / /sdug bsngal nad kyis gzir

ba bsal ba'i phyir/ /ded dpon lta bu dag gis sems bskyed la/ /mu tig 'phyang ba chen po gzung byas la/ /'byung ba sa chu me rlung dbang du bsdus/ /rgya mtsho chen po bzhi nas rin chen btsal/ /sbrang rtsi'i bcud ni mar gyi snying por ldan/ /goms par bya zhing bzo la

byang bar bya/ /phye ma leb dang ri dgas bung ba dang / /nya dang glang chen dag las rab tu grol/ /dug mdas ma phog phog kyang slar la gso/ /tha rgod chu yis rab tu bangs par bya/ /rab tu nor mang phyug cing shin du phyug /zhing pa'i las la rab tu gus par 'gyur/ /ma yis

bu ni rab tu smin par byed/ /'joms byed seng ge'i bla ma de dag la/ /lus ngag yid gus yo byad ci dgos dbul/ /gus par ldan pas de 'dra yang dang yang / /rtsal med rten cing bsnyen bkur rab tu 'bad/ /ces gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni bla ma chos de rnams dang

ldan pa'i sdig pa'i grogs po spang ba ste dgu pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor pa te lo pas/ dpal na ro pa la slob ma'i chos bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i brdar gsungs pa ni/ gcan gzan mche ba dag gis ma rungs rma med pa/ /sdug bsngal btson ra 'di na yun

ring nad kyis thebs/ /khang bzangs dam pa nad med bde ba yon tan ldan/ /klu yi rgyal po 'gro la char rgyun rtag tu 'bebs/ /dug sdong lo 'dab rgyas pa'i lo 'dab 'bras bu chags pa med/ /spu gri'i sor chags sbrang rtsi'i ro rnams rtag tu spong bar byed/ /bde ba'i chos

kun gsod par ldan pa'i skyes bu sems stobs ldan/ /rma yod bag yod gnas mi byed/ /mi bzad nad kyis gzir ba sman pa dag la rab tu gus/ /skom pas rab gdungs nges par btung ba 'ba' zhig sgrub par byed/ /rlan bral rus

sbal rgya mtsho chen po mthong na rab tu dga'/ /mgo la me lces zin pa myur du sel bar byed/ /rin chen snod mchog de dag tu/ /ro mchog bcud kyis nges par 'gengs/ /mun pa dag la sgron me bzhin/ /skal ldan bya ba gsal bar byed/ /slob ma chos de rnams dang

ldan pa bsten/ /de las bzlog pa spang bar bya'o/ /slob ma bsten pa'i gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu pa'o// //de nas mkha' 'gro ma kaM ka ro ma has/ bla ma zangs gling pa na kap+pu ra la 'khrul pa'i shes pa gcad pa'i brda brgyad gsungs pa ni/ byis

pa chung ngur gyur pa rnams kyis ni/ /me long bzhin la tha dad dag tu rtogs/ /shin du blo gros dman pa'i ri mo mkhan/ /rang gis bris pa'i ri mo dag la skrag /mkhris pa'i nad kyis btab pa'i mig can dag /mthong ba'i yul rnams dag la chags sdang skye/ /ji ltar

dar gyi srin bu dag gis ni/ /rang gi kha chu'i rnam pas 'ching bar byed/ /mi mkhas dman pa'i gang zag la de ni/ /sgyu ma'i 'phrul gyi rnam pas bslus pa yin/ /rgya dang rnyi la sogs pas ri dgas ni/ /rang dbang med par rab tu bsdams par 'gyur/ /mi mthun dgra

yis zin par gyur pa'i btson/ /lcags sgrog dam pa dag gis bcings gyur la/ /rmi lam na ni khri mon dong bcug pa/ /de tshe sdug bsngal mi bzod skye ba yin/ /bla ma bsten cing nges shes bskyed/ /gnyug ma goms par bsten par bya/ /'khrul pa yi ni shes pa nyid/ /

rig pa nyid de ye shes nyid/ /'khrul pa'i shes pa spangs byas la/ /gnyug ma'i ye shes goms par bya'o/ /'khrul pa'i shes pa ngo shes par bya ba'i gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu gcig pa'o// //lho phyogs kyi grong khyer du mkha' 'gro ma bi la de wis/

rnal 'byor pa'i smyon pa'i brtul zhugs la ri ta pa la la/ de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor nyi shu brdar gsungs pa ni/ zhing pa rnams ni rim gyis las la 'jug /shing rta dag ni 'khor lo gnyis dang ldan/ /dpe med nam mkha' nyid du gnas/ /rig pa'i mdangs ni

thams cad 'bigs par byed/ /chu yi nang du ut+pal shin tu mdzes/ /rtog pa bral ba rgya mtsho chen po nyid/ /mun nag rab tu spangs pa nam mkha' ste/ /drang srong gnas pa shing lo'i gos/ /rtsal rdzogs seng ge gangs la da rung gnas/ /'dab ldan bya ni mkha' la

mthon por gcod/ /sman mchog be ta'i 'bras bu gdod nas grub/ /'bru mar snod khyer skad cig tsam mi yengs/ /dka' thub can ni shin du bag dang ldan/ /ri yi khrod na ljon shing rab tu rgyas/ /bram ze 'jug ngogs dag na dri ma 'khru/ /thag pa'i 'jur pa lhod par

lhod/ /gang+gA'i chu ni rgya mtsho chen por 'bab/ /gdol pa dag ni rab tu slong mos 'tsho/ /mdzes pa rtag tu me long lta bar byed/ /ri rgyal ri bo mchog rab rtag tu brtan/ /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni de kho na nyid kyi rnal 'byor nyi shu brdar gsungs pa'o/ /de kho

na nyid kyi rnal 'byor shes par bya ba'i gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o// //de nas rnal 'byor ci to mas/ /rje btsun ri khrod pa la zag bcas kyi bde ba las su rung bar bya ba'i phyir/ gdams pa brdar gsungs pa/ rten cing 'brel pa dag

gi las rnams ni/ /phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub par byed/ /dus rnams kun+da zla ba rgyas pa yin/ /mun pa'i tshogs rnams nges par sel byed na/ /tsha sgo med pa'i zhing pa dag gis ni/ /'bras bu'i nus pa yongs su skyed par byed/ /'khor lo gnyis dang

rab tu ldan pa yis/ /shing rta mgyogs pa'i shugs kyis pha rol 'gro/ /rten thabs mkhas pa rnams kyi chu lud kyis/ /zhing pa'i myu gu rab tu rgyas par byed/ /ji srid 'dab ma ma rdzogs pa yi bya/ /de srid 'jam pa'i tshang na rten par byed/ /tshad pas gdungs pa'i dug

gi sprul rnams ni/ /bya ba gzhan dag btang nas tsan+dan snyegs/ /zo chu rgyud mo mkhan po 'dod par ni/ /chu rnams ji ltar bsring par byed/ /'di ni thun mong ma yin gdams pa ste/ /rtag tu bla ma mchog la gus pa dang / /tshogs bsags rgyud sbyangs

pa yi spyod yul te/ /skal ba dang ni ldan pas 'bad par bya/ /zhes gsungs te/ de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi grogs stobs yan lag brdar gsungs pa ste bcu gsum pa'o// //dur khrod chen po ha har sgrogs pa zhes bya bar slob dpon chen po Dom+bi he ru kas/

tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa'i dus su/ 'du bar 'os pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ /rdo rje slob dpon du gyur pa rnams kyis bab col du bdud rtsi chu bo lta bu'i gdams ngag mi bya bar/ gdams pa bran ltar rang dbang med pa'i mi

rnams la/ /rje bo bzhin du bde ba'i dus skabs med/ /g.ya' ma phyis pa'i me long ngos dag la/ /bzhin ni gzugs brnyan gsal bar gyur pa med/ /rgyu dang bral ba'i gzhung dang 'phong mkhan dang / /rtsal dang ldan yang srid mi byed/ /snod nang ma bkrus shin tu

btsog pa'i nang / /ro mchog zas bzang dag gis 'gengs pa med/ /tshad ldan zhing pa mkhas pa dag rnams kyis/ /dus min sa bon 'debs pa yongs su spong / /rkun po blo gros gzhan la gtams pas na/ /brkus par gyur kyang sdug bsngal rtag tu skyes/ /gtsub

shing yan lag rdzogs par ma gyur pa/ /me ni 'byung bar rung ba nam yang med/ /bag yod blo ldan mkhas pa gang zhig gis/ /zhabs med snod du bcud rnams blugs mi byed/ /'bru mar 'bar bar me 'dod skyes bu ni/ /rtag tu rlung rnams g.yo bar byed cing gnas/ /

dug can sprul ni mkhas pa dag rnams kyis/ /mthong bar mi 'dod thag ring yongs su spong / /zhes gsungs pa ste/ de dag ni slob dpon Dom+bi he ru kas rdo rje slob dpon du gyur pa rnams la bdud rtsi lta bu'i man ngag snod ma brtags pa rnams la mi bstan pa ste

bcu bzhi pa'o// //rje btsun nA ro pas bla ma gangs gseng pa la/ nor bu rin po che ngos gzung ba'i gdams ngag bstan pa ni/ nang gi mun pa'i rgya mtsho chen po ru/ /rin thang med pa'i nor bu rab stor bas/ /ze ma lnga dang rab tu ldan pa yis/ /mche ba gnyis gtsigs

phag pa zos par 'gyur/ /lcags sna gsum las brdungs pa'i ral gri yis/ /phag pa'i sha dang rus pa so sor dbye/ /de nas nor bu rin chen btsal bar bya/ /rnyed par gyur na chu yis bkru/ /de nas rgyal mtshan rtse la phyar bar bya/ /'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab pas

'byung / /dri ma med pa'i nor bu rin chen de/ /nges par nam mkha'i dkyil du sba bar bya/ /nor bu lhun po ri yi rtse la gzhag /nor bu me dang chu yis rab tu btul/ /nor bu bya yi 'dab ma gdags par bya/ /nor bu chu bo chen po'i gzhung la bskur/ /nor bu mar me'i ngos

la bstan par bya/ /nor bu smon pa'i lag tu gtad la gzhag /nor bu me long ngos la bstan la gzhag /nor bu ras bal phung po'i steng du gzhag /nor bu rin chen dri za'i grong du bcol/ /nor bu rin chen rgyal po'i gter du sba bar bya/ /nor bu rin chen me dpung dkyil du

sba/ /nor bu rin chen rkun po'i nor nyid yin/ /nor bu rin chen shel gyi steng du gzhag /nor bu nor can bstan pa'i nor/ /nor bu'i nor ni btsal zhes gsungs pa ste/ /de dag ni ye shes kyi nor bu ngos gzung ba'i thabs brdar gsungs pa'o/ /rang gi gnyug ma'i de kho na nyid

kyi ye shes ngos gzung ba'i gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa ste bco lnga pa'o// //slob ma skal ldan tshogs bsags rin chen lta bu'i gang zag 'di/ /dpag tu med pa'i gdams ngag rnams kyis rgyud dag yongs su sbyangs gyur kyang / /gdung ba chad par ma gyur bla ma rnams

kyis yongs su gdungs gyur pa/ /gdams ngag rnams dang bla ma'i gdung ba gcad phyir brgyud pa'i man ngag bkod/ /rje btsun mchog dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams bzod mdzod la/ /de las byung ba'i dge ba zla ba lta bu'i dri ma med pa des/ /'gro ba ma lus yid

kyi gdung ba yongs su gcad par gyur nas kyang / /phyag rgya chen po'i dri med sa la ma lus yongs su rdzogs gyur cig /mkha' 'gro ma'i gdams ngag snyan nas snyan du brgyud pa'i gdung ba gcad pa'i gdams pa zhes bya'o/ /sprul pa'i rnal 'byor pas

gzhung du bkod pa rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mu drA badzra gI ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu zhes bya ba/ dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /na mo d+harma kA ya/ ma hA su kha ye/ kye ho gnyis med rdo rje 'di ltar nyon/ /gang

zhig mig med pa yis lam mkhan bsten/ /bu chung dpa' bo ma la rag lus te/ /me long bstan pas bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gsal/ /ngang pa'i mchu yis chu dang 'o ma 'byed/ /bskal pa'i mun pa sel byed sgron me ste/ /gter gyi bang mdzod 'byed pa'i lde mig

mchog /mi zad gter chen 'byin pa'i rgyal po bsten/ /dbul po bsten pas bdag nyid dbul por 'gyur/ /nam mkha' rgya mtsho nyi zla gsum ldan bsten/ /ne tso'i kha thon snyan pas ci zhig phan/ /'dab chags bu ni mkha' la 'phur na bde/ /dud 'gro g.yang la

bskyur na gson mi rung / /nyi zla gza' bral sprin rlung btab na gsal/ /sprin sangs gyur kyang gzas zin snang ba med/ /chu skyes pad+ma'i bcud ni bung bas len/ /sha sbrang drung na gnas kyang de ltar min/ /chu shel chu ni rkyen dang 'dzom pa gces/ /seng ge'i 'o ma snod

ngan phal par min/ /oM AHhUM e ma ho/ /snang srid thams cad nam mkha' nyid las byung / /nam mkha' yod med phyogs rgyu kha dog bral/ /thog ma bar dang tha ma 'gro 'ong med/ /'byung bzhi rab tu 'khrugs kyang 'gyur mi srid/ /rkyen gyis dkar nag snang yang dkar nag

med/ /rgya mtsho gting zab rgya che sna tshogs 'char/ /dba' rlabs ri bo 'dra yang rgya mtsho'i ngang / /chab rom brag 'dra chu las yong ma 'das/ /sa la sna tshogs 'khrungs kyang zad pa med/ /bsregs bcad bdar yang gser gyi ngo mi 'gyur/ /me ni tsha zhing chu ni rlan mi

'bral/ /sprul pa drug ni rab tu rtogs par gyis/ /nam mkha' stong las stong pa 'byung ba ste/ /rkyen gyis me chu 'byung yang shel gyi ngo mi 'gyur/ /bka' rtags phyag rgya gnyug ma zhes brjod do/ /sa 'og gser dang gyad kyi nor bu dang / /dbul po'i gter dang bum pa'i

mar me ltos/ /nor bu rin chen mi gtsang 'dam du bying / /sgyu mar ma shes rgyal po a thang chad/ /thag pa sbrul du mthong bas brgyal nas shi/ /mar me nyi ma dmus long mun par snang / /mi gtsang dri za tsan+dan dri la 'bros/ /mig skyon can gyis zla ba gnyis su mthong / /

glang po bzhag nas glang po'i rjes tshol ba/ /bu chung me long gzugs brnyan mthong bas dga'/ /ri dgas 'khrul pa smig rgyu chu la snyeg /gser ma shes pa rag na phye ma 'chang / /ko chu glang rjes chu ni myur du skam/ /rkyal med pa dag rgya mtshor zhugs na 'bying / /lam mkhan

med par dmun long lam 'gro dang / /'dab gshog med pa'i bya dag 'phur na ltung / /dug lo bregs nas bsgyur kyang ci zhig phan/ /mun khung dag tu sgron me bteg pas gsal/ /thag pa gcig chod mdud pa brgya grol te/ /thag pa mes tshig dag gis 'ching mi nus/ /

gser 'gyur rtsi yis zangs lcags gser du 'gyur/ /rma byas btsan dug zos pas spu thog rgyas/ /mig dang ldan pas rkang pa gar gzhag phyin/ /dbang gi rgyal po gcig la 'dod dgu rdzogs/ /khyung phrug gshog rdzogs mkha' la 'phur na bde/ /mar me bteg

pas mun pa'i lam gsal zhing / /cang shes sgrog tu bcug pa phye bas grol/ /ngang pa chu la 'o ma len pa ltos/ /dgra skugs btsal bas 'jigs pa sangs nas 'gro/ /nam mkha' ma mthong nam mkha' mthong ba ste/ /rgya dang rgya yi 'bur ni log par 'byung / /mar me

bsad pas lus dang grib ma med/ /sgyu ma bshig pas 'du shes rnam lnga spangs/ /chu la chu bzhag de nyid dbyer med 'gyur/ /nam mkha'i me tog ri bong rwa zhes bya/ /gzings la 'phur ba'i bya ni slar la ldog /gang zhig chab rom spangs nas chu tshol ba/ /rgyu rkyen rtsol

bas byas pa rang 'byung min/ /dbul po mi nor rgya yis 'debs pa dang / /sa bon 'bras bu tha dad 'dzin pa 'khrul/ /rkun ma ngos ma zin par rab mda' sbren/ /kye ma 'di ni sbrul dang rig sngags mtshon cha 'dra/ /rta rngas sprul la mdud pa brgyab pa

grol/ /mkha' la mdung bskor las zin skyes bu bde/ /khyung chen mkha' lding nyam nga 'jigs pa med/ /ri mtho'i kha na yul khams sna tshogs gsal/ /bu yi sdug bsngal ma yis mthong mi bzod/ /ral gri ngar mas dngos po ma lus gcod/ /smyon par gyur

kyang dug la reg mi byed/ /bu chung yin yang gtsug gi nor mi 'bral/ /AHoM hUM/ e ma ho/ /me don gnyer bas du ba shugs kyis 'byung / /nor bu rnyed na so nam 'bad mi dgos/ /mi gcig skyes pas shing la 'dod lnga 'byung / /skyur po zos na mthong bas nyams su myong / /

sngar 'dris mi dang phrad na the tshom med/ /skyes bu nam mkhas bzung ba thar mi srid/ /rmi lam sgyu ma'i mtshon gyis gnod pa med/ /dngul rdo'o ma bur shing til mar ltos/ /chu ni mthong dang thos pas skom mi sel/ /sman pa'i ngag mi nyan pa'i nad pa de/ /zas nor byin pas

rang nyid bkres nas shi/ /gter mdzod bgrangs pas rang gis thob pa med/ /'on pa sil snyan long ba ri mo mkhan/ /byis pa mna' gtam dmus long yul khams ston/ /sgo nga ma yis gab na bye'u phrug smin/ /rdo la bzhu btul byas na rin chen nor/ /spang ma mnan nas

bsings pas gar chang 'byung / /bu chung gsos pas dpa' bo'i las rnams nus/ /rgyal bu tshar nas yul khams dbang thob ste/ /mkha' la sprin dengs 'khyags pa chur thim 'gyur/ /mkha' lding rgyal po spro bsdu med par gnas/ /chu ni ma rnyogs rang dngas nyid du

zhog /ji ltar mkhas pas ba lang skyong ba bzhin/ /brtan gsal rno ba mar me'i snying po ltos/ /sgyu ma'i skyes bu chags zhen rtsis gdab med/ /bya ni nam mkhar rten med gnas par byed/ /tshos ma rnams kyis ras gos dag par bkru/ /mkhar spe rtsig na 'gram gzhi

legs par thing / /ma yi sdug bsngal bu yis mthong bar gyis/ /yid bzhin nor bu spyi bo'i gtsug tu bzhag /nam mkha' lta na 'ja' tshon lus su bsgyur/ /dmu rgod rta ni thabs kyis zung la 'tshos/ /ri gzar 'bab chu yang yang brdabs na drungs/ /spre'u zin na kun

la yang rtsal sbyang / /bsags pa'i yo byad chags med kun la sbyin/ /bying zhing rmugs na 'dab chags mkha' la spur/ /yang na bum pa kha sbyor rlung gis khong / /rgod na khong stong rkun ma sprin la ltos/ /rgya mtsho'i dba' rlabs chu zlar shes par bya/ /rkun ma mthong zhing

tshor na ldog par nges/ /rtsa ba sman na thams cad sman zhes bya/ /nor bu rin chen sa yi gter du sba/ /yang na ri dwags gar song der la gsod/ /ltogs na dug la sngags kyis btab la bza'/ /snyoms las byis pa'i nyam nga g.yang sa ltos/ /snying la gces pa dur khrod

gnas su skyol/ /na tsha byung na rkyal pa stong par gyis/ /de la bu ga thod la mes tshig me la gdungs/ /sman ma zhu na slar yang nad du 'gyur/ /rtsa dang gser gnyis 'ching byed khyad par med/ /shes pa 'thums na yul khams skor zhing blta/ /rkang 'gros bu lan 'og rta

rol la spos/ /dpa' rtsal zhen na dpa' rtsal kun la sbyang / /me don gnyer bas gtsub shing drag tu gtsubs/ /ri bo mi bskyod chu bo rgyun chad med/ /gser gling phyin nas sa rdo btsal mi rnyed/ /shing bral 'dab ma shin du yang la sogs/ /yid bzhin nor bu yod na dgos

'dod 'byung / /AHoM hUM/ e ma ho/ /bya 'phur nam mkha' dag las mi 'da' ste/ /sna tshogs nor bu tshon gyi kha dog snang / /gser dang gser gyi rgyan la 'gyur ba med/ /'dam skyes pad+ma 'dam gyis mi gos so/ /gang dag 'jigs sar skyel ma sangs nas 'gro/ /rgyal

po gang zhig rgyal srid bor nas 'khyam/ /sum cu rtsa gsum thos pa ne tsho'i chos/ /chu la mar khu blugs pas 'dres pa min/ /bya rgod rnyis zin glang chen 'dam du bying / /nor bu rin chen lung khung dag tu bor/ /rgyal blon 'dzom na rgyal srid mnga' thang 'phel/ /mig dang

rkang par ldan pas don sar phyin/ /dpa' bo'i go mtshon blon po bka' rtags khyer/ /rtsis med smyon pa zhen med bu chung dang / /rtog med phrag dang glang chen chur 'jug ltos/ /phrag rgod rnams ni dug sbrul mi gtong za/ /dbul po rin chen rgyal po'i

mkhar du sba/ /gso sbyong spyad rnams rig pa mda' yis bsnun/ /yul khams kun gyi dgra rnams srid du gcad/ /dpa' bo gang yin de yis dgra rnams 'dul/ /mkha' lding rgyal po phye leb spyod yul min/ /rigs ngan rgyal po wa yis seng lpags gyon/ /nags

la me mched gdong du gar bab sreg /me 'bar ba la rlung gis bskyod na 'bar/ /rin chen snod sbyar mi gtsang phyis pa sangs/ /smyon pa bu chung khyi phag seng ge bzhin/ /AHoM hUM/ e ma ho/ /chu rnams thams cad rgya mtsho chen por gcig /gang zhig ltogs pa'i dus su

zas ster ba/ /nad rnams gso ba sman pa'i rgyal po ste/ /chu bo chen po sgrol ba'i mnyen pa mchog /gnod pa'i dgra rnams 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ste/ /dge bshes rgyal po phyogs med kun la snyoms/ /mkhas pa dag gis 'ja' tshon blta bar bya/ /gnad du bsnun pa'i

tshor ba spangs pa med/ /bung ba me tog dag la chags zhen bral/ /nya ni rtag tu chu las yong mi 'da'/ /rtsi sman yod kyang dug la reg mi byed/ /ji ltar phyug po so nam byed pa ltos/ /seng ge'i 'o ma lkugs pa'i kha bzhin bsdam/ /smyon pas rang gi snying la mtshon

bsnun dang / /gshed mas zin pa'i chad pas bcad pa'i mi/ /sa bon rul pa myu gu yong mi skye/ /tshe lo sum cu nyi shu bcu pa bzhin/ /gang zhig ye shes nyi ma shar nas nub/ /dbul pos nor bu rin chen rnyed nas bor/ /gang dag cang shes rta la zhon nas 'bab/ /ji

ltar dbul po'i nor bu rgyal pos phrogs/ /yid bzhin nor bu mchod na dgos 'dod 'byung / /dngul dkar me long yang yang phyis na gsal/ /brgya byin lha yi longs spyod 'bad pa med/ /me tog pad+ma bung ba'i tshogs rnams 'du/ /AHoM hUM/ e ma ho/ /po ta la la

nam langs nyi shar mnyam/ /'jim pa'i logs la btab pa'i bde gshegs sku/ /myu gu me tog 'bras bu rim gyis smin/ /dbang po skyon dang bral na gzugs rnams mthong / /shel gong dri ma med pa'i phyi nang gsal/ /sgyu ma mkhan gyis mkhas pa sna tshogs ston/ /rdo rje

pha lam gang gis gzhom par min/ /yid bzhin nor bus mi mthun gnod pa sel/ /seng ge mngal rgya khyung phrug gong rgya bral/ /mkha' la nyi shar 'od zer phyogs bcur khyab/ /srin bu bung ba gnas gyur mkha' la 'phyo/ /yid bzhin nor bu rtog med dgos 'dod 'byung /

rang gis grib ma mthong bas 'bros pa dang / /ri dgas smig rgyu rnyeg pa nor ba ste/ /dgra la zin du mthong na nges par gsod/ /'khyag pa'i rang bzhin chu ru shes par byos/ /nyi zla'i ngos la 'char nub gsal 'grib med/ /rin chen byi dor byas na dgos 'dod 'byung / /e

ma ho/ /de ltar bstan pa'i don de thams cad kyang / /rang bzhin las dang 'bras bu gsum du gnas/ /gzhi la chos sku lhun gyis grub pa na/ /de phyir sku gsum lhun gyis grub par gnas/ /rang bzhin stong pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo/ /lam ni mtshan med rnam par thar pa'i

sgo/ /'bras bu smon med rnam par thar pa'i sgo/ /sgo gsum phyed pas sku gsum zhal mthong 'gyur/ /'on kyang thams cad brdzun pa'i rang bzhin la/ /don la ched du bya ba ci yang med/ /shin tu gsang ba rdo rje'i tshig 'di dag /khyod kyis ye shes rig pas rtogs par gyis/ /

dpal sha ba ri dbang phyug dang / mkha' 'gro ma ye shes kyi spyan ma dang / pad+ma'i spyan gyi zhal snga nas snying po'i don mgur du bzhengs pa phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i glu brda brgyud gsang ba'i sgron ma rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra gI ti/ bod skad du/

rdo rje'i glu/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam par rtog pa'i gdon chen pos/ /zin par gyur pa'i smyon pa dag /rdo shing sogs la gser du mthong / /de la rin chen gser yod min/ /rnam rtog gdon gyi rjes 'brangs nas/ /skad cig skad cig

bcings par 'gyur/ /shes rab snying brtser bcas pa yi/ /de gzhom pa la 'bad par gyis/ /slob dpon chen po nA ro pa'i rdo rje'i glu rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra gI ti/ bod skad du/ rdo rje'i glu/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i

rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnam rtog sbrul gdug g.yo can gyis/ /zin par gyur to rang gi sems/ /ji lta ji ltar rnam rtog pa/ /de lta de ltar rnam par bcings/ /don med sdug bsngal mang po myong / /'khrul pa'i rjes su 'brangs pa yis/ /'khrul pa spangs par mi

'gyur te/ /dpa' bo snying rjer ldan pa yis/ /de bzhin nyid la goms par gyis/ /ji lta ji ltar rnam dpyad na/ /de lta de ltar rnam par 'bral/ /shes rab sbrul gdug mgo mang gis/ /bdag nyid la ni za bar byed/ /shes rab sbrul gdug mgo mang ni/ /ting 'dzin 'o mas rtag tu

gsos/ /rnam rtog ne'u le gsod par byed/ /shes rab sprul mgo brgya pa yis/ /nA ro pa la rtag tu za/ /de ni su yis shes pa yin/ /nA ro pa ni nyid kyis shes/ /nA ro pa ni nyid la dris/ /ma hA yo ga nA ro pa'i rdo rje'i glu rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra gI ti/

bod skad du/ rdo rje'i glu/ thugs rje chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ji ltar na nga / de ltar na khyod/ tha dad par byed pa rnam par rtog pa/ bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho las sprul 'dos/ /chom rnam par rtog pa/ rdo rje'i glu rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ badzra gI ti/ bod skad du/ rdo rje'i

glu/ dpal rdo rje gdan pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ /smra'o/ /nag po pa'i yid gang du yang mi gnas par thams cad ca le col ler snang ngo / /slob dpon nag po zhabs kyis rdo rje'i glu rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsa tur shI ti ba bo d+hA hr-i dA ya nA ma/ bod skad du/ grub thob

brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rtogs pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ ngag gi dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/ /yang dag don rtogs sangs rgyas dang 'dra grub pa'i zhabs la gus btud nas/ /gang zhig sems can 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor mi dge las kyi chu srin gyis/ /rab tu g.yengs shing khrid gyur

de dag gdon phyir rnal 'byor dpa' bo yis/ /grub pa dag gi nyams myong rtogs pa'i lta ba phreng bar bsdeb par bya/ /gu ru lU yi pa'i zhal nas/ khyi rgod mi srun sna la sbrang rtsi bskus pas phyogs rnams kun du za bar byed/ /de bzhin blo dman skal min rnams la bla ma'i man ngag

byin pas rang rgyud bsregs/ /skal ldan skye med rtogs pa rnams ni snang ba tug phrad tsam gyis rnam rtog 'joms/ /dper na glang chen rab brtan myos pa'i sna la ral gri btags pas dgra dpung 'joms/ /gu ru li la pa'i zhal nas/ tshad med bzhi yi dgon pa ru/ /rnal 'byor

rgyal po seng ge bzhin/ /mgo la g.yu mdog ral lngas brgyan/ /rnal 'byor dbang rtags rigs lnga 'chang / /seng ge'i sder mo bcu dag gis/ /glang po la sogs sha rus 'byed/ /rnal 'byor pha rol phyin bcu yis/ /rnam rtog mi mthun phyogs rnams 'byed/ /

li las de ltar rtogs nas grol/ /gu ru bi rU pa'i zhal nas/ phyag rgya chen po'i ngang nas lhan cig skyes pa de/ /mi bsam mi rigs bdag med rang gi ngang la gzhag /chad par mi 'gyur nyams su myong bar rang gis rig /rtag par mi 'gyur mngon zhen med pas zung du 'jug/ /

gu ru Dom+bi pa'i zhal nas/ gser 'gyur rtsi yi nus pa yis/ /lcags rnams gser du bsgyur ba ltar/ /rin chen dbang gi nus pa yis/ /nyon mongs gnyis med ye shes bsgyur/ /gu ru sha ba ri pa'i zhal nas/ ma rig pa yi nags tshal du/ /gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi ri

dgas rgyu/ /thabs shes gnyis kyi gzhu bdungs nas/ /snying po'i don gyi mda' gcig 'phangs/ /'chi ni rnam par rtog pa 'chi/ /sha ni gnyis su med par zos/ /ro ni bde ba chen por myong / /'bras bu phyag rgya chen po thob/ /gu ru sa ra ha'i zhal nas/ kye ho grogs dag

lhan cig skyes pa de/ /gzhan nas mi rnyed bla ma dam pa'i zhal nas rnyed/ /don dam zhal gyi ngo bo de rtogs na/ /yid la 'chi ba med cing lus la 'chad pa med/ /gu ru kaM ka li'i zhal nas/ ji ltar nam mkha' stong pa la/ /gcig dang gcig gnyis spangs pa'i gzugs/ /rang

snang ye shes btsun mo de/ /dpe med tha snyad kun las 'das/ /gu ru min pa'i zhal nas/ lcags kyu thogs pa'i nya pa ni/ /las dbang rgya mtsho'i nang du khyer/ /nya chen lus la rten bcas nas/ /lha chen gdams ngag nyams blangs pas/ /yon tan

sa dang rdo dag gis/ /ma theg min pa zhes su grags/ /gu ru g+ho ra kha'i zhal nas/ rigs ni rab dang 'bring dang tha ma ru/ /gnas pa'i rgyu la rkyen gyi stobs ldan pas/ /'gag med las dbang 'bras bu ngo mtshar che/ /tso rang gi las byams sems bsnyen bkur byas/ /de rkyen

stobs kyis khams kyi sa bon brtas/ /ma tsin+d+hi yis 'chi med bdud rtsi brtan/ /g+ho ra kha yis gnyis med de nyid mthong / /srid gsum ba dzi'i rgyal po ngo mtshar che/ /gu ru tso rang gi'i zhal nas/ thog med srid pa yun ring du/ /ma rig sdong po'i rtsa ba la/ /'du byed chu yis

legs brlan nas/ /srid pa'i yan lag sna tshogs rgyas/ /ma rig pa yi shing chen de/ /bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag dang / /shes rab gsum gyi ste'u yis/ /tso rang gi yis de nyid bcad/ /gu ru b+hi na pa'i zhal nas/ phyin ci log la goms pa'i sgra/ /gus dang

brtson pas dpyad byas nas/ /ma grol skye med sgra dpyad pas/ /b+hi na ba yis bdag med rtogs/ /gu ru shAn+ti pa'i zhal nas/ bu chung ma yis gsos pa yis/ /gyad kyi stobs dang ldan pa bzhin/ /blo chung bla ma'i man ngag gis/ /rim gyis brid pas theg pa che/ /rlung mkhris

bad kan 'dus pa yi/ /nad rnams sman gyis sel ba ltar/ /nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa ni/ /bla ma'i gdams pas skad cig sreg /gu ru tan+ti ba'i zhal nas/ 'jig rten pa yi thags mkhan rnams/ /snal ma thams cad thags su btags/ /nga yi bla ma'i man ngag gis/ /

chos rnams thams cad thags su btags/ /ye shes lnga yi stong nyid ni/ /snal ma man ngag stag so dang / /shes rab kyi ni sgrom bu yis/ /dbyings rig gnyis med chos skur btags/ /gu ru tsa ma ra pa'i zhal nas/ /rnam rtog mtshan ma'i ko ba 'di/ /stong nyid rdo rje'i

sbyangs nang du/ /chos brgyad spangs pa'i rgyun gyis ni/ /shes rab nyams myong bsnyung dang btsems/ /lhun grub chos sku'i lham byed pa/ /tsa ma ri pa lham mkhan mchog /gu ru khaD+ga pa'i zhal nas/ 'jig rten pa yi mtshon thogs dpa' bo ni/ /rgyun du dgra dang g.yul 'gyed

kyang / /bdag nyid sdug bsngal dbang du 'gyur/ /'chi med ye shes ral gri yis/ /srid gsum dgra rnams pham byas nas/ /khaD+ga pa ni longs spyod byed/ /gu ru nA gA rdzu na'i zhal nas/ gang zhig ma rtogs spyod pa mi bya ste/ /byas na rgyal srid 'bangs kyis bzung ba bzhin/ /rtogs

pas ma rtogs spyod pa mi bya ste/ /byas na glang chen 'dam du zin pa 'dra/ /gu ru kah+Na pa'i zhal nas/ shing rta'i 'khor lo gcig dang mi ldan khrid kyang 'gro bar mi nus ltar/ /sbyin sogs 'bad pa byas kyang bla ma mi ldan dngos grub dam pa min/ /bya rgod rtsal rdzogs 'dab

gshog rgyas pa dag ni nam mkha' gcod cing rgyug /skal bzang rnal 'byor rnams ni dbang gi gdams ngag khong du chud pas bde/ /gu ru ka na ri pa'i zhal nas/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad ngo bo gcig /de ni rtogs na rang bzhin rang gi sems/ /rtogs par

'dod na ma bcos ji bzhin zhog /goms par byas na rnal 'byor mngon du 'gyur/ /gu ru tha kha na'i zhal nas/ gang zhig rna bar chu zhugs na/ /chu nyid kyis ni 'byin pa bzhin/ /de bzhin snang srid brdzun pa la/ /brdzun par bsgoms pas bden pa mthong / /gu ru na ro pa'i

zhal nas/ 'khor los sgyur rgyal dpung tshogs rnams kyis ni/ /gling dang gling phran rnams la dbang byed ltar/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ro 'gyur rnal 'byor ni/ /'khor ba dbang sgyur bde ba chen po yin/ /gu ru sha wa ri pa'i zhal nas/ legs byas ri mo mkhan dag gis/ /shin

tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs brnyan bris/ /mthong na bdag nyid 'jigs 'gyur la/ /brtags na ma grub gzugs brnyan snang / /gu ru te lo pa'i zhal nas/ ri rab ngos la bya gnas pa/ /bya yi rang bzhin gser du snang / /mkhas pa skye med rtogs pa yis/ /dngos po

bor nas bde ba che/ /gu ru tsa tra pa'i zhal nas/ rnal 'byor pa yis gang snang gdams pa yin/ /mthong ba skye med rtogs pa slob dpon mchog /byis pa rnams kyi gnyis 'dzin rtog pa yin/ /dge dang sdig pa'i 'bras bu de la gnyis su 'byung / /gu ru b+ha

tra pa'i zhal nas/ stong nyid don rtogs 'khrul pa zhi/ /byams pa bsgoms pas spyod pa rdzogs/ /sna tshogs gnyis med goms pa yis/ /mi mthun ro gcig 'bras bur rtogs/ /gu ru d+hu kha na d+ha'i zhal nas/ kun rdzob bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / /don dam rdzogs

pa'i rim pa gnyis/ /zung 'jug phyag rgya chen por bsgoms/ /'bras bu sku gsum ye shes 'char/ /gu ru a dzo ka'i zhal nas/ bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis/ /steng sgo sna rtse thig ler bsgoms/ /de nyid la ni blo brtan pas/ /yungs kar stong nyid dmigs pa stor/ /

gu ru ka la pa'i zhal nas/ 'gro ba 'di dag thog med dus nas 'khrul/ /de yis 'jig rten thams cad ma snyoms grags/ /bla ma'i gdams ngag bdud rtsi'i sman gyis ni/ /'khrul pa'i nad rnams skad cig gcig la sreg /gu ru Dom+bi pa'i zhal nas/ yun ring

dus nas dri ma 'khrud byas kyang / /sol ba'i rang bzhin dkar por 'gyur ba med/ /rang bzhin rnam dag stong nyid dag par 'gyur/ /bla ma'i gdams pa rang bzhin khrus mkhan mchog /gu ru kaM ka na'i zhal nas/ rtog pa yid bzhin nor bu la/ /nyams su myong ba'i

mdog byung bas/ /spyod pa nus pas dgos 'dod 'byung / /ro snyoms ldan pa rnams kyis 'grub/ /gu ru ka ma la'i zhal nas/ rgya mtsho zab cing rgya che'i nang na nor bus gang ba la/ /klu yi rgyal po rnams ni de la longs spyod ngo mtshar che/ /de bzhin snang grags thams cad

ye nas chos sku yin pa la/ /rtogs pa dang ldan longs spyod ngo mtshar che/ /gu ru d+hiM gi pa'i zhal nas/ rta dang glang po rgya mtsho 'dra na rab tu bde/ /spre'u byis pa chu yi ri mo 'dra na rtog pa yin/ /chu bo nyi ma sman dang 'dra na dbyer mi phyed/ /gtsug phud mig dang 'khor lo lta

bus 'bras bu thob/ /gu ru ban+d+hi'i zhal nas/ mngon zhen med pa byams pa'i mchog /gnas lugs rtogs pa snying rje yin/ /zag med bde ba dga' ba ste/ /chos rnams ro gcig btang snyoms rdzogs/ /gu ru DanaT na'i zhal nas/ ji ltar dran rig sna tshogs dang / /

rtog med dbyings su zad cing 'gag /de bzhin snang srid chos rnams kun/ /stong nyid dbyings su zad cing 'gag /gu ru ku ku ri pa'i zhal nas/ sangs rgyas mchod sogs rnams la don mi 'byung / /'dod dang 'bad rtsol yod na sangs rgyas min/ /bla ma dam pa'i byin

rlabs nyams myong dpal/ /cha ldan rang la yod kyang ma mthong ngo / /gu ru ku tsi pa'i zhal nas/ gang la lhan cig skyes pa ni/ /glang po che yi mig bzhin du/ /bze re bskyed na zug rngu 'byung / /glod na ma zhen bsam gtan mchog /bla ma'i gsung gi 'od zer gyis/ /yod

dang med pa'i mtha' ma rnyed/ /gang zhig ma rnyed de mthong ngo / /mtha' de rtogs na don gyi mchog /gu ru d+ha mu'i zhal nas/ gnyis las ma rig dug dag gis/ /rig pa skyes pa rgyun du zin/ /bla ma'i gsung gi 'od zer gyis/ /snang srid 'khrul pa'i dug nad sel/ /gu

ru ma hi la'i zhal nas/ ma rig pa yi nga rgyal gyis/ /ma rtog yid bzhin nor bu bsgribs/ /spyod par 'dod pas dgos 'dod 'byung / /ro snyoms ldan pa rnams kyis 'grub/ /gu ru a tsin+d+ha'i zhal nas/ dmigs med phyag rgya chen po ru/ /'khrul pa'i dran yid

sna tshogs stor/ /ye shes rig pa'i snang ba yis/ /gang snang phyag rgya chen por mthong / /gu ru pa ha'i zhal nas/ /bde'o bde'o dngos med bde/ /zhen pa med pas dngos med bde/ /brtag pa thams cad der shes bde/ /bsgrub pa med pa'i gsang ba bde/ /gu ru

ni la na'i zhal nas/ spyi bo'i 'dab ma 'dam skyes su/ /sa bon g.yo ba dga' ba ste/ /snying po 'byin pa mchog tu dga'/ /lhan skyes dga' bral bla med thob/ /gu ru b+hu su ku'i zhal nas/ bdag nyid ma rtogs bar du ro la khyad par che/ /de bzhin 'khor ba dag dang

sangs rgyas tha dad che/ /rtogs pa'i dus na 'khor 'das bde ba chen po ste/ /dper na rgya mtsho'i nang na 'bar ba'i rin chen bzhin/ /gu ru in+d+ra b+hU ti'i zhal nas/ dus kyi sna rtse dag ni byin rlabs dag dang mi ldan na/ /phyi dang nang du spyod pa dag gi

rnal 'byor 'tshang mi rgya/ /dga' bde'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas dag dang khyad par med pa ni/ /zhen pa btang na rang bzhin skyes pa'i nyams myong mchog tu dga'/ /gu ru me ko pa'i zhal nas/ bla ma/ dam pa dag las dang por rang gi sems rtogs bya/ /de nas snang ba

kun du tha dad med bya ste/ /gnyis med goms pas dur khrod gnas su 'dug par bya/ /mnyam par rtogs nas smyon pa'i brtul zhugs spyod par bya/ /gu ru ko ta la'i zhal nas/ bde dang sdug bsngal thams cad sems las byung / /bla ma'i gdams pas sems

kyi ri bo brkos/ /blo ldan sa yi ri bo brkos gyur kyang / /gnyug ma'i bde ba chen po thob mi 'gyur/ /tha mal shes pa snying gi dbus su sad/ /tshogs drug dag na bde ba rgyun mi chad/ /btags pa thams cad don med sdug bsngal rgyu/ /bsgom dang bsgom med gnyug

ma'i ngang la zhog /gu ru kaM ri pa'i zhal nas/ rang bzhin gzugs kyi sol mal du/ /dran rig rnam rtog sol ba la/ /la la ra sa'i sbud pa bus/ /d+hU tI ye shes me sbar nas/ /dug gsum rnam rtog chos skur brdungs/ /kaM ri pa yis rtogs nas grol/ /gu ru dzA lan+d+ha

ra'i zhal nas/ khams gsum lus ngag yid gsum gyi/ /dran rig rnam rtog sna tshogs kun/ /la la ra sad+hU tI ru/ /byin brlabs ci phyir bcing mi bgyi/ /gu ru rA hu la'i zhal nas/ phyi yi sgra gcan bzang po yis/ /zla ba'i snang ba gnyis med zos/ /kun rdzob

zla ba'i thig le ni/ /dbyings rig sgra gcan gnyis med zos/ /gu ru d+harma pa'i zhal nas/ snang sred chos kyi snod du ni/ /byang chub sems kyi mar khu blugs/ /tshogs drug rnam shes sdong bu la/ /gnyis med ye shes me sbar bas/ /rnam rtog 'khrul pa'i mun pa

bcom/ /gu ru d+ho ka ri'i zhal nas/ chos dbyings rang bzhin snod nang du/ /rig pa chos sku'i rdzas nyid bcug /dbyings rig gnyis kyi 'bras bu ni/ /skal ldan rnal 'byor rig pas rtogs/ /gu ru me d+hi na'i zhal nas/ rig pa gnyug ma'i shes rab dang / /nyon

mongs gos pa'i thabs dag gis/ /rang bzhin gnas lugs gzhi dag las/ /bde chen lhun grub 'bras bu rtogs/ /gu ru pa ka dza'i zhal nas/ ji ltar bla mas ma zin ma rtogs dus dag tu/ /yid bzhin nor bu dang ni nor bu mching bu mnyam/ /bla ma dang

ni rtog pas yongs su zin gyur na/ /nyi zla'i 'od dang srin bu me khyer ji bzhin no/ /gu ru g+haN+Ta pa'i zhal nas/ la la ra sa d+hU tI gsum/ /bla mas byin brlabs bcing bar byas/ /bdag dang sems dang snang ba gsum/ /rtog pa bskyed phyir mkhas pas brtan/ /

gu ru dzo gi pa'i zhal nas/ mar me'i rtse mo lta bu yi/ /phra zhing gsal ba'i yid goms pas/ /brtan zhing g.yo ba'i dngos po kun/ /chos kyi dbyings su thim par 'gyur/ /gu ru tsa lu ka'i zhal nas/ bla ma dam pa'i gdams pa ni/ /yun ring dus na goms pa yis/ /

sa sogs rig pas thim pa las/ /rang snang phyag rgya chen por 'gyur/ /gu ru go tu ri'i zhal nas/ phyi nang chos kun sems su 'dus/ /sems nyid gsal ba'i don rtogs na/ /spyod lam rnam bzhi chos kyi sku/ /rtog pa mngon gyur rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gu ru

lu tsi ka'i zhal nas/ gang zhig thog ma med dus nas/ /'khor ba'i rgya mtshor yun ring 'khyams/ /gru mchog bla ma dam pa yis/ /brgal dka'i mtsho las de ring rgal/ /gu ru na ra gu na'i zhal nas/ chu rlabs lta bu'i nyams bstan nas/ /spyod pa thabs kyis

gzhol bar bya/ /bla ma dam pa'i gdams ngag gis/ /chags sdang rtog pa rang bzhin byas/ /gu ru A na n+da'i zhal nas/ ye shes rig pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ /thog ma med de gnyug mar gnas/ /ji ltar rtogs na nges pa yin/ /rnam rtog dran pa de nyid mun/ /gu ru pa tsa

ri'i zhal nas/ gar yang ma lta dbus su ltos/ /mchog dang dga' bral bde ba che/ /sngags kyi gsang ba stobs brjod nas/ /rnal 'byor rtags ni dgu bar bya/ /gu ru tsam+ba ka'i zhal nas/ thabs dang shes rab 'od gsal lta bu la/ /

bla ma chu po'i rgyun gyis kun la khyab/ /lhan cig skyes pa dpag bsam shing dag las/ /'bras bu sku gsum rang gsal rab tu rdzogs/ /gu ru b+hik+Sha Na'i zhal nas/ bla med dur khrod byang chub gnas chen du/ /zung 'jug bde chen bgrod dka'i lam bstan pas/ /

phyag mtshan bral ba'i dbang phyug rnal 'byor mchog /bla ma'i gdams pa'i drin gyis de nyid rtogs/ /gu ru d+he li pa'i zhal nas/ bdag nyid gdod nas sangs rgyas la/ /rtogs pa'i dbang gis chos nyid yin/ /dbang blangs lhan cig skyes pa des/ /skye med rgyas

'debs rdo rje 'dzin/ /gu ru kaM pa la'i zhal nas/ rgyu mthun las kyi 'khor lo yis/ /srid pa'i glu gar sna tshogs byas/ /ye shes rig pa'i me yis ni/ /'khrul pa'i dri ma ma lus bsregs/ /gu ru d+hU ma pa'i zhal nas/ sngags pa kun gyi sdom pa mchog /rang gi

rtogs la zhen med de/ /gnyug ma sems kyi rtog pas gang / /sangs rgyas thams cad de mthong yin/ /gu ru ma Ni b+ha dra'i zhal nas/ gang zhig mi rtog dus kyi tshe/ /rnam rtog sna tshogs sgra phyir 'breng / /de phyir rang bzhin mngon du gyur/ /gang snang rang bzhin de de nyid/ /

gu ru me kha la'i zhal nas/ phyi dang nang kun sems su 'dus/ /zhen pa med na ro snyoms ldan/ /'bad rtsol med na bsgom pa'i mchog /gnyis med bde chen rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /gu ru nA ga ka la ka'i zhal nas/ go cha chen po bgos nas kyang / /nor bu lta bu'i snying stobs

kyis/ /rang gi sems kyi gru btang nas/ /ri mo'i khong par nges par zhugs/ /gu ru ka la ka la'i zhal nas/ chos dbyings rnam dag mkha' dkyil du/ /skye med 'brug sgra legs bsgrags pas/ /snang srid 'khrul pa'i chos rnams kun/ /sku gsum ye shes 'bras bu

mdzes/ /gu ru kan ta la'i zhal nas/ bla ma dam pa'i kha ba dag dang / /snying rje yi ni skud pa yis/ /khams gsum ma lus gos su btsems/ /gos kyi rnal 'byor ngo mtshar che/ /gu ru d+ha hu la'i zhal nas/ zung 'jug rig pa rin chen mdzod/ /gnyis med ngang ste

btsal bas min/ /bya ba btang ba'i sems bzhin du/ /ji ltar gzhag pa de ltar bde/ /gu ru u d+hi la'i zhal nas/ ji ltar rnal 'byor rjes 'brangs 'khrul/ /ma 'brel bag chags ma btang zung / /gang la mi gnas 'gro ba zung / /gzhan la btsal ba de yang min/ /gu ru ka pA la'i

zhal nas/ dngos kun gnyis med rdo rje 'dzin/ /rgyan sogs thod pa glo bur ba/ /ngar 'dzin 'khrul pa de nyid kyang / /rang gis btsal bas rnyed ma yin/ /gu ru ki ra ba la'i zhal nas/ ji ltar ma rtogs bar du rang gzhan rtog pas bcings/ /de tshe rtogs par gyur na rang gzhan gnyis ma grub/ /

des na sangs rgyas zhes bya rang gi bla dgas yin/ /de nyid spros bral ma bcos rang sar rang bzhin zung / /gu ru pa ga ra'i zhal nas/ 'gro rnams sdug bsngal gyis gdungs la/ /'dod yon dag gi char phab bo/ /de bzhin nyid kyi gnas chen du/ /rig pa'i klu rgyal nyid

gzir nas/ /skal ldan rig 'dzin pho mo la/ /gsang sngags rig pa'i char bab po/ /gu ru sarba b+hak+Sha'i zhal nas/ gang zhig ma rtogs dus na sna tshogs ro la khyad par che/ /gang zhig rtogs pa'i dus su ro rnams ngo bo bye brag med/ /de bzhin ma rtogs nyid na 'khor 'das

tha dad snang / /de nyid rtogs na 'khor ba myang 'das bde ba che/ /gu ru nA ga bo d+hi'i zhal nas/ sa la gnas na thams cad skal ba bzang / /rgya mtsho'i gting du phyin na dbul dang bral/ /ral gri lag tu thogs na longs spyod che/ /phyogs med dag tu phyin na gnyen dang phrad/ /gu

ru dA ri ka pa'i zhal nas/ bde ba chen po rang la yod kyang ma rtogs 'khrul pas bsgribs/ /bde gsal 'dod pa'i bsod nams ye shes tshogs bsags bya/ /tshogs gnyis ma bsags skye ba brgya ru 'bad byas kyang / /bla ma dag dang mi ldan bde ba chen po rtogs mi

'gyur/ /gu ru su ta ba'i zhal nas/ thams cad bde gshegs rang bzhin te/ /blos gzhag log pa'i lam spangs nas/ /snying po'i lam la brtson byas na/ /snying po'i 'bras bu gdon mi za/ /gang gis bla ma dam pa las/ /dbang rnams lhan cig

skyes pa des/ /ro yis kun la khyab bya ste/ /skye med rgyas 'debs rdo rje 'dzin/ /gu ru pa na ha'i zhal nas/ snying po gnyug ma'i don bsam pas/ /ji ltar bsam pa de ltar rtogs/ /des na de nyid rang dgar gnas/ /'dod dgu lhug par thams cad 'byung / /gu ru ko ki

la'i zhal nas/ bya ba btang ba man ngag yin/ /zhen 'dod med pa rtogs pa yin/ /bde ba dngos med sgom pa yin/ /bsgrub bya med na 'bras bu'i mchog /gu ru a naM ga'i zhal nas/ 'khor ba snying po med pa yin/ /'ja' tshon lta bu'i lus 'di la/ /ma rig mngon

zhen dregs pa yis/ /dug gis bzung na bde bar 'dzin/ /mngon zhen dug nad sbyangs pa na/ /'khor ba nyid kyang chos kyi sku/ /gu ru nI lak+Sha na'i zhal nas/ dang por blo ldan rtogs pa skyed/ /gnyis pa gnas lugs ma yengs sgom/ /de nas nyams myong skyes pa na/ /spyod

pa bags kyis spyad par bya/ /gu ru sa mu dra'i zhal nas/ skye med rtogs kyang nyams myong dang bral na/ /dper na srin mo lag tu bu khyer 'dra/ /nyams myong gnas lugs dag dang ma 'bral na/ /de yang glang chen 'dam du zhugs pa 'dra/ /gu ru bi ra li pa'i zhal nas/ bla

ma dam pa mthong na de nyid mthong / /nam mkha'i mthongs su bsgoms na dben pa'i mchog/ /chos rnams yongs su rtogs na mi mthun med/ /nam mkha'i 'o ma 'thungs na 'tsho bar 'gyur/ /skal ldan dag gi don phyir bla ma rnams kyi rtogs pa'i snying po kun/ /tshad med blo

yis legs bsdus bsod nams rgya chen bdag gis gang thob des/ /'gro rnams bla ma dang phrad byin rlabs yang dag sems la zhugs gyur nas/ /gnas lugs don nyid yang dag sems rtogs rgyal ba'i sa la gnas gyur cig /grub thob brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i rtogs pa'i snying

po slob dpon dpa' bo 'od gsal gyis phyogs gcig tu bsdus pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ tsar+yA ko Sha gI ta TI pyA Ni pr-i t+ti nA ma/ bod skad du/ spyod pa'i glu'i mdzod kyi 'grel pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dpal ldan bla ma

dam pa'i zhal gyi chu skyes ro myangs rab gsal brtse ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ /gnyis med blo ldan dpal ldan rdo rje'i dbang phyug dri med zhal mnga' dad pas phyag 'tshal nas/ /dpal ldan lU yi zhabs sogs grub pa rnams kyis gsungs shing ya mtshan spyod pa'i glu yi

tshogs/ /lam mchog dri ma med pa'i tshig ni rtogs par bya phyir de yi 'grel pas gsal bar bya/ /lus ljon shing mchog yan lag rnam lnga la/ /g.yo ba'i sems la sgra gcan rab tu 'jug /brtan par mdzod cig bde chen yongs kyi tshad/ /lU yis smras pa bla ma la

zhus mkhyen/ /ma lus ting 'dzin rnams kyis ci zhig bya/ /bde ba rtsa nas bton na nges par 'chi/ /spongs shig sdeb sbyor byed cing g.yo sgyu'i blo/ /stong nyid phyogs la zhags pas bcing gis kye/ /lU yi bdag gi bsam gtan nyid kyis mthong / /zla ba nyi ma gnyis phab

steng du sdong / /pa Ta ha'i snye ma zhes bya ba'i glu'i gdangs so// //lus ljon pa'i shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gang zhig dpal ldan bla ma'i zhabs kyi chu skyes kyi sbrang gi thigs pa'i tshogs 'bab pas sems brlan zhing yang dag par tshim nas bden pa gnyis la

rmongs shing 'khrul pa'i rgya mtsho chen po'i dbus su bying ba skyabs med la sdug bsngal ba'i skye bo rnams yang dag par gdon par 'dod pa'i phyir/ /grub pa'i slob dpon lU yi pa'i zhabs kyi smon pas bskul ba rnams gdon pa'i phyir/ lus ljon shing mchog ni

dgongs pa'i tshig gis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid gzhi'i rang bzhin gyi snang ba la sbyor ba gsungs te/ gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams dang / dbang po drug po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / yul rnams la gzung 'dzin du 'dzin pas lo ma dang 'dra bar

nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir lus ljon shing mchog tu gzung ngo / /ci ste sems dang ldan pa'i phyir ji ltar lus ljon pa'i shing mchog ce na/ 'di'i skyon med de/ de bzhin du phyi'i bstan bcos byed pas kyang nye bar blta bar bya ba'i rgyan gzhan la sbyor ba

rnams kyis cung zad dbye bar gnas pa de dang 'dra ba nyid la nye bar brjod do/ /ci'i phyir brtags na rang bzhin du snang ba'i skyon gyi dbang las g.yo ba de yis so/ /tha mal pa'i sems 'dzag pa'i rang bzhin gyis sgra gcan te/ de nyid kyi dus su nag po'i tshes gcig gi
