'bras bu ji bzhin mi 'thob ste/ /dmus long dmigs bu med pa bzhin/ /don dngos rgya mtsho ltar zab pas/ /khron pa'i sbal 'dra bdag gi blos/ /dpyod pas gting rnyed ga la 'gyur/ /nongs gyur mkhas la bzod par gsol/ /'di byas dge ba gang yin pas/ /skal ldan skye bo

dam pa yi/ /'khrul pa'i dri ma rab spangs nas/ /rtogs pa'i shes rab skye bar shog /rje na ro ba'i lta ba mdor bsdus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //lo tsA ba mar pa chos kyi blo gros kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ a tsin+t+ya ma hA mu dra

nA ma/ bod skad du/ phyag rgya chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo/ /skye 'gag med pa'i chos nyid 'od gsal ni/ /smra bsam brjod med phyag rgya chen po'i lam/ /ngos gzung dang bral yid la mi byed pa'o/ /zab zhi 'dus ma

byas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma ho/ /rdo rje dbyer med skye 'jig bral/ /drag pos khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad 'dul/ /mun khung gter la sgron me ltar/ /ma rig sbubs nas rang rig gsal/ /chos kun rtsa ba byang chub sems/ /rang bzhin gnyis su med pa'i phyir/ /

sems nyid rang byung ye shes te/ /ma 'dres yongs rdzogs rgyal ba'i thugs/ /de nyid ji bzhin rtogs gyur na/ /sangs rgyas zhes ni de la bya/ /gdod nas gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ /grub med sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor shar/ /de ltar rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ /gdal

khyab sa la 'bad pa med/ /zag med rnam grol ngang du gdab/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'di kho na/ /dkyil 'khor la sogs 'phro 'du rnams/ /ched du ma byas ngang nas shar/ /'od gsal chu bo'i dba' rlabs kyi/ ngo mtshar rnam sbrul bsam mi khyab/ /de phyir chos

rnams sna tshogs kun/ /ji bzhin ma yin ma bcos bzhin du snang / /nyon mongs lnga sogs rang bzhin rnams/ /rnam grol ye shes chen por shar/ /de nyid mngon gyur brtan pa na/ /mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo snang / /gnyis snang rnam pa mi mnga' bas/ /rang don rang

bzhin lhun gyis grub/ /'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun/ /dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med/ /'khor ba'i rnam rtog sna tshogs las/ /rgyal ba'i sku dang ye shes 'byung / /rang bzhin ma skyes yum gyi klong / /ma 'gags shar ba yab kyi mkha'/ /de ltar gnyis med bde ba ni/ /

rnal 'byor rig pa'i dgongs pa yin/ /bya byed rig pa'i rtsol ba rnams/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med/ /'khor ba'i nyon mongs dug gsum 'di/ /lhun grub ma bcos sku gsung thugs/ /'dus byas phung po'i rang bzhin ni/ /zag med rnam par grol ba dang / /sna tshogs

snang ba'i 'khor lo 'di/ /rang bzhin spyod pa sgyu ma'i grogs/ /gsang chen bla med theg pa 'di/ /thabs dang shes rab phul du phyin/ /snang dang mi snang gnyis su med/ /'dzin pa bral ba de tsam mo/ /ji bzhin ma bcos sems nyid la/ /ma yengs bcos bslad med par gnas/ /des na

gsang ba'i snying po ni/ /tshig gi brjod pa'i yul las 'das/ /rang lus dben pa'i dgon pa der/ /phyi nang gsang ba'i yo byad 'dzin/ /sems nyid rin chen za ma tog /chags bral nam mkha' ltar du 'char/ /snang ba sgyur byed rnal 'byor pa/ /rin chen mdzes pa sna tshogs la/ /

'phrul dga' lta bur snang bas na/ /don du mi 'gyur yongs ma gsungs/ /bdag nyid chen po rgyal ba'i sems/ /rtogs par 'dod pa dgad bro ang / /khams gsum ye nas rgyal ba'i sku/ /'khor ba myang 'das gnyis su med/ /dus gsum rgyal ba rang gi sems/ /'bad

cing rtsol ba'i nang dang bral/ /bde dang sdug bsngal dbyer med la/ /spong len mtshan ma 'dod pa ci/ /de nyid rang gsal 'dzin pa med/ /'dzin med grub mtha' lta ba bral/ /sems kyi me long de gsal ba/ /sngags 'chang dgongs pa mnyam pa nyid/ /rang la gnas

pas gzhan du min/ /rgyun du gnas kyang gting dpag dka'/ /rtsol sgrub bral bar yongs la khyab/ /dngos su mthong ba bla ma'i drin/ /ma skyes spros bral sems nyid ni/ /kha dog dbyibs dang gnas rig bral/ /zab cing rgya che gsal bar ldan/ /brtan g.yo ma lus de ltar

byos/ /'gro ba 'di kun sangs rgyas te/ /gsal bar yod kyang rtogs pa med/ /sems nyid nor bu rin chen de/ /sbubs na mkha' lding phru gu 'dra/ /dam pa mnyes byed skyes bu yis/ /bde gshegs dgongs pa rdzogs pa'i don/ /dug gsum sku gsung thugs su dag /

dpa' bo seng ge bzhin du rgyu/ /theg chen gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyis/ /spyod pa'i khyad par ci spyad kyang / /tshogs bsgyur len med 'dzin dang bral/ /dkyil 'khor chen po'i gsang bar zhugs/ /sku gsung yon tan phrin las la/ /'od gsal ye shes snyoms mdzad pa/ /bdag

gzhan gnyis kyi 'dod pa sgrub/ /thugs rjes khams gsum sgrol la brtson/ /rol pa'i ye shes dgyes pa las/ /thabs chen zab mo'i theg pa spro/ /mi zad bsdu ba zung du 'jug /de ltar mnyam spyod rnal 'byor gyis/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ti l+li pas go ri shar ba'i rgyal po'i

khab tu rnal 'byor pa la gdams pa/ rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba i thi// #/ /mthu can la gdams pa bzhugs/ @##/ /gdug pa tshar gcod ye shes chen po'i klong / /rab 'bar 'jigs byed he ru ka la 'dud/ /thabs dang ldan pa rnal 'byor chen po'i

gzhung / /ma lus rgyal pa'i rjes su 'jug par bya/ /sdang ba'i sems can zhi bas mi 'dul ba/ /gnyen pos tshar gcod phrin las chen po'i lugs/ /bla ma la smod bstan la sdang sogs la/ /rang gzhan grol phyir bsgral ba'i sbyor ba tsam/ /mnyam nyid rig pa'i rnal 'byor chos

kun ni/ /ro gcig zhi bas sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras bcad/ /thabs ldan lcags kyus 'khor lo phung po dgug /thugs rje'i lcid mnan shes rab mtshon gyis dral/ /chu shing kha phye ma rig mun pa bsal/ /ye shes 'od kyis 'byung ba rim par sbyangs/ /de sems gsal ba nyi

zla'i gdan stengs su/ /a hUM sbyor bas 'od kyi sems dpa'i tshul/ /'og min gnas su ya yis rab tu bskul/ /gnyis med rgyal ba'i sras gyur rdo rje sems/ /rig pa'i dbang bskur gzhan don mdzad pa can/ /ngo mtshar sgyu ma'i dpe byad rnams kyis sbas/ /phung po

la sogs 'byung ba dbang po rnams/ /mchod pa'i sprin du phyogs bcu khyab par spro/ /mnyam du sbyor bas de nyid nges pa yi/ /a yi rang bzhin thog mtha' med pa'i nang / /ta la mngon mtshon bris pa'i gzugs la blta/ /hUM bltas phur bus btab bskor rtsad nas bcad/ /phyag rgya'i

snying po bdag po dgu 'das pas/ /go 'phang ster byed chags pas sdig pa sgrol/ /thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa gsang ba'i thabs/ /dka' thub tshogs dang bral ba grub pa'i lam/ /nyi zla'i rtsi zin zhe sdang bde bar thim/ /nyon mongs dran rtog shes rab snang bar gsal/ /goms

pa'i sbyor ba legs gzhag bstan pa yis/ /rten med 'dzin pa bral ba ye shes lha/ /mnyam par sbyor bas zag med bde ba che/ /gnyis 'dzin bud shing me ltar rang tshig 'gyur/ /de ltar shes pa'i skyes bu 'dzin pa dang / /'phel 'grib zag pa yod med la sogs pa/ /'ching

grol khang par sna tshogs snang ba kun/ /sgyu ma'i sbyor ba rgyal ba'i mdzad pas gnas/ /sbyor bas gdug pa ma lus bsgral bya zhing / /bsgral bas skye med dbyings su nges par sbyor/ /dngos po dngos med 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das/ /spyod yul bral bas gsang ba'i lam

mchog go/ /gnod sbyin srin po'i mthu rtsal ngan song lam/ /gnyis 'dzin zhen pas rang rgyud 'khor ba ste/ /de nyid med par grol ba srin po'i las/ /yang dag don la gnam sa lta bur 'gyur/ /thams cad rang byung byang chub sems yin pas/ /'di nyid ma skyes phyogs

ris cha shas bral/ /ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med pa yi/ /phrin las chen pos mi mthun dri ma sel/ /dgug dang bkug dang 'thab dang dgar ba dang / /'dren dang 'dzin dang 'khyil bar bya ba ste/ /sbyangs dang spel ba'i las la legs brtsams

pas/ /rgyun chad med pa'i bde ba chen por 'gyur/ /gsang mchog theg la dbyings la rab tu rdzogs/ /phyi nang snod bcud ye shes chen po'i sku/ /gang gis dpag par mi nus bsam las 'das/ /rang byung mtha' dbus med pa snying po'i gsang / /dbang po dman dang rtog ge'i

yul min zhing / /gang du 'ching ba'i las la spyad pas kyang / /de nyid grol ba'i mchog ster rgyal sras lam/ /'phro 'du med pa rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas/ gyad kyi nor bu'i grong du mthu can la gdams pa phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes

bya ba i thi// #/ /glu mkhan la gdams pa bzhugs/ @##/ /kye ho sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsang ba'i gsung / /mdzad pa rnam grol ye shes chen po la/ /dgyes mnyam rol pas chos kyi phung po rnams/ /yid 'ong glu ru thub pas bka' stsal to/ /gsang sngags

brda yi tshig mthun bka' lung can/ /zab mo'i sgra sgrogs rnam dag sngags nyid de/ /lus can gdung ba sel ba bde ba'i sgra/ /grag stong gnyis su med pa zung 'jug dang / /snang ba sku la sgra tshig sna tshogs gsung / /mkhyen pa thugs la bya ba yon tan yin/ /mdzad pa phrin las ye shes

rnam pa lnga/ /phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba'i rang bzhin no/ /glu yi mkhan po mnyam gnas ngo bo'i sku/ /thams cad sprul pas 'phro bar khyab par gsungs/ /de nyid dbyer med ngang du 'dus pa thugs/ /rgyal ba'i gsung la tha dad med pa yi/ /a yis drangs pa tshangs pa'i

dbyangs kyi sgra/ /ngo bo skye med brjod pa'i yul las 'das/ /nga ro bcu drug rang byung dga' ba yin/ /shes rab yum chen kho nas 'dren pa'o/ /gsal byed 'dren pas mi 'byung tshig tu 'brel/ /thub pa'i dgongs pa lkog gyur mkhyen pa gnyis/ /thugs rjes spro phyir gsal

ba'i tshig tu brgyus/ /don chen ston pa glu yi tshig yin no/ /pho yis drangs nas mo yi rgyun dang ldan/ /gnyis med nga ro gsal ba mtho dang dma'/ /sems byung rgyun gcod ngang du gnas par byed/ /de'u yi sgra ste 'dren pa glu yi rgyan/ /sgra yis yid mtshon tshig gi don la

sbyor/ /dgyes pa'i rang rtsal mi mthun phyogs las rgyal/ /gsang sngags bden pa'i ngag tu byin gyis rlob/ /mi dmigs thugs rje mnyam pa'i dbyings las byung / /ye shes chen po sgyu mar rang snang bas/ /zag med snyan pa'i nga ro bsod nams tshogs/ /gsang

ba'i dbyings las rab tu 'phros gyur pa/ /dkyil 'khor mtha' yas rnams la rol pas dbul/ /dbang po yul dus rags ba'i tshogs rnams dang / /'byung ba shes rab byang chub rdo rje ste/ /lhag pa'i ye shes de bzhin nyid mchog la/ /skal pa mnyam pa'i mnyes pa chen po'o/ /

de ltar glu yis 'jig rten gdung sel cing / /'jig rten 'das pa mnyes pa'i mchod pa ste/ /don du nges pa ngag gi rig byed can/ /mkhyen pa'i 'jug sgo bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ /sdug bsngal bde bar sbyar bas mthu stobs can/ /nyon mongs rnam grol ye shes chen po'i

lam/ /las las ye shes 'byung bas 'dzin pa med/ /nges par sbyor bas rdo rje'i tshig gi glu/ /rang bzhin gnyis med dgongs pa mtha' yas ston/ /de yi rgyu nyid don dam blo las 'das/ /'bras bu rol pa'i dkyil las rngam pa'i gdangs/ /mi dmigs thugs rje'i

rtsal du rang shar ro/ /chos rnams ma lus sems su 'dus pa ste/ /sems las ma gtogs shes bya gzhan med pas/ /sems kyi rang bzhin ye nas rgyal ba'i thugs/ /'pho 'gyur med pas 'phel 'grib gol sa chod/ /rang byung dga' bas 'gro ba'i gdung ba sel/ /

dngas ma rtser phyin mkhyen pa bsam mi khyab/ /skye dgu'i bdag po tshangs pa'i rtse mo'i bar/ /skyong ba'i glu mkhan til+li pa yin no/ /kye/ /yon tan sgyu ma yin pas skyon la dngos ma grub/ /gnas la nges pa med pas 'pho 'gyur nyam mi nga / /sems la skye shi med de 'od

gsal dang / /dran rig sna tshogs ye shes rol pa'i rtsal/ /de ltar shes pas spang blang 'dzin pa med/ /rig pa'i ngo bo mnyam las ma g.yos par/ /dur khrod chen por smyon pa'i spyod pa gyis/ /rnal 'byor rnams la nga yis lung bstan no/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug

til+li pas/ 'dus pa rin po che'i tshong dus su glu mkhan la gdams pa rol mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba i thi// #/ /mu stegs la gdams pa bzhugs// @##/ /a i rnal 'byor chen po kye/ /gnyis su med pa'i bde ba ni/ /rang byung rtsol ba

bral ba ste/ /bsam gyis mi khyab ngo mtshar che/ /thabs chen rnam gnyis ma bstan par/ /de nyid rtogs pa med pa ste/ /sems nyid nor bu rin chen la/ /'dod pa med pa'i tshul gyis rtogs/ /shes rab lhun gyis grub pa yi/ /ye shes chen po bsam mi khyab/ /

gnyis med lam gyi 'jug pa dang / /zung 'jug chen po rgyal ba'i thugs/ /sgrib med nyi ma gsal ba yis/ /dngos po ma lus snang bar byed/ /don dam ye shes chen po la/ /kun rdzob rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor shar/ /mnyam nyid sems la goms pa ni/ /skyes bu

seng ge lta bur brjid/ /pad+ma 'dam gyi nyes dang bral/ /mi dbang ma yi lto na gnas/ /sel med shes pa ma bcos pa/ /gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yin/ /gnyen pos bcos dang dgag pa med/ /rang lugs ye shes chen por gsal/ /mnyam pa'i gdeng dang

ldan pa yis/ /dpa' bo mi mthun g.yul las rgyal/ /de ltar brtul zhugs spyod pa yis/ /rnal 'byor che la gnas par bya/ /rma bya dug gis mdzes pa ltar/ /dpa' bo nyon mongs rgyan du 'gyur/ /rgyal ba gshegs yul phrin las bzhi/ /de bzhin rnal 'byor

pas shes mdzod/ /'dzin med ye shes chen po'i mes/ /rtog pa'i bag chags sreg par byed/ /sgrib bral byang chub sems la ni/ /dri mas nam yang gos pa med/ /rin thang med pa'i nor bu de/ /bsod nams phun tshogs dag la mnga'/ /ldan min sems kyi

gter mdzod de/ /bla ma'i drin thob rnams la gsal/ /rig byed sems kyi rnam pa ni/ /man ngag rim pas thag bcad de/ /rang bzhin de ltar yid ches pas/ /rnam par mi rtog don dam mo/ /chos rnams nam mkha' mtshon pa ste/ /ngo bo sems kyi yul las

'das/ /smig rgyu'i rgyu yang nam mkha' la/ /sna tshogs snang ba de ltar byos/ /theg mchog yangs pa zab mo'i lam/ /dmigs med spros pa kun las 'das/ /chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa yi/ /de nyid don chen blo la 'char/ /yod med sems kyi

yul las 'das/ /re dogs 'dzin pa mtha' nas sangs/ /chos rnams du ma ro gcig phyir/ /sgom dang mi sgom rtsol ba bral/ /sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas pas/ /chos nyid gzhan du bsgom mi dgos/ /yin par shes pa blo thag chod/ /spangs thob yon tan de tsam

mo/ /rnam par rtog dang mi rtog kyang / /rang bzhin shes pas yongs mi nyams/ /ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pas/ /rjes med bya lam bcos su med/ /mi mthun gnyen po dbyer med pa/ /de shes 'bad pa'i blo dang bral/ /mnyam gzhag chen po'i dgongs pa ste/ /gang

la de yod rig pa can/ /gcer bu ral ba'i gtsug phud can/ /las kyis 'phangs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyis/ /'jig rten sa la mi dor zhing / /de nyid ye shes mthong ba med/ /kun gzhi rnam dag dkar po la/ /snang ba sna tshogs ri mo bkra/ /ji srid nam mkha'i mtha'

yi bar/ /shes rab sprul pa bsam mi khyab/ /sprul tsam nyid na ma nges te/ /mnyam nyid rgyal po'i ngang la gnas/ /dbang bsgyur ye shes chen po ste/ /de nyid gzhan min bdag po nyid/ /sgra tshad lung gi mtshon cha yang / /skye med rang byung ngang nas shar/ /tshangs

pa dbang phyug la sogs kyang / /yi ge shes par ma mthong ngo / /lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes de/ /rtsol bas ring du spong gyur pas/ /rtsol med bla ma'i zhal las ni/ /legs nyes ring thang bral ba ltos/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po til+li pas/ /rgyal po sang

grags seng ge'i sgo drung du mu stegs pa la gdams pa chos nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba i thi// #/ /shan pa la gdams pa bzhugs/ @##/ /e ma sangs rgyas e ma chos/ /e ma gtum po mdzad pa legs/ /e ma gsod pa shin tu

zab/ /a a sdug bsngal gnas nas bsgral/ /rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig ste/ /gsal zhing dngas pa thugs kyi rigs/ /rno zhing rtsub pas 'bigs pa yang / /gang la bsnun pas 'joms par byed/ /ma skyes rdo rje ye shes kyang / /rno zhing 'bigs pa'i rang bzhin

te/ /bsad cing phrin las drag po yis/ /gdug pa ma lus zhi bar mdzod/ /brtse zhing mkhas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ /ci nus bsad pa'i sbyor ba brtsam/ /ngan song gsum du bka' stsal dang / /bsgral ba'i gnas lngar grags pa dang / /snying rje'i yul ni rnam pa gnyis/ /

las dang dge bas bsdus pa'o/ /rang bzhin ye nas rnam dag kyang / /ma rtogs nyon mongs dbang gis ni/ /khams gsum sdug bsngal myong 'gyur la/ /bsad pas thar bar bya phyir ro/ /de yi rig pa 'og min nam/ /sangs rgyas zhing las mi ldog pa'i/ /gnas su nges

par byas pas ni/ /yon tan ldan pa'i gnas su'o/ /chos rnams ci yang min pa las/ /snying rjes bsad par dam bcas nas/ /chos kun 'dzin pa'i shes rab kyis/ /ji ltar rtogs shing goms pa las/ /yig 'bru 'od zer sna tshogs kyis/ /sgrib pa sbyang zhing go 'phang

bsgrod/ /sngags dang phyag rgya ldan pa yis/ /rgyal ba'i thugs rjes gsad par bya/ /de yis chos kun don gcig cing / /de rtsal sgrib pa'i bag chags choms/ /shes rab ting 'dzin dam tshig nye/ /skye 'gyur dogs pa med pas bsad/ /de bsad mchod pa'i khyad par

gyis/ /rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs mnyes/ /de 'ong sems can don bya ste/ /sdug bsngal gnas bsgral bsod nams tshogs/ /rang sems khyad par dam tshig nye/ /bdag don phun sum tshogs pa'o/ /ngan 'gro rnams kyi sgrib pa sbyangs/ /bsad pas byang chub lam la

bkod/ /gzhan don lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /de ltar shes rab chen po yis/ /dngos 'dzin rdul tsam ma dmigs la/ /thabs su ma gyur gang yang med/ /mnyam par shes nas ci dga' gyis/ /ngang las ma g.yos snying rje yis/ /sna tshogs mdzad pa ston par byed/ /

gsod pa'i sbyor ba goms pa yis/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul shes nas/ /yod med dmigs pa las 'das pas/ /log rtog tsam la srog tu snang / /srog kyang med la gcad bya med/ /srog ni dngos por lta ba dang / /mtshan mar zhen pa rnams la snang / /

de ltar mtshan ma bral ba dang / /snying rje'i blo can rnams la min/ /de ltar shes la spong len nam/ /'jug dang rtsol bas len mi 'gyur/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i spyod pa yis/ /de ma rtogs pa'i 'gro ba rnams/ /ma lus rgyal ba'i sa la 'god/ /gtum po rang gi gnas na

'gying / /dpa' bos g.yul las rgyal bar byed/ /nags kyi mun pa me yis bsreg /dug mtsho'i sle la bdud rtsis myos/ /sngon gyi thugs dam chen po yis/ /'jig rten 'gro ba ma lus pa/ /rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor bas na/ /bsad pa'i sbyor ba shes par byos/ /

gzhi rtsa bral ba'i skad cig la/ /yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul du snang / /bdag dang gzhan gyi rang bzhin rnams/ /rnam dag dbyings su tshul gcig go/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug ti l+li pas/ /rigs ngan gtum mo'i grong khyer du shan pa la gdams pa gsod pa'i sbyor ba bsam

gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba i thi// #/ /rig byed mkhan la gdams pa bzhugs// @##/ /dpal ldan thugs kyi gsang ba nas/ /rin chen sgron gyi 'od zer gyis/ /log rtog mun pa sel mdzad pas/ /blo yi legs spyad bsam par rigs/ /sngon

sbyangs bskal pa mang po nas/ /rgyal ba mnyes byed dge ba bskrun/ /don dam pa yi rang bzhin ni/ /shes rab mchog ldan de la gsal/ /ye shes sgyu 'dra'i rgyal ba dang / /log rtog sgyu 'dra'i sems can yang / /sgyu ma yin phyir rang bzhin mnyam/ /de ltar

yongs shes 'gal ba med/ /shes rab chos skur tshul gcig cing / /thabs rnams gzugs skur tshul gcig pa/ /dbyer med dpyad du med pas na/ /sems las sangs rgyas nges par bya/ /de lta bas na bsgrub bya'i lam med cing / /'bad pa byas pa don med

gye na zhig /dper na dgra med skyes bu zhig /rang gi grib mas 'jigs pa ltar/ /brtabs pa'i 'khrul blo can la ni/ /snying rje skye bar cis mi rigs/ /snying rje sgyu ma lta bu yis/ /thabs kyi spyod pa cir yang ston/ /'khor ba spong bar mi byed cing / /thar la 'dod pa mi bskyed kyang / /

rang bzhin shes rab chen po yis/ /rgyal ba'i dgongs pa de ltar bsgoms/ /chos rnams rang bzhin shes pa yis/ /rnam dag sems kyi dbyings la rol/ /ngo bo stong pas rtag dang bral/ /rang bzhin bde bas chad pa med/ /ma bcos gzod nas rnam par dag /dbyer med

zung 'jug sngags kyi lam/ /gnyis med spros dang bral ba'i phyir/ /ming tsam du yang mi dmigs so/ /rmi lam skyes bus dug 'thungs ltar/ /srid las nyon mongs de ltar shes/ /dug gi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de tsam mo/ /rmi lam du

yang nad bsal ltar/ /lam gyi rig pa de bzhin no/ /de nyid 'bras bu mi bslu bas/ /ma rig gnyid log rnams la nges/ /'khor ba rmi lam ltar shes pas/ /mi 'gyur bde thob rlom sems med/ /mtshan ma'i log rtog bral ba na/ /ye shes chen po chos kyi sku/ /

bsod nams rgyal ba'i gzugs sku la/ /ting 'dzin dpe byad dag gis spras/ /rnam smin lus la tshul bzhin du/ /sku gsung 'byor pa 'bras bu'i mchog /rnal 'byor shes rab ting 'dzin gyis/ /sems can thub pa'i spyod yul spyod/ /gnas med dmigs pa'i rdul dang

bral/ /sems can khams la skye ba med/ /de ltar shes pa'i rnal 'byor la/ /mi bya ci yang yod ma yin/ /lus kyi spyod pa la sogs med/ /nam mkha'i ri mo bzhin du blta/ /chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste/ /sems dang sems snang tsam du 'dus/ /sems kyi

rang bzhin byang chub la/ /byang chub kyang ni sems nyid do/ /de ltar sems kyi rang bzhin de/ /nyan thos gang zag med par shes/ /rang rgyal zung don med par shes/ /rnal 'byor spyod pa gzung 'dzin med/ /dbu mas don dam bden pa la/ /sngags kyi bden pa dbyer med

rtogs/ /snang ba'i bag chags che chung gis/ /theg pa'i dbye ba bsam mi khyab/ /rgyu la ma brtan 'bras bu ni/ /med ces thub pas mdo ru gsungs/ /rgyu med 'bras bur dag pa ni/ /khyod kyi yul min bden pa'i bka'/ /chos rnams rnam par sgrub

byed cing / /mtshan nyid tsam du dmigs pa na/ /rigs pas gnod pa la sogs pa/ /dngos por lta rnams phan tshun gsal/ /de ltar rnam par dpyad pa yis/ /phyag rgya chen po'i tshul la ni/ /phyogs tsam reg pa ma yin pas/ /rgya mtsho chen po mjal dang mtshungs/ /

phyi nang snang srid chos rnams kun/ /rang bzhin gnyis med gdod nas dag /lam gyis bcos nas bsgrub tu med/ /rtsol med lhun gyis grub pa'o/ /gser gyi gling na rdo med ltar/ /phyi nang bsdus pa'i chos rnams la/ /skyon zhes ming yang ma grub ste/ /thams cad

rol pa'i rgyan du 'gyur/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas/ grong khyer pad+ma can gyi rig byed mkhan la gdams pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba i thi// #/ /sgyu ma mkhan la gdams pa bzhugs// @##/ /kye ho/ /bzhin bzang rnal 'byor brtson pas

nga la nyon/ /legs so legs so khyod kyi mdzad pa legs/ /theg pa'i tshul chen thub pa'i gsung rab rnams/ /sgyu ma lta bur rgyal bas rab tu gsungs/ /chos rnams thams cad sgyu ma smig rgyu dang / /rmi lam gzugs brnyan sprul pa lta bu ru/ /legs par shes na nyon mongs

spang du med/ /rang grol ye shes thub pa'i dgongs pa'o/ /khyod kyis rde'u shing bu la sogs la/ /sbyor ba goms pas sngags kyis bsnun pa na/ /skyes pa bud med rta dang glang po sogs/ /gzugs brnyan sna tshogs snang ba 'byung ba na/ /dang po gang nas kyang ni ma byung la/ /snang

ba'i tshe na sgyu ma yin pa'i phyir/ /mtshan nyid gang yang yod min sgyu ma bsdus pa na/ /'gags shing mi snang gyur tshe gang du'ang song ba med/ /bsdus te mi snang gyur kyang skad cig rgyud ma chad/ /de ltar snang dang mi snang gnyis ka'i mtshan nyid med/ /gcig gnyis yin phyir ji srid

rkyen nyid dang / /nye bar gnas par snang tsam mtshan nyid rdzogs/ /de bzhin smig rgyu zhes bya mtshan nyid kyang / /sa phyogs tsha sgo can la nye bar gnas/ /nyi mas gdung dang ser bu'i 'jol phyogs 'bab/ /rgyang nas bltas pas chu klung gang bar mthong / /de nyid byung dang snang ba 'gags

pas kyang / /snang dang mi snang dbyer med mtshan nyid gcig /rmi lam zhes bya skyes bu gnyid log pas/ /gnyid nang kun dga' ra ba skyed mos tshal/ /longs spyod sna tshogs rmi zhing snang gyur kyang / /btson ra khri mon sdug bsngal sna tshogs snang / /skye dang gnas dang 'gag par 'gyur

ba'i tshe/ /don gyi cha gzhan bsgrub par byas pa med/ /gzugs brnyan zhes bya me long dag pa la/ /sna tshogs gzugs su snang bar gyur pa na/ /skye 'gag la sogs rnam gzhag gzhan med pas/ /snang dang mi snang dbyer med mtshan nyid gcig /sprul pa zhes bya ye shes ting 'dzin

nam/ /rig sngags grub pa'i mthu las byung gyur pa/ /me tog kha dog dbye ba'i rnam pa yis/ /de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs snang bar 'gyur/ /de bzhin phyi nang dngos po sna tshogs snang ba dag /ji srid gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa yis/ /bag chags dbang gis

nye bar gnas pa de srid du/ /dngos po sna tshogs snang ba 'byung bar gyur pa rnams/ /dang po byung tshe gang nas ma byung la/ /snang tsam nyid na bag chags dbang gis snang / /gzung 'dzin gnyis kyi bag chags zad pa na/ /mi snang gyur tshe gang du'ang song ba med/ /khyod kyi sgyu

ma sems dang sems byung dang / /tshor ba 'du shes nye bar mi spyod cing / /'gro ba'i phung po sems dang sems byung dang / /tshor dang 'du shes nye bar spyod pa can/ /mgo mi mtshungs zhes yid gnyis byed gyur na/ /mtshungs par gyur pa'i sgyu ma la sogs pa/ /drang srong dag la

b+ha le bcol ba 'am/ /bzang po'i sgyu mas thub la gdugs tshod bul/ /tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa sgyu ma'i snang ba yis/ /bye brag gyur pa med de mgo mnyam mo/ /smig rgyu dag kyang nyams kyi 'du 'phro yis/ /lam gyi bya ba byed kyang mgo mnyam mo/ /rmi lam dag la lha yis

lung bstan nas/ /ma 'ongs dngos po ston te bye brag med/ /gzugs brnyan pra yis sngags las grub pa yis/ /lkog gyur rkun mo'i gzugs mthong tha dad med/ /sprul pa 'gro ba'i don du rgyal bas sprul/ /bskal par gnas te mdzad pa sgrub pa yod/ /lo zla

skad cig sna tshogs snang ba yang / /sprul par rtogs te bye brag mtshungs pa'o/ /de ltar sgyu ma 'dra ba'i dngos po sna tshogs kun/ /'byin dang sdud dang 'phel bar byed pa yis/ /de ltar de la sdig pas yongs mi gos/ /bsod nams dag kyang de bzhin shes par bya/ /gang la

sdig dang bsod nams gnyis med pa/ /de ltar gyur la byang chub rab tu gsungs/ /chu yis gnod la gzings kyis phan pa sgrub/ /chu med gyur tshe gzings kyis dgos pa med/ /de bzhin gnas ngan len gyis gnod kyi bar/ /sgyu mar shes pa gang la yod pa phan/ /gnas ngan len gyi

gnod pa bral ba na/ /bsod nams sgyu ma lta bus dgos pa med/ /sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin mnyam pa ste/ /chos rnams thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong / /rang bzhin 'od gsal gzod nas 'dus ma byas/ /sgyu mas gos min ye nas sangs rgyas so/ /de ltar shes

nas bdag dang dbyer med pa/ /phung sogs sgyu ma tsam du snang ba yis/ /de bzhin gshegs par shes pa'i blo ldan ni/ /lam gyi mchog tu rgyal bas rab tu gsungs/ /de ltar khyod kyi bya ba'i chos mtshon dpe/ /bden pas stong pa'i chos nyid gang yin de/ /nges pa'i don du yang

dag stong par rtogs/ /chos kyi dbyings yin rnam par dag pa'i ngang / /'gro ba sgyu mas lam yang der gshegs nas/ /ye shes sgyu ma lta bus don byed shog /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas grong khyer grags pa skyong du sgyu ma mkhan la gdams pa dngos po bsam gyis

mi khyab ces bya ba rdzogs so/ i thi/ sa ma pa tha/ #/ /smad 'tshong la gdams pa bzhugs/ @##/ /a ho srid rtsa bde ba che/ /sems can kun gyi rang bzhin ni/ /gnyis med bde bas tshim gyur pas/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal/ /thabs chen

gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dag /rol pa bde ba'i nyams dang ldan/ /phrin las mdzad pa'i dgongs pa las/ /dus gsum mnyam pa'i tshul du bzhugs/ /thabs kyis bskul bas shes rab chags/ /de bzhin shes rab bde zhen sel/ /gnyis med rol pa'i ye shes

kyis/ /rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur/ /rdo rje dbang gis stobs ldan pas/ /'khor lo bzhi dang srog shing gsum/ /me rlung thabs ldan sbyor shes pas/ /ye shes nam mkha' lta bu mthong / /gang de thabs las byung ba ni/ /gnas bcud thig le mi dmigs pas/ /bde chen thig

le'i stobs las byung / /spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid gsal/ /phung sogs 'jig rten brtags pa kun/ /rang snang sgyu mar snang tsam las/ /phyi nang bden gnyis mnyam sbyor bas/ /ma 'dres gcig dang du ma bral/ /bde chen thig le rang byung las/ /man ngag ldan pas rgyas btab

pas/ /ma rig gnyis 'dzin la sogs dang / /dman pa'i theg pa ring du spangs/ /'dzag dang 'phar dang 'bar ba dang / /'dar dang rgyug dang sgra sogs dang / /rang gsal mngon shes 'chi med sogs/ /skye med nam mkha'i rang bzhin gsal/ /rtsa dang rnam shes rgyu ba las/ /

mi dmigs brjod med gang goms pa/ /grangs las 'das pa'i ye shes kyang / /mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lor mthong / /rang byung bde ba thob mtha' med/ /ngo bo nyid kyis bde mthong zhing / /thig le rang shar sprul pa yis/ /mdzad pa'i rnam 'phrul bsam mi khyab/ /bde chen

theg par grol ba yis/ /bstan pa'i rim pa mtha' yas kyang / /sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/ /thig le chen po'i ngang las 'byung / /dug gis dug nad bsal ba ltar/ /'gro ba chags pas 'dul ba ste/ /skyes bu thabs kyis bder 'jug pa/ /pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin no/ /

bskyed pa thabs kyi 'od zer gyis/ /a la cung zad bde bas reg /rang byung gsang ba'i lam du dril/ /rang rang 'khor lo thim par byed/ /ma lus bde bar shar ba las/ /'khor ba'i bag chags ma lus sangs/ /tha dad la sogs chos med de/ /skye med bde ba'i snying por gsal/ /

'chol pa sprin gyi dum bu dang / /nyi zla sgra gcan mkha' la 'du/ /drag po pho brang sgo la srungs/ /mgo med rang gi gnas na 'gying / /stobs kyis gnas sa'i ga'u sbyor/ /zla ba nam mkha'i dbyings su bstim/ /nyi mas bkod pa'i chu g.yo zhing / /seng ge 'dur

bas lam 'phrang bsal/ /'phen dang sdud par byed pa dang / /gyen du 'gro dang thur la bskul/ /'khor lo bzhi la rgyas 'debs pas/ /bde ba chen po lhun gyis grub/ /'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa rnams/ /gdod nas grub par gnyis su med/ /ma lus bde ba'i gzugs su

shar/ /gsang chen mi ldog rigs su nges/ /'gro la gsang lam 'di bstan pa/ /me tog la ni chu bzhin du/ /shes rab gsum la goms pa yis/ /gsang ba gsum la spyad par bya/ /thabs chen ldan la mngon sum ste/ /gnyis med thig le 'phro 'du med/ /mnyam

pa chen po mchog gi dbyings/ /thabs shes gnyis med rdo rje'i lus/ /phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni/ /dpag med log par 'khyams pa rnams/ /thabs kyis ma skyes pa la bkod/ /'chi ba med pa'i chos skur thim/ /bde ba chen pos khyab pa'i ro/ /lus gnas

lus las ma skyes pas/ /sangs rgyas kun dang dbyer med pa'i/ /thams cad lhan cig skyes par gsal/ /rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug til+li pas sgyu ma sprul pa'i grong khyer du smad 'tshong ma la gdams pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bde ba chen po zhes bya ba i thi// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /sa na sa ra mA na ni yA Ni ka ra nA ma sad+hI ti / bod skad du/ /'khor ba las yid nges par 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i glu/ bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/ /e ma'o/ /'du byed sdug bsngal 'gyur ba'i

sdug bsngal dang / /sdug bsngal sdug bsngal la sogs brgya rtsa bcu / /sdug bsngal kun las skyob par mdzad pa yi/ /sman pa'i rgyal po de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /kye kye kwa'i grogs po dag /'khor ba'i rgyu ni nyon mongs pa dang las/ /nyon mongs khams gsum gnas ni dgu

bcu brgyad/ /zag pa'i chu bo sbyor ba nye bar len/ /rgyu dang yul dang sbyor ba'i stobs kyis byung / /kye kye kwa'i grogs po dag /sna tshogs 'di dag las las byung / /de yang nyon mongs stobs las byung / /dge dang mi dge lung ma bstan/ /mthong la myong dang skyes nas myong / /gzhan du

myong dang ma nges pa'i/ /dkar dang gnag dang 'dren ma'o/ /'khor ba'i las ni lci gang dang / /nye ba gang dang goms pa gang / /sngon byas gang yin de las ni/ /snga ma snga ma rnam smin 'gyur/ /grogs dag soms shig thog ma med pa nas/ /ma rig la sogs bcu gcig rga shi'i mtha'/ /

yan lag bcu gnyis cha gsum zo chun tshul/ /nang gi rten 'brel yang dang yang du 'khor/ /tshe rabs tshe rabs grangs med de dang der/ /skye dang rga dang na dang 'chi ba yi/ /sdug bsngal rnams kyis yang dang yang du gdungs/ /'khrul nas 'khor gyur 'khrul cing 'khor bar 'gyur/ /kyi hud

srid pa'i lam gyis dub pa'i 'gron po rnams/ /sdug bsngal bde bar bzung nas mi skyo ba / /khyed yid de la rtag tu chags byed pa/ /phyugs dang khyad par med par bla ma gsung / /bla mas zin pa'i skye bo mkhas pa dag /skad cig skad cig 'gro ba lnga po kun/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tsher

ma zug 'dra la/ /rus pa'i gting nas snying rje su mi skye/ /las ngan dbang gis 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'dir/ /yang yang skye zhing yang yang rga dang na/ /yang yang 'chi 'gyur 'di ni mi sems par/ /yul la chags byed bdag gis ji ltar bya/ /grogs dag srid pa gsum nang gnas pa kun

sdug bsngal/ /de yang mi yi sdug bsngal bdag gis mthong / /mngal gyi sdug bsngal 'di lta bu ru gnas/ /nur nur mer mer gor gor nar nar po/ /ltar ltar mkhrang dang rkang lag rim gyis rdzogs/ /nu zho mar gyis gso byed cing / /shin tu nyam chung gan rkyal nyal/ /byis pa dar ma lang tsho

dang / /rgas pas slar yang byis bar 'gyur/ /tshe ni mi rtag shin tu g.yo ba ste/ /yud tsam sdod pa'i mthu yang yod ma yin/ /bdag ni nges par 'chi 'gyur mi sems pa/ /grogs dag skyes bu de ni ngo mtshar che/ /'khor ba'i skyon dang nyes dmigs mi shes pas/ /phyin ci log pa

bzhi la gnas nas su/ /bdag ni nges par 'chi 'gyur mi sems par/ /yul la mngon zhen nyin mtshan don med 'das/ /'dzam bu'i gling pa dus min 'chi bas te/ /nges pa can yang zad par 'gyur bas na/ /yang dang yang du nges par 'chi 'o zhes/ /bsam par rigs so kwa'i

bzhin bzang dag /so ga me tog rgyas pa'i dus 'di byung bar gyur / /zla ba gsal bas mtshon pa'i ston dus 'di 'byung zhes/ /skye bo thams cad dga' 'gyur bdag gi tshe 'di ni/ /zad par 'gyur zhes shin tu mi dgar 'gyur ba med/ /de ring 'di bya sang ni 'di bya de nas 'di dang 'di bya zhes/ /srid

pa g.yo ba'i rang bzhin ma shes don med yid brtan tshol byed pa'i/ /skye dgu 'chi bdag gi ni chu srin khar ni gru ni zhugs pa ltar/ /bya ba mthar ma phyin par yul gyi chu yi dba' klong nang du lhung / /'di ni sang bya 'di ni thang cig 'og tu bya/ /'di ni de'u re bya zhes skye bo sems pa na/ /gshin rje be

con lag thogs zur gyis lta byed cing / /mig rtsa dmar khros ma rungs gad mos re snyam 'debs/ /rnal 'byor bstan bcos thams cad dang / /sbyor ba du ma rab shes kyang / /deng bya sang bya zhes smra zhing / /bsam dang ldan pas 'chi bar 'gyur/ /tshe 'di gnod mang rlung gis btab pa

yi/ /chu yi chu bur bas kyang mi rtag na/ /dbugs 'byung dbugs rngub gnyid kyis log pa las/ /sang khom gang lags de ni ngo mtshar che/ /kye kye kwa'i grogs po dag /tshe ni yun thung shes bya'i rnam pa mang / /tshe yi tshad kyang ci tsam mi shes pas/ /ngang pas chu las

'o ma len pa ltar/ /rang gi 'dod pa dang la blang bar gyis/ /kye kye kwa'i grogs po dag /'jig rten spyod pa dag la phar bltas na/ /byas pa thams cad don med sdug bsngal rgyu/ /ci la bsams kyang phan par mi 'gyur bas/ /rang gi sems la lta ba goms par gyis/ /kye kye

kwa'i grogs po dag /tshad ma bdun dang brda sprod rnam pa bzhi/ /mngon pa dang ni yo ga tsar+ya'i sa/ /mdo sde dang ni 'dul ba mngon pa dang / /gzhung du bkod pa ma lus thams cad kun/ /ma mthong ma mnyan ma bshad ma bris zhes/ /de la gdung ba ma bskyed bzhin bzangs dag /

bla ma'i man ngag ces bya bdud rtsi'i ro/ /gang gis sems mnyam 'jog pa de tsam zhig /yongs su btsal gyis gzhung mangs ci zhig dgos/ /thams cad yid ni 'khrul par byed pa'i rgyu/ /'khor ba'i gnas 'di nges pa med pas na/ /pha ma la sogs pha mar ma nges pas/ /nye du

'brel ba dag la chags pa spangs / /dgra yang ma nges de la sdang ba spangs / /nad med lang tsho phun sum tshogs pa dang / /'dod yon lnga la rang bzhin gyis chags spangs / /rnyed pa dang ni bkur sti grags pa dang / /rigs dang rus dang tshigs su bcad pa spangs/ /slob ma yang slob chos

kyi 'brel pa spangs/ / kye kye kwa'i grogs po dag /'jig rten stag sbrul med dang dug 'dra bar/ /bsams nas spangs te dben par gnas par bya/ bud med mtshan nyid skyes pa'i mtshan nyid dang / /sman dang glang chen brtags pa'am gza' skar rtsis/ /mtshon cha brtags

pa'am rta dpyad rang bzo'am/ /bstan bcos ngan pa slob dang klog pa spangs/ /yul la mngon dga'i sems ni byung ba dang / /rnam rtog de dag rnams ni byung ba nas/ /bdag ni nges par 'chi ba dran byas la/ /'og nas 'byung ba'i gnyen po rnams kyis bzlog /rnam rtog mang ba

dbugs bgrang pa yis gzhil/ /'dod chags sems byung rnam par rtog pa de/ /rang bzhin mi gtsang keng rus blta bas bzlog /zhe sdang la ni byams pa'i chu yis btab / /gti mug la ni rten 'brel lam gyis so/ /mi gtsang ba dang byams pa rten 'brel gyi/ /man ngag bla

ma'i zhal nas 'byung bzhin bya/ /'khor ba la yid ches bar 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i glu/ /slob dpon dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / /zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba rgya bston seng ges bi ka ma la shI la'i gtsug

lag khang du bsgyur ba'o/ /slad nas bla ma de nyid dang / /lo tsA ba tshul khrims rgyal bas bcos shing gtan la phab pa //[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /d+har+m+ma d+hA tu sa ra gI ta/ bod skad du/ /chos kyi dbyings lta ba'i glu/ /thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal

lo/ /gang zhig kun du ma shes na/ /srid pa gsum du rnam 'khor ba/ /sems can kun la nges gnas pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings la phyag 'tshal nas/ /chos dbyings lta zhing gzhan min pa/ /de dag rim bzhin brjod par bya/ /zab zhi spros bral de bzhin

nyid/ /'od gsal 'dus ma byas pa gang / /ma skyes ma 'gags gzod nas dag /rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa yis/ /chos dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa/ /blo mig zhib mo rtog bral ba/ /bying rgod rab rib med pas blta/ /gang zhig 'khor ba'i rgyur gyur pa/ /de nyid

bya ba byas pa las/ /dag pa de ni mya ngan 'das/ /chos kyi sku yang de nyid do/ /ji ltar 'o ma dang 'dres pas/ /mar gyi snying po mi snang ba/ /de bzhin nyon mongs dang 'dres pas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang mi mthong ngo / /ji ltar 'o ma rnam sbyangs pas/ /mar gyi snying po dri med 'gyur/ /

de bzhin nyon mongs rnam sbyangs bas/ /chos dbyings shin tu dri med 'gyur/ /ji ltar mar me bum nang gnas/ /cung zhig snang bar mi 'gyur ba/ /de bzhin nyon mongs bum nang gnas/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang mi snang ngo / /phyogs ni gang dang gnag dag gnas/ /bum pa

bu ga btod gyur pa/ /de dang de yi phyogs nyid nas/ /'od kyi rang bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur/ /gang tshe ting 'dzin rdo rje yis/ /bum pa de nyid bcag gyur pa/ /de tshe de yi nam mkha' yis/ /mthar thugs bar du snang bar byed/ /chos kyi dbyings ni skye ma yin/ /nam yang 'gag

par 'gyur ba med/ /dus rnams kun du nyon mongs med/ /thog ma bar mtha' dri ma bral/ /ji ltar rin chen bai DU R+Ya/ /dus rnams kun du 'od gsal yang / /rdo yi nang na gnas gyur na/ /de yi 'od ni gsal ma yin/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis bsgrigs pa'i/ /chos dbyings

shin tu dri med pas/ /'khor bar 'od ni gsal ma yin/ /ji ltar sbun pas g.yogs gyur ba/ /so ba 'bras nyid mi 'dod ltar/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pas/ /de ni sangs rgyas zhes mi rtag /ji ltar sbun pa las grol na/ /'bras nyid snang bar 'gyur

ba ltar/ /de bzhin nyon mongs las grol na/ /chos kyi sku nyid rab tu gsal/ /ji ltar sbrum ma'i lto na bu/ /yod kyang mthong ba ma yin pas/ /de bzhin nyon mongs kyis g.yogs pa'i/ /chos kyi dbyings kyang mthong ma yin/ /chos dbyings gang phyir bdag ma yin/ /bud

med ma yin skyes pa min/ /gzung ba kun las rnam grol bas/ /ji ltar 'dzin par brtag par bya/ /mi gtsang mi rtag sdug bsngal zhes/ /bya ba gsum pos sems spyod byed/ /stong pa nyid ni ston pa'i mdo/ /rgyal bas ji skad gsungs pa ste/ /de dag kun gyis nyon mongs

ldog /khams de nyams par byed ma yin/ /mchog tu sems ni sbyong byed pa'i/ /chos ni rang bzhin med pa yin/ /ji ltar ri bong mgo yi rwa// brtags pa nyid de med pa ltar/ /de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyang / /brtags pa nyid de yod ma yin/ /phra rab rdul

gyi ngo bo nyid/ /glang gi rwa yang dmigs ma yin/ /ji ltar sngon bzhin phyis de bzhin/ /de la ji zhig brtag par bya/ /brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / /brten nas 'gag par 'gyur ba dang / /gnas pa dag kyang yod min na/ /byis pa ji ltar rtog par byed/ /chos

dbyings rang bzhin nam mkha' yin/ /khams ltar gyu med rkyen med de/ /skye dang rga dang gnas pa dang / /'jig pa med pa 'dus ma byas/ /sangs rgyas chos dbyer med pa dang / /de rigs de bzhin thob pa dang / /brdzun med slu med 'tshe med pas/ /gdod

nas rang bzhin zhi nyid do/ /gang phyir de ni rgya mtsho ltar/ /sgra dang dpe dang blo rnams kyis/ /gting dang pha rol mi rnyed pa/ /de phyir rab tu zab pa nyid/ /chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med phyir/ /lta ba tha dad rung ma yin/ /'on kyang blo yi bye brag gis/ /lta ba

tha dad cung zad brjod/ /dbu ma nyid du smra ba rnams/ /de don bden pa gnyis su 'dod/ /kun rdzob dang ni don dam mo/ /bden gnyis rnam dbye shes pa dag /thub pa'i bka' la mi rmongs te/ /de dag ma lus tshogs bsags nas/ /phun tshogs pha rol 'gro ba nyid/ /

bdag dang bdag gi rtag chad dang / /nyon mongs rnam byang rgyu 'bras dang / /gzung dang 'dzin par gang spros pa/ /'di ni kun rdzob bden pa'o/ /stong nyid bdag med zhi ba gang / /spros pa rnams kyis mgos pa/ /tha dad don min rnam mi rtog /'di ni don dam bden

pa'o/ /yang dag yang dag ma yin dang / /rnam grangs rnam grangs ma yin pas/ /de gnyis so sor dbye ba byas/ /rtags tsam snang grags dngos po dang / /tha snyad 'khrul ba sgyu ma dang / /kun rdzob nyid ni rnam grangs so/ /stong pa nyid dang yang dag mtha'/ /mtshan ma med dang don

dam dang / /chos kyi dbyings ni rnam grangs so/ /gang phyir sgrib pas kun rdzob ste/ /'gyur ba med phyir don dam mo/ /yang dag yang dag ma yin pa'i/ /shes pa gnyis phyir bden pa gnyis/ /yang dag shes pa med ce na/ /bden te tha snyad tsam du yod/ /de nyid tshol la thog

mar ni/ /thams cad yod ces brjod par bya/ /don rnams rtogs shing chags med la/ /phyis ni rnam par dbye don nyid/ /bden gnyis gcig dang tha dad min/ /nyes pa bzhi bzhi gsungs phyir ro/ /gcig dang tha dad gang rtogs pa/ /de ni tshul min zhugs pa yin/ /dngos

por khas len yod na ni/ /'dod chags zhe sdang mi zad 'byung / /lta ba ma rungs yongs su 'dzin/ /de las byung ba'i rtsod par 'gyur/ /dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la ni/ /thob pa med cing mngon rtogs med/ /rjes mthun bzod pa'ang yod min na/ /mya ngan 'das pa'ang

smos ci dgos/ /stong pa nyid la lta nyes na/ /shes rab chung ldan phung bar 'gyur/ /ji ltar sbrul la bzung nyes dang / /rig sngags log par bsgrubs pa bzhin/ /rgyal ba kun gyis stong nyid ni/ /lta kun nges par 'byin par gsungs/ /gang dag stong pa nyid lta ba/ /de dag

bsgrub tu med par gsungs/ /gang dag rang dngos gzhan dngos kyis/ /dngos dang dngos med nyid mthong ba/ /de dag sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /yang dag mthong ba ma yin no/ /med pa yod pa'i zlas grangs te/ /yod pa'ang med pa'i zlas grangs pa/ /de phyir med par

brjod mi bya/ /yod pa nyid du 'ang mi brtag go/ /yod pa pa ni bde 'gror 'gro/ /med pa pa ni ngang 'gror 'gyur/ /yang dag ji bzhin yongs shes phyir/ /gnyis la mi brten bar par 'gyur/ /tshul gnyis shing rta zhon nas su/ /rig pa'i sra ba skyogs 'ju byed pa/ /de dag de phyir

ji bzhin don/ /theg pa chen po pa nyid 'thob/ /gzugs sogs ji ltar snang ba nas/ /bde gshags par gyi chos rnams kun/ /ri bong ba lang rwa yi dpes/ /dbu ma nyid du goms par bya/ /yod min med min yod med min/ /gnyis min bdag nyid du yang med/ /

mtha' bzhi las ni nges grol ba/ /de nyid dbu mar mkhas rnams bzhed/ /dbu ma mtha' las rnam grol na/ /mtha' dang bral phyir dbu ma'ang med/ /mtha' dbus med par gang lta ba/ /de ni yang dag lta ba ste/ /bla na med pa'i lta ba yin/ /blo ldan rnams kyis rtag tu

bsgoms/ /gang zhig lta ba 'dir zhugs pa/ /nges ni thams cad mkhyen pa thob/ /rnam rigs tsam du smra ba rnams/ /ngo bo nyid ni gsum du 'dod/ /kun brtags gzhan dbang yongs grub po/ /brtags dang rgyu las skyes pa dang / /mi 'gyur phyir na go rims bzhin/ /

rnam par rtog pa gang gang gis/ /dngos po gang gang rnam brtags pa/ /de nyid kun du brtags pa yis/ /ngo bo nyid de de med do/ /gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid/ /rnam rtog yin te rkyen las byung / /grub ni de la snga ma po/ /rtag tu med par gyur pa gang / /

yod dang med pa'i mtha' gnyis kyis/ /de phyir de nyid gzhan dbang las/ /gzhan min gzhan pa yin pa'ang min/ /mi rtag la sogs bzhin du brjod/ /chu shel bai DU R+Ya yi dpes/ /ngo bo nyid gsum shes par bya/ /bdag dang chos su brtags pa dang / /

rnam par dag dang ma dag dang / /'gyur med phyin ci ma log pa/ /rim bzhin re re 'ang gnyis gnyis so/ /blo gros bzang po thams cad ni/ /nang sems pa la brtson pa yin/ /gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol ba'i/ /rnam shes dam pa'i don du yod/ /chos rnams 'ga'

yang skye ba dang / /'gag pa cung zad yod min te/ /skyes pa 'ba' zhig kho na ni/ /skye ba dang ni 'gag par 'gyur/ /yod min chos rnams de dag snang / /bems po las min gzhan las min/ /med pa las min nyes gnyis phyir/ /de phyir shes pa'i bdag

nyid yod/ /rnam shes bems po'i rang bzhin las/ /bzlog par rab tu skye bar gsungs/ /sems min rang bzhin gang yin pa/ /de 'dri bdag nyid rig par 'dod/ /nam mkha' las rlung nyi ma dang / /rgya mtsho phyogs dang 'dab chu ni/ /nang gi shes pa yang dag gi/ /cha yin

phyi rol ltar snang ngo / /gsal ba'i rang bzhin du snang bas/ /de dag 'brel ba lkog gyur min/ /gang dang 'brel bas gang rig pa/ /de yis rig bya de rig 'gyur/ /ral gri'i so dang so rtse bzhin/ /blo yis rang 'dzin dor zhe na/ /rang nyid snang ba dor min par/ /dgongs pa nges

par 'grel las gsungs/ /de'i phyir blo yi mtshan nyid ni/ /rang rig par ni grub pa yin/ /de nyid rtogs par dka' ba na/ /'di yi ngo bo dpyad mi nus/ /rang rig de yang phra ba'i phyir/ /sangs rgyas rnams kyis phra bar gzigs/ /rang la gnas kyang bdag 'dra bas/ /rmongs

pa'i phyir na mthong ba med/ /gsal dang blo ni bdag nyid kyis/ /'brel ba yod phyir don tsam yin/ /shes pa'i rang bzhin bden pa ste/ /rnam pa brdzun zhing 'khrul pa yin/ /sems ni rnam par bslad pa'i phyir/ /gcig gnyis gnyis su snang ba yin/ /gzung dang 'dzin

pa'i dbye ba las/ /shin tu mkhas pa cis ma yin/ /gzung ba'i rnam pa mi g.yo'i phyir/ /phyi rol lta bur snang ba yin/ /'dzin pa'i rnam pa rab g.yo bas/ /nang lta bur ni snang ba nyid/ /mtshan ma de ni spangs nas su/ /ye shes nam mkha' lta bur bsgom/ /sems kyi

rang bzhin zag pa med/ /zag bcas sa bon ma zad par/ /kun gzhi gnas skabs de dag nyid/ /zad nas zag pa med pa'i dbyings/ /rnam par grol ba'i sku dang ni/ /rtag tu nyi zer nyi ma bzhin/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams gnas yin pas/ /skyob pa rnams kyi chos

sku'o/ /nyan thos theg par zhugs pa rnams/ /bdag dang bdag gis dben pa yi/ /phung po khams dang skye mched dang / /bzhi lnga'am dus ni gsum yang rung / /yod pa thams cad gzung bya yin/ /dmigs dang bcas pas 'dzin par byed/ /de gnyis dam pa'i don du 'dod/ /

bden pa mthong dang goms pa las/ /nyon mongs spangs pa zhes bshad pa/ /bden pa bdag ni rnam bzhi ste/ /sdug bsngal de bzhin kun 'byung dang / /'gog pa lam ste de lta na/ /de dag ji ltar gdon rtogs rim/ /sdug bsngal nyer len phung po'o/ /kun 'byung ba las dang

nyon mongs te/ /'gog pa mya ngan 'das pa gnyis/ /lam ni phyogs mthun sum cu bdun/ /tshul gnas thos dang bsam ldan pa/ /bsgom pa la ni rab tu sbyor/ /dge sbyong tshul ni dri med lam/ /'bras bu 'dus byas 'dus ma byas/ /de dag brgyad cu rtsa dgu'o/ /

grol lam zad pa rnams dang bcas/ /'bras bu bzhi rnam gzhag pa ni/ /rgyu lnga dag ni srid phyir ro/ /nyan thos rnam bzhi sprul pa dang / /rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'gyur ba dang / /zhi bgrod grub mtha' 'dzin pa'o/ /de ni gnyis bzhi bco brgyad de/ /gnyis ni bye

brag smra ba dang / /de bzhin mdo sde smra ba'o/ /rnam pa med pa'i shes pa yis/ /gzugs la sogs pa don rig 'dod/ /de ni bye brag smra ba yin/ /gang zhig don gyis phan btags pa'i/ /gzugs brnyan rnams la nyams myongs bas/ /don rig 'dod pa mdo

sde ba'o/ /bzhi ni dge 'dun phal chen dang / /thams cad yod smra gnas brtan pa/ /mang pos bkur ba bco brgyad ni/ /shar dang nub dang gangs ri ra gnas/ /'jig rten 'das par smra ba'i sde/ /rtag par smra ba'i sde pa dang / /lnga tshan dge 'dun phal chen pa/ /gzhi

kun yod smra 'od srungs te/ /sa ston sde dang 'od srungs te/ /mang thos gos dmar slob ma dang / /rnam par phye ste smra ba'i sde/ /thams cad yod par smra ba yin/ /rgyal byed tshal gnas 'jigs med gnas/ /gtsug lag khang chen gnas brtan pa/ /sa sgrogs

ris dang srung ba pa/ /gnas ma bu yi sde pa ni/ /kun gyis bkur ba rnam pa gsum/ /yul don slob dpon bye brag gi /tha dad rnam pa bco brgyad do/ /rang rgyal byang chub don gnyer bas/ /gzung ba'i rtog pa spangs phyir dang / /'dzin pa ma spangs phyir na ste/ /

rten gyi bse ru lta bu'i lam/ /bskal ba brgya yi mthar thug par/ /bsgoms pas byang chub reg par 'gyur/ /de ni rten cing 'brel 'byung ba/ /yan lag bcu gnyis chags gsum mo/ /sngon dang phyi mthar gnyis gnyis dang / /bar du brgyad yongs rdzogs ldan la/ /ma rig

nyon mongs sngon gnas skabs/ /'du byed dag ni sngon 'das kyi/ /rnam shes mtshams sbyor phung po yin/ /ming dang gzugs ni de phan chad/ /skye mched drug dod tshun chad do/ /de ni gsum 'dus tshun chad do/ /reg pa bde sdug la sogs kyi/ /rgyu shes nus pa tshun chad do/ /

chor 'khrig tshun chad sred pa ni/ /longs spyod 'khrig pa chags bcas kyi/ /nye bar len pa longs spyod rnams/ /thob par bya phyir yongs rgyug pa'o/ /de srid 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur ba'i/ /las de nyid ni srid pa yin/ /nying mtshams sbyor ba skye ba yin/ /tshor ba'i bar ni

rga shi yin/ /'di ni gnas skabs bar 'dod lo/ /gtso bo'i phyir na yan lag bsgrags/ /sngon dang phyi mtha' bar dag la/ /rmongs pa rnam par bzlog phyir ro/ /nyon mongs gsum mo las gnyis so/ /bzhi bdun de bzhin 'bras bu yin/ /gnyis kyi rgyu 'bras mdor bsdus

pa/ /bar ma'i rjes su dpag pa las/ /'dir ni 'byung ba rgyu yin te/ /byung ba 'bras bu nyid du 'dod/ /yan lag bcu gnyis de dag las/ /rgyu ni rnam lnga 'bras bu bdun/ /'phen par byed dang 'phangs pa dang / /mngon par 'grub byed grub pa dang / /nyes dmigs kyi ni

yan lag ste/ /gsum bzhi gsum gyi gcig rim pa bzhin/ /'du byed sdug bsngal 'gyur ba yi/ /sdug bsngal nyid ni rim bzhin du/ /ldang dang bzhi dang lnga yin no/ /khams gsum na ni rim bzhin du/ /bcu gnyis bcu gcig bcu yis 'jug /rdzus skyes yan

lag bcu gcig gis/ /mngal dang sgong skyes bcu gnyis kyis/ /drod gsher las skyes ci rigs 'jug /de bzhin 'gro ba lnga la sbyar/ /gsum po dag las gnyis 'byung ste/ /gnyis las bdun 'byung bdun las kyang / /gsum 'byung srid pa'i 'khor lo ste/ /nyid

ni yid dang yid du 'khor/ /'khor ba'i ngo bo rnam pa dang / /gang gzhig gang du gang gis ngang / /ji ltar ji srid nyes dmigs ni/ /mtha' yas tshogs kyis rab tu 'jug /brtsam par bya zhing 'byung bar bya/ /sangs rgyas bstan la 'jug par bya/ /'dam bu'i khyim na

glang chen bzhin/ /'chi bdag sde ni gzhom par bya/ /gang zhig rab tu bag yod par/ /chos 'dul 'di la spyod 'gyur ba/ /skye ba'i 'khor ba rab spangs nas/ /sdug bsngal tha mar byed par 'gyur/ /mya ngan gang las 'da' ba dang / /gang zhig gang gis gang gi tshe/ /gang

gis gang phyir ji lta bur/ /ji srid ngo bo rnam pa dang / /thob bya dbye ba phrin las dang / /yon tan tshogs kyis ldog pa'o/ /mu stegs pa ni rnam pa gnyis/ /sprul pa ba dang rang rgyud pa/ /de yang skyes thob sbyor 'byung ngo / /skyes thob rigs chad log sred can/ /sbyor byung

bsam gtan rtog ge ba/ /bsam gtan pa ni mngon shes mthus/ /lta ba drug cu gnyis su rtogs/ /rtag par smra ba rnam bzhi dang / /kha cig rtag par smra ba bzhi/ /mtha' yod sogs bzhi mi spong bzhi/ /rgyud med gnyis ni sngon mthar rtog /'du shes yod smra bcu drug

dang / /med smra brgyad dang de bzhin du/ /yod min med min smra ba brgyad/ /chad smra bdun dang tshe 'di la/ /mya ngan 'da' bar smra ba lnga/ /phyi ma'i mthar rtog lta ba'o/ /rtog ge ba ni grangs can sogs/ /tshad mas grub mtha' 'dzin pa'o/ /grangs can yon tan

gsum du brjod/ /snying stobs rdul dang mun pa'o/ /rangs dang mgu dang kun dga' dang / /bde bzhi pa yi sems nyi dag /res 'ga' yang ni snang gyur pa/ /de dag snying stobs yon tan no/ /mi dga' ba dang yongs gdud dang / /mya ngan 'dod dang mi bzod

dag /gang du snang ba'i gtan tshigs kyis/ /de dag rdul gyi rtags su 'dod/ /rmongs pa de bzhin gti mug dang / /bag med gnyid dang gsal ba dang // len 'ga' yang ni snang gyur pa/ /de dag mun pa'i yon tan no/ /yon tan gsum gyi rang bzhin/

mchog /mthong ba'i lam du 'gyur ma yin/ /mthong ba'i lam du gang gyur pa// sgyu ma bzhin du shin tu gsog /rang bzhin las ni chen po ste/ /de las nga rgyal rnam gsum 'byung / /da la dbang po bcu gcig dang / /de tsam lnga'o de lnga las/ /'byung ba lnga ste nyi shu bzhi/ /

gco bo nyid dang rnam 'gyur ro/ /de dag sems pa yod ma yin/ /skyes bu kun rig sems pa can/ /de dag nyi shu lngas shes na/ /ral ba spyi bo gtsug phud kyis/ /bsti gnas gang du dga' ba der/ /grol 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ /byer bag pa ni don drug 'dod/ /rdzas dang

yon tan las dang spyi/ /bye brag 'du ba rnams pa drug /rdzas dgu yon tan nyi shu bzhi/ /las lnga spyi gnyis bye brag gnyis/ /de bzhin 'du ba'ang rnam gnyis te/ /de nyid du gshes rig pa'i mchog/ /rig byed kun gyi pha rol phyin/ /gcer bu ba rnams don dgu smra/ /srog dang

zag pa sdom pa dang / /nges par dga' dang 'chi ba dang / /las dang sdig dang bsod nams dang / /thar pa zhes bya don dgu po/ /gang gis mthong ste rnam par dag /rigs ba can don bcu drug 'dod/ /tshad ma gzhal bya the tshom dang / /dgos pa dpe dang grub mtha' dang / /

cha shas rtog ge gtan la dbab/ /rtsod dang brjod dang rgol ba dang / /rgyu ltar snang ba tshig dor dang / /ltag chod chad pa'i gnas rnams te/ /bcu drug gis ni nges par 'byung / /dpyod pa pa ni don bzhir brjod/ /sa dang chu dang me dang rlung / /de dag 'dus ma byas pa ste/ /rtag tu

skye 'gag med par gnas/ /de bas las 'bras yod ma yin/ /sngon dang phyi mtha' de bzhin med/ /gang zhig de ltar rnam dpyod pa/ /mthong pa tsam gyis rnam grol 'gyur/ /khyab 'jug byed rgyur rma ba rnams/ /nyi ma'i nang na khyab bdag 'jug /skar nang 'od gnas zla ba

yin/ /rlung nang nga ni 'od zer can/ /snang ba can na nyi ma yin/ /rig bye dang na snyan tshig dang / /lha nang nga ni brgya byin te/ /dbang po'i nang na yid yin no/ /'byung ba'i nang na sa yin zhing / /nga ni bde byed drag po'ang yin/ /srin po gnod sbyin nang rol bdag /nor lha'i nang

na me lha pa/ /ri bo'i nang na nga ri rab/ /nga ni yi ge'i nang na a/ /nya dang rus sbal phag dang ni/ /mi yi seng ge mi thung dang / /dga' byed ra ma Na nag po/ /sangs rgyas tsar ti ka dang bcu/ /gang gis khyab 'jug yon tan rnams/ /rtag tu bsgoms na bde thob 'gyur/ /dbang

phyug byed rgyur 'dod pa rnams/ /'gro ba 'di dag thams cad kyi/ /byed pa po ni dbang phyug yin/ /de ni yon tan brgya dang ldan/ /rab phra yang ba mchod par 'os/ /bdag por gyur dang dbang du gyur/ /gar yang phyin dang 'dod dgur ldan/ /de bzhin dga' mgur gnas pa'o/ /

lag pa dag dang rkang pa dang / /mig dang gdong dang lus rnams kyi/ /mang po bskyed cing 'jig byed pas/ /des na phra bar brjod pa yin/ /mkha' dang rlung dang sa dang ni/ /chu dang me dag gnas byed cing / /sdud pa dang ni rgyas byed pas/ /nges na yang par brjod pa

yin/ /'jig rten gsum na mchod gyur cing / /gnas pa bdag dang rgyu ba dang / /'byung po kun gyis brjed pas na/ /des ni mchod par 'os pa yin/ /'byung po kun la dbang byed cing / /gnas pa bdag dang rgyu ba dang / /gang dang gang 'dod de byed pas/ /des na

bdag por gyur zhes bya/ /bdag la rag las rang dbang can/ /'ga' la'ang 'jigs pa yod min te/ /thams cad dbang du gyur zhes bya/ /mtho ris ngan song kun khyab pas/ /des na gar yang phyin zhes bya/ /snying stobs rdul dang mun pa gsum/ /de dag gang

la gnas gyur pa/ /mig 'byed tsam gyis byed gyur pas/ /des na 'dod dgur ldan zhes bya/ /thar pa'ang yang na lha yi lus/ /gang du dag nyid 'dod pa dag /thams cad 'dod pas thob gyur pas// des na dga' mgur gnas zhes bya/ /gang zhig phra gyur gcig

pu skyes nas 'dug /de yi 'di kun skyes shing 'jig par byed/ /de ni dbang dag mchog sbyin lha mchog bya/ /yon tan byed po shin tu zhi ba thob/ /skyes pa po 'di shes pa yod min te/ /bdag gi bde sdug bdag la rang dbang med/ /dbang phyug gis btang

yang na mtho ris sam/ /g.yang sa dag tu 'gro ba kho nar 'gyur/ /dbang phyugs rdza mkhan lta bur sna tshogs 'di sbrul byed por ma gyur na/ /ri rab 'di mi grub cing sa gzhi 'di min rgya mtsho 'ang ma yin te/ /nyi zla skar ldan 'di ltar bkod pa 'di dag mig yul du med 'gyur/ /yod pa'i

phyir ni dbang phyug 'gro ba'i byed po yin zhes 'ga' zhig smra/ /phra zhing bsam gyis mi khyab rab srab byed pa kun rig kun byed pa/ /rnal 'byor goms pas thob pa blo can bsam gtan pa yi bsam gtan yul/ /nyi ma zla bas chu me rlung phyogs dang nam mkha'i lus can te/ /zhi ba'i

bde dga' 'dod pa rnams kyis dbang phyug rtag tu bsgoms/ /dus la ltos par smra ba rnams/ /dngos kun dus kyis bsgyur ba ste/ /gang gi zhang po nor lha dang / /gang pha nor rgyas yin pa yi/ /'jigs med khro bo 'ang bsad gyur pas/ /dus ni 'da' bar dka' ba yin/ /'byung

ba rnams ni dus kyis 'byin/ /skye dgu rnams sdud dus kyis byed/ /dus kyi gnyid log sad par byed/ /dus ni 'da' bar dka' ba yin/ /srung ba sum brtsegs 'obs ni rgya mtsho dang / /dmag mi srin po nor ni nor sbyin sbyor/ /gang zhig bstan bcos pa sangs tshad mnyam

ba'i/ /sgra sgrogs bu de'ang dus kyi dbang gis nyams/ /ngo bo nyid rgyur smra ba ni/ /dngos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub/ /me yi dmar ba nyid dang ni/ /dam pa gzhan don byed nyid dang / /dam pa min pa'i brtse med nyid/ /gsum po ngo bo nyid kyis grub/ /tsher ma rnor bar gyur pa su

yis byas/ /ri dgas bya yi ri mo su yis byas/ /bu ram shing mngar ni ma pa kha ba dag /'di dag thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis grub/ /nyi mtshan zhing zla ba rab bsil dang / /skye bo chags shing thub pa de min la/ /bde bar bsil sdug bsngal rab gdung ba/ /drug po 'di dag

ngo bo nyid kyis grub/ /gang dag rgyu med smra ba ni/ /thams cad rgyu la ltos med par/ /dngos po rnams kyis skye ba ste/ /nyi ma pad+ma'i ge sar sogs/ /sna tshogs gang gis byas pa yin/ /rma bya'i mdongs la sogs pa yang / /sna tshogs gang gis sprul pa yin/ /ji ltar char

rlung la sogs pa/ /glo bur 'byung phyir rgyu med ltar/ /sdug bsngal la sogs rgyu med nyid/ /shin tu rgya chen rab zab la/ /sgyid lug shin tu ma sbyangs la/ /bdag bzhin sgra dag gti mug gis/ /dag ltar theg pa che la smod/ /tshul khrims las ni nyams bla yi/ /lta las

cis kyang ma yin te/ /tshul khrims kyis ni mtho ris 'gro/ /lta bas go 'phang mchog tu 'gyur/ /gti mug dbang gis bsgrigs gyur te/ /gang zhig yang dag gegs byed pa/ /de la dge ba'i 'gro ba'ang med/ /thar pa med par smos ci dgos/ /gnod pa'i sa bon gyur pa yi/ /

mu stegs byed mang mthong nas ni/ /thar 'dod skye bo 'dod rnams la/ /snying rjer mi 'gyur su zhig yod/ /de phyir thar pa don gnyer rnams/ /chos kyi dbyings su lta bar gyis/ /chos kyi dbyings su lta ba'i glu/ /slob dpon chen po 'di paM ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar

gyi mkhan po de nyid dang / /bod kyi lo tsA ba dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas bsgyur ba'o//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /u pa de sha kA ya pra dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ /man ngag sku'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ /'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal ba'i

sku ni gcig nyid la/ /gdul bya'i mos pa'i dbang gis ni/ /phyi nang gsang ba gsum du snang / /bde gshegs sprul pa sna tshogs ston/ /yab ni thabs kyi rang bzhin la/ /yum ni shes rab rang bzhin te/ /thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa/ /thar pa'i lam gyi gtso bo yin/ /

las dang thugs rje'i dbang gis ni/ /la la zhi zhing la khro/ /zhi bas phan par ma gyur na/ /khro bo de bzhin gshegs pas bstan/ /gdod nas dag pa'i snying po la/ /gzugs sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan/ /rang rgyud dngos po ma yin par/ /rang dbang can gyi sku nyid do/ /skye dang

'chi ba'i cho 'phrul rnams/ /sems can lta bu ma yin te/ skye rga na 'chi rang gis shes/ /zhen pa rnams las 'da' tshul ston/ /skye dang 'chi ba mi dmigs pas/ /bag chags lus las grol gyur nas/ /rdo rje lta bu'i sku yin pas/ /bltas pa tsam

gyis dri ma 'dag /mtshan gzhi dri med me long la/ /mtshan bcas 'dzin med gzugs brnyan 'char/ /zung 'jug blo gros ngo bor rtogs/ /gnyug ma dar ldan me long la/ /bcud dang rtsal sbyong gzugs brnyan 'char/ /lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor rtogs/ /'khor 'das

gzhi med me long la/ /'gro ba drug gi gzugs brnyan 'char/ /bsgom du med pa'i ngo bor rtogs/ /shes rab gsum gyi me long la/ /yon tan mtha' dag gzugs brnyan 'char/ /yengs su med pa'i ngo bor rtogs/ /bcu gcig ldan pa'i dam pa la/ /brgyad dang ldan

pa'i slob ma yis/ /zhabs kyi pad+mar rab btud nas/ /ma nyams gsum gyis mchod pa dbul/ /nges pa'i shes pa skyes gyur nas/ /spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid ni/ /ma 'dres gcig tu rtogs pa yis/ /dus 'di nyid la rdzogs sangs rgyas/ /man ngag sku'i sgron ma

rdzogs so//[ ]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ yA na wAka pra dI la nA ma/ bod skad du/ theg pa gsung gi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /khams gsum sems can ma lus kun/ /ma rig mun pas 'thibs pa la/ /ston pa

bcom ldan shAka thub kyis/ /gsung gi sgron ma 'di bstan pas/ /dam chos rim pa gsum du gsungs/ /rgyas par gsungs dang 'bring du bshad/ /bsdus pa'i don du bstan pa'o/ /de la rgyas par gsungs pa ni/ /dug gsum nyon mongs cha mnyam pa'i/ /gnyen po brgyad

khri bzhi stong ste/ /theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa'o/ /'bring ni gsung rab bcu gnyis dang / /mdo dang dbyangs bsnyad lung bstan dang / /tshigs bcad ched brjod gleng gzhi dang / /rtogs brjod de byung skyes pa'i rabs/ /rgyas dang rmad byung gtan la dbab/ /bsdus pas sde snod

gsum dag ste/ /mdo sde 'dus pa chos mngon no/ /lta ba gtsor ston mngon pa ste/ /bsgom pa gtsor ston mdo sde yin/ /spyod pa gtsor ston 'dul ba'o/ /de yang rnam pa gsum yin te/ /che dang chung dang khyab par ro/ /dang po lnga ni mdo yin te/ /de rjes drug ni 'dul ba yin/ /nangs

kyi tha ma mngon pa'o/ /de ni theg pa chung ngu'i gzhung / /rgyas dang rmad byung mdo yin te/ /mdo sogs dgu ni 'dul ba la/ /gtan la dbab pa mngon pa'i sde/ /de ni theg pa chen po'i gzhung / /mdo sogs rim lnga mang yin te/ /de rjes rnam bzhi 'dul ba la/ /tha ma gsum ni

mngon pa'o/ /de ni khyad par bla med gzhung / /de bzhin sbyor ba shes par bya/ /khyad par dbang du byas nas ni/ /mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa dang / /'bras bu rdo rje'i theg pa'o/ /de gnyis rgyu 'bras khyad par yang / /don gcig la yang ma rmongs te/ /thabs mang dka' ba med pa yis/ /

dbang po rnon pos dbang byas te/ /pha rol phyin pa'i theg pa pas/ /sngags kyi theg pa khyad par 'phags/ /sngags la rgyud sde bzhi ru gsungs/ /bya ba'i rgyud dang spyod pa'i rgyud/ /rnal 'byor rgyud dang bla med pa'o/ /dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud/ /bya min rnal 'byor de ltag la/ /

rab la rnal 'byor bla med do/ /yang na mi rigs bzhi las ni/ /bram ze'i rigs la bya ba'i rgyud/ /dmangs rigs la ni spyod pa yi/ /de bzhin rje'u rigs rnal 'byor rgyud/ /rgyal rigs rnal 'byor bla med do/ /'di ni bla med rgyud du grags/ /rgyud dang thabs dang 'bras bu las/ /

'di ni thabs kyi rgyud du gsungs/ /zab cing rgya che'i zhi byed 'di/ /brgyud pa rnam pa bzhi ru bshad/ /rigs kyi rgyud dang don gyi rgyud/ /byin rlabs brgyud dang brda yi brgyud/ /ma zhugs rnam bzhi shes par bya/ /theg pa gsung gi sgron ma rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ saM daR+sha pra dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ yang dag lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /lhan skyes ye shes ster mdzad pa/ /dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dug/ /mtshon chod lta ba ma 'gags pas/ /grub

mtha' kun dang phyogs gcig mthun/ /yin lugs lta ba mtha' dang bral/ /grub mtha' kun gyi blo ma shog /lta ba rgya che mtha' bral ni/ /mtha' bzhi'i skyon dang bral bas na/ /grub mtha' kun la mi gnas pas/ /yang dag lta bar yid ches bya/ /blta bya lta

byed gnyis dang bral/ /lta ba med pa'i lta ba ni/ /lta ba'i dam pa kho na yin/ /dngos 'dzin lta ba kun las grol/ /ma rig pa yi mig phye nas/ /ye shes mig gis bltas pas ni/ /rig pa dri ma med pa lta/ /dri med mthong zhes lta ba yin/ /mthong bya mthong byed gnyis bral

nas/ /zung 'jug lta ba gza' gtad med/ /phyag rgya chen po lta mchog yin/ /de nyid rtogs pa'i yon tan ni/ /mtshan nyid bzhi ru shes par bya/ /rig pa dri ma med pa la/ /rnam dag sgrib g.yogs med pas ni/ /gzung 'dzin g.yas yis ma gos pa'o/ /gcig gi

sangs rgyas e ma ho/ /rig pa gcer bur gnas pa la/ /mtshan ma'i gos kyis ma g.yogs pa/ /rang byung ye shes drod po che/ /chags sdang mtshan ma me bzhin sreg /kun shes rig pa rten med pa'o/ /bag chags sbubs su ma zhugs par/ /sdug bsngal

'khor ba gzugs mi dgos/ /'dod yon sun ma rang sar grol/ /'dzin med rig pa brling pa ni/ /dngos 'dzin yu ba bud pas na/ /snang grags 'dzin pa nus pa yin/ /phyogs cha med pa'i lta ba'o/ /yang dag lta ba'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs so// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ rat+na pra dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ rin po che sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /ma rig mun pa sel mdzad pa/ /dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud/ /dang po zin par bya ba dang / /bar du brtan par bya ba gces/ /

tham bogs kyis dbyung thabs so/ /mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob dang / /ngo bo rang bzhin mtshan nyid dang / /rtags dang nyams myong yon tan dang / /tshad dang skyon dang bcos thabs so/ /ma zin zin par byed pa la/ /lus kyi gnad dang dmigs pa'i gnad/ /rlung gi

gnad ni shes par bya/ /zin pa brtan par byed 'dod na/ /rtsal sbyong gsum la mkhas par bya/ /brtan pa gong du bogs 'byin na/ /bogs 'byin gsum la goms par bya/ /mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob la/ /ngo sprod bzhi bzhir shes bar bya/ /dang po mnyam gzhag

ngo sprod ni/ /rig pa mtha' rkyang dar dang chas/ /nam mkha' lta bu'i dpe yis mtshon/ /rig pa thang sha gcad pa ni/ /gzhu bzangs bdungs pa'i dpe yis mtshon/ /de nas rig pa rtsal sbyang ni/ /dar chen rlung gis bskyod pas mtshon/ /rig pa rjen par gzhag pa ni/ /gnyug

ma lta bu'i dpe yis mtshon/ /rjes thob la yang ngo sprod bzhi/ /mnyam gzhag rjes thob med par sprad/ /rkyen pa drag zhan med par sprod/ /dbang po thogs rdugs med par sprad/ /rang bzhin gsal ba dri med yin/ /mtshan nyid nyams su myong ba'o/ /rtags la rnam pa

bzhir gsungs te/ /btang na 'gro la bzhag na sdod/ /dgos pa'i dus su snyeg pa dang / /shes bzhin gnad du tshud pa'i/ /nyams myong la yang de bzhin te/ /bde ba dang ni gsal ba dang / /mi rtog pa dang mi g.yo ba'o/ /yon tan mngon par shes pa 'char/ /tshad ni

rtsa ba brtan pa dang / /de bzhin rtse mo rno ba nyid/ /bar ni gsal ba ngar dang chas/ /dmigs pa sna tshogs sgyur shes pa'o/ /skyon ni bying dang rmugs pa dang / /de bzhin rgod dang g.yeng ba'o/ /bcos pa la yang rnam gsum ste/ /rin chen gser ltar bcos pa dang / /'tsho mdzad

sman pa lta bu dang / /bi shwa karma'i bzo bzhin no/ /man ngag bsgom pa'i sgron ma rdzogs so//[ #]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ sa ma tA wa stu pra dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ mnyam nyid gzhi'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /

rang snang me long ston mdzad pa/ /dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud/ /gzhi la rnam pa gnyis yin te/ /spyi yi gzhi dang bye brag gzhi/ /spyi ni gnyis su lung ma bstan/ /gzhi nyid ming 'dogs bral ba yin/ /dpar na ga pur sman bzhin no/ /ma bcos khas len bral

ba yin/ /nus pa sna tshogs 'char bas na/ /gzhi nyid shes pa'i nus pa yin/ /sangs rgyas sku dang ye shes 'byung / /de ma rtogs pa'i sems can ni/ /lus dang bag chags gnyis su snang / /bye brag gzhi la gnyis yin te/ /'khor ba'i

gzhi dang 'das pa'o/ /'khor ba'i mtshan nyid 'dus byas pa/ /rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pas na/ /snod dang bcud ni mi rtag ste/ /dus bzhi la sogs 'gyur bas na/ /de ma shes pas yang yang 'khor/ /'das pa'i gzhi la gnyis yin te/ /dran pa bzhi yis ngos gzung

la/ /phyag rgya bzhi yis rgyas gdab po/ /thabs shes gnyis kyis gtan la dbab/ /A li thabs kyi rang bzhin la/ /kA li shes rab rang bzhin no/ /skye med mtshon pas a zhes bya/ /'gag med mtshon pas ka yin no/ /r-i r-I l-i l-I zung 'jug go/ /zla ba dang ni nyi

ma gnyis/ /g.yas dang g.yon par shes par bya'o/ /de nas dus tshod 'pho ba dang / /chu tshod dbyu gu skad cig dang / /lte ba dang ni snying ga dang / /mgrin pa dang ni spyi bo dang / /'khor lo bzhi ru shes par bya/ /'byung ba lnga dang phyi nang gnyis/ /ro snyoms ma zhu shes

par bya/ /phyi nang gnyis su gnas pa la/ /rten 'brel chos rnams ma shes na/ /sangs rgyas chos rnams mi shes so/ /lte bar a gnas gsang bar spro/ /snying gar raM gnas 'bar ba ni/ /mgrin par hri las gsal ba ni/ /spyi bor raM du bsgom par bya/ /bde stong gnyis

su gsal bas ni/ /mtshon pas phyag rgya chen po yin/ /spong dang sbyor dang sgyur dang grol/ /zad dang 'phen dang tshig dang don/ /sde snod gsum gyi don yang ston/ /dus tshod 'byung ba bzhi yis mtshon/ /ma nor ba ru shes par bya/ /sde tshan lnga yis nang rnams 'joms/ /A

li kA li mgrin par gnas/ /nam mkha'i yi ges nga rgyal 'joms/ /rtsa yi sde tshan rkan las 'byung / /me yi yi ges zhe sdang 'joms/ /Ta yi sde tshan lce las 'byung / /rlung gi yi ges phrag dog 'joms/ /ta yi sde tshan so nas 'byung / /sa yi yi ges gti mug 'joms//

pa yi sde tshan mchu nas 'byung / /chu yi yi ges 'dod chags 'joms/ /hUM gis 'og gi rlung rnams bsdus / /a yis steng gi bde ba gsal/ /ha yis bde ba 'phel bar byed/ /hika gis bde ba gnas nas 'dren/ /phyi nas 'byung ba'i dgra gshed dang / /nang nas 'byung ba'i ro

snyoms dang / /phyi yi dus tshod g.yon nas gzung / /nang gi dus tshod g.yas nas gzung / /lo yi mgo bo byi ba yin/ /zla ba'i mgo bo stag yin pas/ /lho dang byang dang shar dang nub/ /'byung ba bzhi ru shes par bya / /shes na thams cad 'grub par nges/ /tshig gcig bstan pas

sangs rgyas dang / /rdzas gcig rnyed pas don yod 'grub/ /sngags gcig bzlas pas nus pa 'byung / /mnyam nyid gzhi'i sgron ma rdzogs so//[ #]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ko Ti niSh+Tha pha la pra dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ mthar thug 'bras bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam

dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'khor ba'i chu las sgrol mdzad pa/ /dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud/ /sgrub pa'i chos la don yod pas/ /dam pas gsungs la yid ches kyis/ /mthar thug 'bras bu'i sgron ma ni/ /rnam pa gnyis su shes par bya/ /gnas

skabs rgyu yi 'bras bu dang / /mthar thug rtogs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /rgyu mthun 'bras bu rab ster bas/ /byas pa'i chos la nan tan skyed/ /nam mkha' rdo rje grong 'jug gsum/ /las su rung ba'i 'bras bu yin/ /rtogs pa'i 'bras bu sku lnga ste/ /ngo bo stong pa chos skul/ /rang bzhin

gsal ba longs sku yin/ /mtshan nyid nyams myong sprul pa'i sku/ /zung 'jug ngo bo nyid kyi sku/ /rang grol rang dag bde chen sku/ /don la mtshon du ci yang med/ /tha snyad blo la rgyu 'bras dI paM gnyis/ /zhen pa bzlog phyir bstan pa las/ /don dam brjod du med pas na/ /rgyal

bas tshig gcig gsungs pa med//mthar thug 'bras bu'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so// // @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ bo d+hi tsaR+Ya pra dI pa nA ma/ bod skad du/ byang chub spyod pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge

la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sgrol ma la ni phyag 'tshal nas/ /dam pa skyes mchog rnams la 'dud/ /'gro ba sdug bsngal gdungs pa la/ /zhi byed bsil ldan dri med bshad/ /'jig rten khams 'di mi rtag ste/ /dper na 'ja' tshon yal dang 'dra/ /lo

zla tshes grangs 'chi dang nye/ /bu tsha la sogs grogs rnams dang / /bor nas gcig pu 'gro dgos na/ /bar do bzhi las 'chi ba'i tshe/ /sdug bsngal ri bos mnan pas sdug /bdun tsho bdun du bar do ru/ /gshed pos 'tshe zhing sdug re bsngal/ /ma rig 'khrul

pas lus blangs te/ /nyon mongs lnga yis sems kyang dkrugs/ /dper na shing rta'i 'khor lo bzhin/ /'gro ba drug gi sdug bsngal myong / /sdug bsngal bzhi sogs sdug bsngal bas/ /de phyir byang chub bsgrub par bya/ /le lo g.yeng ba rab spangs te/ /shes rab

gsum la blo sbyangs la/ /rtag tu dur khrod gnas su 'dug /dran pa bzhi dang ldan pa yis/ /tho rangs langs te khrus byas la/ /dad dang mos gus sngon btang ste/ /byang chub sems dang rab ldan pas/ /'gro ba bu bzhin gdung bar bya/ /gsum la skyabs 'gro ma nyams bya/ /bden

pa'i chos la the tshom spang / /'dod pa spel phyir chu sbyin gtang / /mchod bshags la sogs kha ton bya/ /gru yi tshul du lus kyang btsal/ /bag yod spyod lam blo gros zab/ /lha dang mi 'bral bsam pa bzang / /dang po byung bas dkon mchog mchod/ /kha zas kun las

rnal 'byor bya/ /lhag ma 'byung bo rnams la bsngo/ /bshang gci rnams kyang sbyin par gtang / /smon lam rgya chen gdab pa'o/ /chos su 'gro ba'i tshig kyang brjod/ /sAts+tsha gdab cing srog kyang gdon/ /bsod nams tshogs ni ci nus bsags/ /ye shes tshogs kyang

de bzhin te/ /sdom pa gsum dang ldan par bya/ /pha rol phyin pa drug spyad de/ /dbang bzhi rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor bya/ /bskor ba bya zhing lus kyang bcag /'byung ba bzhi ni ro snyoms te/ /mtshan mo nang gi spyad pa bya/ /srod la gtor tshogs chen po gtang / /nam phyed

tshogs kyi 'khor lo bskor/ /phyi bcud nang bcud rang sor gzhag /nam smad dge ba'i gnyid kyang log /spyod lam rnam bzhi'i chos la bsdu/ /ma yengs chu bo'i rgyun ltar spyad/ /sgyu lus 'od gsal bsre ba yang / /sum cu rtsa bzhi'i gdams pa'i don/ /sems nyid

las su rung bas ni/ /rang dbang rgyal po sems la thob/ /de phyir rnal 'byor brtson par spyad/ /byang chub spyod pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so// //paN+Di ta kha che dz+nyA na gu h+ya dang / ong po lo tsA bas bsgyur ba'o// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ pA da yo ga pra dI paM na ma/ bod skad du/ rnal 'byor lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rnal 'byor lam gyi sgron ma 'di/ /bstan pas log pa'i lam mi 'jug /sdug bsngal thams cad zhi mdzad pa/ /dam

pa skyes mchog de la 'dud/ /A li kA li'i sgra don rtogs/ /sde snod gsum gyi don yang shes/ /bdag dang skye 'gro'i sems can rnams/ /ye nas skye med 'od gsal yang / /ma rig pa yi rlung gis 'khrul/ /'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong / /de las grol bar

byed pa'i phyir/ /rnal 'byor lam pas 'di ltar bya/ /sdig pa'i las rnams rab spangs te/ /dge ba'i chos la brtson par bya/ /bka' la som nyi mi za zhing / /rtag tu skyabs 'gro ma nyams bya/ /byams pa'i sems dang rab ldan zhing / /'gro la snying rje ci nus bya/ /'dod

yon dngos po mi rtag pas/ /gzung 'dzin chags sems rnam par spangs/ /gzhan la smad par mi bya zhing / /'gro ba'i bla ma spyi bor bkur/ /log pa'i lam du mi 'jug cing / /mthu dang ngan sngags spel mi bya/ /longs spyod 'du 'dzi rnam spangs te/ /gcig pu

nags su 'dug la bsgom / /'jig rten 'chal tshig mi brjod par/ /sngags dang snying po mdo yang brjod/ /yang na lkugs pa'i tshul du bsdad/ /rang byung dri ma med pa'i brda/ /lus la gru yi blo bzhag la/ /bcud len gyis ni zungs kyang bskyed/ /gtum

mo yis ni ro bsnyams te/ /'byung ba bsnyams zhing nad rnams dbyung / /gnod sbyin bar chad byed pa la/ /brtul zhugs gdams pa'i spyad pa bya/ /mi ngal gsum dang 'du ba gsum/ /'khor lo gsum dang rtsa ba gsum/ /'bar ba gsum dang chud mi za/ /

thim pa gsum dang rgyas gdab bo/ /mdor na thams cad sems yin te/ /sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan med/ /sems su 'dzin pa 'khrul pa'i blo/ /blo las grol na gnyis su med/ /gnyug ma'i ngang las ma yengs par/ /dngos por snang ba sgyu mar blta/ /sgyu

ma brdzun pa rmi lam tshul/ /rmi lam tshul sogs rab shes nas/ /dpe brgyad bzhin du shes par bya/ /rnal ma'i chos la rab gnas na/ /gang ltar spyad kyang bde ba thob/ /des na rnal 'byor brtson par bya/ /sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa rnal 'byor lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba

rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ ]@#/ /gsang ba thugs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ @##/ /rgya gar skad du/ /tsit+ta gu h+ya pra dI paM nA ma/ bod skad du/ gsang ba thugs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /dam pa lnga bcu rtsa lnga yis/ /zhabs kyi pad+mar

rab btud nas/ /sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/ /khyad par lnga yis gdams pa bstan/ /kye ma rnam shes rlung gis 'khrugs / /rlung ni las su rung ba dang / /gtum mo rlung gis sbar bar bya / /'du ba'i nad kyang rlung gis bcos/ /'byung ba ro ni mnyam pa dang / /brtul

zhugs spyod pas bar chod sel/ /'tsho ba'i bcud ni len pa dang / /e waM bde ba'i rlung gis bskyed/ /rten 'brel shes pa 'char ba dang / /rdo rje rkang mgyogs grub par 'gyur/ /ng+hU tIr tshud de phyag rgya che/ /'dab ldan pad+ma ge sar dbus/ /rtsa dang rlung dang byang chub sems/ /

stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis ni/ /chags dang 'bri ba bcu gnyis brgya/ /la la ra sa ng+hU tIr bsdu/ /rlung dang byang chub sems kyang de/ /'khor lo bzhi la srog shing tshul/ /mi 'dra sbar bas haM las 'dzag /bcu drug phyed phyed thig le ni/ /dkyil dang bzlog dang dgram zhing

bstim/ /dga' bzhi'i khyad par phyag rgya che/ /skye ba dang ni 'gag pa'o/ /shes pa kho na 'ba' zhig yin/ /sems ni kun gyi sa bon te/ /rang sems rtogs na sangs rgyas la/ /bde ba gzhan du mi btsal lo/ /sems nyid las su rung ba dang / /rnam par mi rtog yang dag

don/ /gnyis med gnyis su med pa las/ /gnyis su byar med spros bral mkha'/ /srid dang mya ngan 'das las grol/ /don gyis dbu ma phyag rgya che/ /snying po'i don las ma yengs par/ /gnyug ma'i yid ni gcig tu gtad/ /rnal ma'i don la rab gnas nas/ /

yid la mi dmigs bde ba che/ /lhan cig skyes pa bdud rtsi'i ro/ /mtshon du yod pa ma yin te/ /ston ka'i zla ltar dri med 'od/ /bde gsal stong pa'i ye shes can/ /rang la spras pa mig ltar dbye/ /bde ba che las gzhan med pas/ /phyag rgya'i mchog de phyag

rgya che/ /sdug bsngal zhi bar bya ba dang / /lus sems 'phyan du gzhug pa dang / /'bras bu blo yis ma grub pa/ /shes rgyud nam mkhar 'phang ba dang / /dmigs pa sna tshogs bsgyur shes so/ /chos dang chos min sel ba dang / /rig pa dngas snyigs dbye ba dang / /

rnam shes rlung yang bstim pa'o/ /sgyu lus 'od gsal bsre bar bya/ /bag chags sbubs su grol ba dang / /phyag rgya chen po dus 'dir thob/ /des na rnal 'byor brtson par bya/ /sdug bsngal zhi bar byed pa gsang ba thugs kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba/ rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen

po ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so// //rgya gar kyi mkhan po dz+nyAn gu h+ya dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba lo btsun chung gis bsgyur ba 'o//[ # #]@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ maN+Dal bi d+hi nA ma/ bod skad du/ maN+Dal gyi cho ga zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal smra ba'i seng

ge la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bla ma mnyes par byed pa yi/ /maN+Dal cho ga bshad par bya/ /maN+Dal la ni rnam lnga ste/ /ngo bo nges tshig dbul thabs dang / /dbye ba dang ni phan yon no/ /ngo bo dbul bar 'os pa la/ /sngags dang rdzas su bcas pa'o/ /maN ni bskyed pa'i sa bon

te/ /bsod nams 'phel bas Dal zhes bya/ /dbul thabs dad gus mos pa yis/ /gong ma mnyes par byed pa'o/ /maN+Dal dbye na rnam gnyis te/ /dngos dang yid kyis bsam pa'o/ /yid ni las su rung ba ste/ /dran pa tsam gyis gsol pa'o//

dngos la rnam pa bzhir gsungs te/ /dbul ba dang ni sgrub pa dang / /mchod pa dang ni mi mdzes pa'o/ /sa yang rung ste gzhi la ni/ /gang yang tshad dang ldan pa la/ /oM badzra yak+Sha hUM/ /zhes pa de yis byug par bya/ /rnam pa nyi shu dgram bya ste/ /haM las 'og gi ri rab bsams //

rang gi ngos kyi shar byas pa'i/ /ya las shar gyi lus 'phags bsam / /ra las byang gi sgra mi snyan/ /la las lho yi 'dzam bu'i gling / /sha las nub kyi ba lang spyod/ /ya las byang shar mtshams su bsam/ /gling g.yog nyi shu byed na yang / /g.yas g.yon

sngags kyang de bzhin no/ /ri las nub byang gling phran bsam/ /shaM las lho nub mtshams yin no/ /laM las lho shar gling phran bsam/ /tsa las btsun mo rin po che/ /cha las blon po rin po che/ /dza las dmag dpon rin po che/ /wa las glang po rin po che/ /tsaM las rta

mchog rin po che/ /tshaM las 'khor lo rin po che/ /dzaM las nor bu rin po che/ /waM las gter chen rin po che/ /maM las nyi ma shar du bsam/ /a las zla ba nub tu'o/ /oM las stong gi ri rab po/ /gling bzhi gling phran bcas pa dang / /rin chen bdun dang gter dang

brgyad/ /ri rab nyi zlar bcas pa rnams/ /bla ma dang ni dkon mchog gsum/ /yi dam mkha' 'gro mchod pa'i 'os/ /dang pa'i stobs kyis 'bul lags kyis/ /bla ma dkon mchog bzhes su gsol/ /maN+Dal phul ba'i yon tan ni/ /maN+Dal gcig phul drug dang

ldan/ /bsod nams tshogs ni bsam mi khyab/ /des na da la brtson par bya/ /gcig phul yon tan drug dang ldan/ /gling bzhi phul ba'i yon tan gyis/ /bdud bzhi ma lus zhi bar 'gyur/ /gling phran phul ba'i yon tan gyis/ /tshad med bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur/ /rin

chen sna bdun phul ba yis/ /'phags pa'i nor bdun thob par 'gyur/ /gter chen phul ba'i yon tan gyis/ /mi zad longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur/ /nyi zla phul ba'i yon tan gyis/ /lta bsgom sems la gsal bar 'gyur/ /ri rab phul ba'i yon tan gyis/ /rang 'byung ye

shes thob par 'gyur/ /maN+Dal dbul ba'i cho ga rje btsun ka ma la shI las mdzad pa rdzogs so//[ #]@##//rgya gar skad du/ ma hA mu dra tat+t+wa nAk+Sha ro pa de sha /bod skad du/ de kho na nyid phyag rgya chen po yi ge med pa'i man ngag /'jam dpal smra ba'i seng ge la

phyag 'tshal lo/ /grub thob dam pa brgyad cu rtsa bzhi las/ /skyes bu khyad par rig 'dzin lnga yi gzhung / /mchog gyur rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul la reg /de phyir dpe bral phyag rgya chen po bshad/ /rnam gcod dang ni yongs gcod dang / /phung po gsum po sel ba dang / /don dam mjal

ba'i tshad ma yis/ /yang dag yid la lta ba bya/ /yang dag don la yi ge med/ /gang gis yi ge med shes pa/ /de yis yi ge thams cad shes/ /yi ge a nas k+Sha la rdzogs/ /sde tshan brgyad kyi sgra sbyor ni/ /A li kA lir shes par bya/ /ma skyes pa dang ma 'gag pa/ /zung 'jug mtha' bzhi

bral ba yi/ /bde ba chen po rgyun chags su/ /bla ma'i brda yis mtshon par bya/ /kha dog mar me me long rgya/ /me shel sa bon skyur dang sgra/ /brgyad pa 'di ru don bsdus pa/ /go ba cig shos skye bar 'gyur/ /in+d+ra b+hU ti bdag med ma/ /lhan cig skyes sbyor 'dod yon grol/ /

'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/ /bden don rtogs pa 'phags pa lha/ /srog dang rtsol ba nA ga pa/ /phyi nang rlung gsum tshangs par 'dren/ /kha sbyor thig le pad+mar 'byung / /bde bas rgyas pa'i za ma tog /sku gsum mnyam gzhag mda' bsnun na/ /dran med skye med blo las

'das/ /mnyam gzhag dang ni rjes thob dang / /rmi lam dang ni bar do la/ /zin dang brtan dang bogs 'byin pa/ /rgyas gdab pa dang rnam pa bzhi/ /dang po dus bzhi mnyam sbyar la/ /gnad gsum gzer bzhi gdab par bya/ /lus kyi gnad dang dmigs pa'i gnad//

rlung gi gnad ni shes par bya/ /rig pa gcur la gdab pa dang / /shes pa srang du gzhug pa dang / /sems ni rung dmigs 'dren pa dang / /rten dang dbral zhing bsgom pa gces/ /e waM brgyan pa'i bde ba la/ /bde bas byang chub lam du kyer/ /snang srid brda ru slob pa

dang / /gang mthong phyag rgya chen por shar/ /thams cad ro mnyam de bzhin nyid/ /gcig zos pa yis gzhan kun grol/ /ji ltar chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du/ /rnal 'byor ma yengs rgyun du bsgom/ /gzung ba dang ni sbyang ba dang / /sgyu ma dang ni kho na nyid/ /nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las//

rmi lam man ngag shes par bya/ /da lta 'chi kha bar do la/ /rten dang 'ong dang thig le sems/ /grong 'pho'i man ngag shes pa yis/ /bde ba can du de 'gro'o/ /don mthong pa yis sgro 'dogs chod/ /nyams su blangs na byin rlabs 'byung / /drod rtags nus pa tshod zin pas/ /

yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'o/ /rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa'i nad/ /mtshon dang mche ba 'byung ba 'khrugs/ /dal yams 'brum po chu ser la/ /ting 'dzin me btsa' skyugs kyis zhi/ /bdud dang mu stegs cho 'phrul gtong / /gdon dang 'byung bo bshugs pa 'dren/ /gnod

sbyin 'khu ldog byed pa'i tshe/ /mi g.yo rgya mtsho lta bu gzhag /me dang chu dang dug sbrul dang / /bse dang chom rkun rgyal po'i chad/ /stag dang dred mo gcan gzan khro/ /de tsho nga yis 'dod pa yin/ /dgod dang rtsed mo byed pa dang / /dal dang drag dang shin tu drag /zang zing longs

spyod mang po la/ /sbyor ba 'di yis khyab na bde/ /ro snyoms gtum mo mkha' spyod dang / /sman dang bcud len bdud rtsi bsten / /ro langs mkha' 'gro dngos grub ster/ /blang dor med pa'i sems kyis 'bad/ /mtha' rgyas gnyis kyis shan phye la/ /khar phog
